original: “puṇṇacando viya bhagavā, candakiraṇanikaro viya tena desito dhammo, candakiraṇasamuppāditapīṇito
analyzed: puṇṇa candaḥ viya bhagavā canda kiraṇa nikaraḥ viya tena desitaḥ dhammo canda kiraṇa samuppādita pīṇito

original: loko viya saṅgho”ti evamādīhi aṭṭhakathāyamāgataupamāhi vibhāvetabbo. Atha vā sabbasattānaṃ
analyzed: lokaḥ viya saṅghaḥ ti evamādīhi aṭṭhakathā ayam āgata aupamāhi vibhāvetabbaḥ atha vā sabba sattānam

original: aggoti katvā paṭhamaṃ buddho, tappabhavato, tadupadesitato ca tadanantaraṃ dhammo,
analyzed: aggaḥ iti katvā paṭhamam buddhaḥ tad pabhavataḥ tad upadesitataḥ ca tad anantaram dhammaḥ

original: tassa dhammassa sādhāraṇato, tadāsevanato ca tadanantaraṃ saṅgho vutto. “Sabbasattānaṃ
analyzed: tassa dhammassa sādhāraṇataḥ tad āsevanataḥ ca tad anantaram saṅghaḥ vuttaḥ sabba sattānam

original: vā hite viniyojakoti katvā paṭhamaṃ buddho, sabbasattahitattā tadanantaraṃ dhammo,
analyzed: vā hite viniyojakaḥ iti katvā paṭhamam buddhaḥ sabba satta hita ttā tad anantaram dhammaḥ

original: hitādhigamāya paṭipanno adhigatahito cāti katvā tadanantaraṃ saṅgho vutto”ti aṭṭhakathāgatanayena
analyzed: hita adhigamāya paṭipannaḥ adhigata hito ca ati katvā tad anantaram saṅghaḥ vuttaḥ ti aṭṭhakathā gata nayena

original: anupubbatā veditabbā.
analyzed: anupubba tā veditabbā

original: Buddharatanapaṇāmañca karonto kevalapaṇāmato thomanāpubbaṅgamovasātisayoti “karuṇāsītalahadaya”ntiādipadehi
analyzed: buddha ratana paṇāmañca karontaḥ kevala paṇāmataḥ karuṇā sītalahadayanti ādi padehi

original: thomanāpubbaṅgamataṃ dasseti. Thomanāpubbaṅgamena hi paṇāmena satthu guṇātisayayogo,
analyzed: thomanā pubbaṅgama tam dasseti thomanā pubbaṅgamena hi paṇāmena satthu guṇa atisaya yogaḥ

original: tato cassa anuttaravandanīyabhāvo, tena ca attano paṇāmassa khettaṅgatabhāvo, tena
analyzed: tato ca assa anuttara vandanīya bhāvo tena ca attano paṇāmassa khettaṅgata bhāvo tena

original: cassa khettaṅgatassa paṇāmassa yathādhippetanipphattihetubhāvo dassitoti. Thomanāpubbaṅgamatañca
analyzed: cassa khettaṅgatassa paṇāmassa yathā adhippeta nipphatti hetu bhāvaḥ dassito ti thomanā pubbaṅgamatam ca

original: dassento yassā saṃvaṇṇanaṃ kattukāmo, sā suttantadesanā karuṇāpaññāppadhānāyeva,
analyzed: dassentaḥ yassā saṃvaṇṇanam kattu kāmo sā suttanta desanā karuṇā paññā appadhānāya iva

original: na vinayadesanā viya karuṇāppadhānā, nāpi abhidhammadesanā viya paññāppadhānāti tadubhayappadhānameva
analyzed: na vinaya desanā viya karuṇā appadhānā na api abhidhamma desanā viya paññā appadhānā ti tad ubhaya ppadhānam eva

original: thomanamārabhati. Esā hi ācariyassa pakati, yadidaṃ ārambhānurūpathomanā. Teneva
analyzed: thomanam ārabhati esā hi ācariyassa yat idam ārambha anurūpa thomanā tena iva

original: ca vinayadesanāya saṃvaṇṇanārambhe “yo kappakoṭīhipi…pe… mahākāruṇikassa tassā”ti
analyzed: ca vinaya desanāya saṃvaṇṇanā ārambhe yaḥ mahā kāruṇikassa tassa ati

original: karuṇāppadhānaṃ, abhidhammadesanāya saṃvaṇṇanārambhe “karuṇā viya…pe… yathārucī”ti

original: paññāppadhānañca thomanamāraddhaṃ. Vinayadesanā hi āsayādinirapekkhakevalakaruṇāya
analyzed: paññā appadhānam ca thomanam āraddham vinaya desanā hi āsaya ādi nirapekkha kevala karuṇāya

original: pākatikasattenāpi asotabbārahaṃ suṇanto, apucchitabbārahaṃ pucchanto, avattabbārahañca
analyzed: pākatika sattena api a sotabba āraham suṇantaḥ a pucchitabba āraham pucchantaḥ a vattabba āraham ca

original: vadanto sikkhāpadaṃ paññapesīti karuṇāppadhānā. Tathā hi ukkaṃsapariyantagatahirottappopi
analyzed: vadantaḥ sikkhāpadam paññapesi iti karuṇā appadhānā tathā hi ukkaṃsa pariyanta gata hira uttappaḥ api

original: bhagavā lokiyasādhujanehipi pariharitabbāni “sikharaṇī, sambhinnā”tiādivacanāni,
analyzed: bhagavā pariharitabbāni sikharaṇī sambhinnā ati ādi vacanāni

original: yathāparādhañca garahavacanāni mahākaruṇāsañcoditamānaso mahāparisamajjhe abhāsi,
analyzed: yathāparādham ca garaha vacanāni mahā karuṇā sañcodita mānasaḥ mahā parisamajjhe abhāsi

original: taṃtaṃsikkhāpadapaññatti kāraṇāpekkhāya ca verañjādīsu sārīrikaṃ khedamanubhosi.
analyzed: taṃ taṃ sikkhāpada paññatti kāraṇa apekkhāya ca verañja ādīsu sārīrikam khedam anubhosi

original: Tasmā kiñcāpi bhūmantarapaccayākārasamayantarakathānaṃ viya vinayapaññattiyāpi samuṭṭhāpikā
analyzed: tasmā kiñcā api bhūma antara paccaya ākāra samaya antara kathānam viya vinaya paññattiyā api samuṭṭhāpikā

original: paññā anaññasādhāraṇatāya atisayakiccavatī, karuṇāya kiccaṃ pana tatopi adhikanti
analyzed: paññā anañña sādhāraṇa tāya atisaya kiccavatī karuṇāya kiccam pana tatas pi adhikanti

original: vinayadesanāya karuṇāppadhānatā vuttā. Karuṇābyāpārādhikatāya hi desanāya karuṇāpadhānatā,
analyzed: vinaya desanāya karuṇā appadhāna tā vuttā karuṇā byāpāra adhikatāya hi desanāya karuṇā apadhāna tā

original: abhidhammadesanā pana kevalapaññāppadhānā paramatthadhammānaṃ yathāsabhāvapaṭivedhasamatthāya
analyzed: abhidhamma desanā pana kevala paññā appadhānā paramattha dhammānam yathā sabhāva paṭivedha samatthāya

original: paññāya tattha sātisayappavattito. Suttantadesanā pana karuṇāpaññāppadhānā tesaṃ
analyzed: paññāya tattha sa atisaya ppavattito suttanta desanā pana karuṇā paññā appadhānā tesam

original: tesaṃ sattānaṃ āsayānusayādhimutticaritādibhedaparicchindanasamatthāya paññāya sattesu
analyzed: tesam sattānam āsaya anusaya adhimutti carita ādi bheda paricchindana samatthāya paññāya sattesu

original: ca mahākaruṇāya tattha sātisayappavattito. Suttantadesanāya hi mahākaruṇāya samāpattibahulo
analyzed: ca mahā karuṇāya tattha sa atisaya ppavattitaḥ suttanta desanāya hi mahā karuṇāya samāpatti bahulaḥ

original: vineyyasantāne tadajjhāsayānulomena gambhīramatthapadaṃ patiṭṭhapesi. Tasmā ārambhānurūpaṃ
analyzed: vineyya santāne tad ajjhāsayā anulomena gambhīram attha padam patiṭṭhapesi tasmai ārambha anurūpam

original: karuṇāpaññāppadhānameva thomanaṃ katanti veditabbaṃ, ayamettha samudāyattho.
analyzed: karuṇā paññā appadhānam eva thomanam katan ti veditabbam ayam ettha samudāya ttho

original: Ayaṃ pana avayavattho – kiratīti karuṇā, paradukkhaṃ vikkhipati paccayavekallakaraṇena
analyzed: ayam pana avayava tthaḥ kirati iti karuṇā para dukkham vikkhipati paccaya vekalla karaṇena

original: apanetīti attho. Dukkhitesu vā kiriyati pasāriyatīti karuṇā. Atha vā kiṇātīti karuṇā,
analyzed: apaneti iti atthaḥ dukkhitesu vā kiriyati pasāriyati iti karuṇā atha vā kiṇāti iti karuṇā

original: paradukkhe sati kāruṇikaṃ hiṃsati vibādhati, paradukkhaṃ vā vināsetīti attho. Paradukkhe
analyzed: para dukkhe sati kāruṇikam hiṃsati vibādhati para dukkham vā vināseti iti atthaḥ para dukkhe

original: sati sādhūnaṃ kampanaṃ hadayakhedaṃ karotīti vā karuṇā. Atha vā kamiti sukhaṃ, taṃ
analyzed: sati kampanam hadaya khedam karoti iti vā karuṇā atha vā kam iti sukham tam

original: rundhatīti karuṇā. Esā hi paradukkhāpanayanakāmatālakkhaṇā attasukhanirapekkhatāya
analyzed: rundhati iti karuṇā esā hi para dukkha apanayana kāma tā lakkhaṇā atta sukha nirapekkha tāya

original: kāruṇikānaṃ sukhaṃ rundhati vibandhatīti, sabbattha saddasatthānusārena padanipphatti
analyzed: kāruṇikānam sukham rundhati vibandhati iti sabbattha sadda sattha anusārena pada nipphatti

original: veditabbā. Uṇhābhitattehi sevīyatīti sītaṃ, uṇhābhisamanaṃ. Taṃ lāti gaṇhātīti sītalaṃ,
analyzed: veditabbā uṇha abhitattehi sevīyati iti sītam uṇha abhisamanam tam lāti gaṇhāti iti sītalam

original: “cittaṃ vā te khipissāmi, hadayaṃ vā te phālessāmī”ti ettha uro “hadaya”nti vuttaṃ,
analyzed: cittam vā te khipissāmi hadayam vā te phālessāmi iti ettha uraḥ hadayanti vuttam

original: “vakkaṃ hadaya”nti ettha hadayavatthu, “hadayā hadayaṃ maññe aññāya tacchatī”ti ettha
analyzed: vakkam hadayanti ettha hadaya vatthu hadayā hadayam maññe aññāya tacchati iti ettha

original: cittaṃ, idhāpi cittameva abbhantaraṭṭhena hadayaṃ. Attano sabhāvaṃ vā haratīti hadayaṃ,
analyzed: cittam idha api cittam eva abbhantaraṭṭhena hadayam sabhāvam vā harati iti hadayam

original: ra-kārassa da-kāraṃ katvāti neruttikā. Karuṇāya sītalaṃ hadayamassāti karuṇāsītalahadayo,
analyzed: rakārassa dakāram katvā iti neruttikā karuṇāya sītalam hadayam assa ati karuṇā sītala hadayaḥ

original: taṃ karuṇāsītalahadayaṃ.
analyzed: tam karuṇā sītā lahadayam

original: Kāmañcettha paresaṃ hitopasaṃhārasukhādiaparihānijjhānasabhāvatāya, byāpādādīnaṃ
analyzed: kāmam ca itthā paresam hita upasaṃhāra sukha ādi a parihāni jhāna sabhāva tāya byāpāda ādīnam

original: ujuvipaccanīkatāya ca sattasantānagatasantāpavicchedanākārappavattiyā mettāmuditānampi
analyzed: uju vipaccanīka tāya ca satta santāna gata santāpa vicchedana ākāra ppavattiyā

original: cittasītalabhāvakāraṇatā upalabbhati, tathāpi paradukkhāpanayanākārappavattiyā parūpatāpāsahanarasā

analyzed: avihiṃsā bhūtā visesena bhagavato cittassa citta passaddhi viya sīti bhāva nimittanti

original: tassāyeva cittasītalabhāvakāraṇatā vuttā. Karuṇāmukhena vā mettāmuditānampi hadayasītalabhāvakāraṇatā
analyzed: citta sītala bhāva kāraṇa tā vuttā karuṇā mukhena vā hadaya sītala bhāva kāraṇa tā

original: vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Na hi sabbattha niravasesattho upadisīyati, padhānasahacaraṇāvinābhāvādinayehipi
analyzed: vuttā iti daṭṭhabbam na hi sabbattha niravasesa atthaḥ upadisīyati padhāna sahacaraṇa avinābhāva ādi nayehi pi

original: yathālabbhamānaṃ gayhamānattā. Apicettha taṃsampayuttañāṇassa chaasādhāraṇañāṇapariyāpannatāya
analyzed: yathālabbhamānam gayhamāna ttā api ca ittha tad sampayutta ñāṇassa cha a sādhāraṇa ñāṇa pariyāpanna tāya

original: asādhāraṇañāṇavisesanibandhanabhūtā sātisayaṃ, niravasesañca sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ viya
analyzed: asādhāraṇa ñāṇa visesa nibandhana bhūtā sa atisayam niravasesam ca sabbaññuta ññāṇam viya

original: savisayabyāpitāya mahākaruṇābhāvamupagatā anaññasādhāraṇasātisayabhāvappattā karuṇāva
analyzed: sa visaya byāpitāya mahā karuṇā bhāvam upagatā anañña sādhāraṇa sa atisaya bhāva ppattā karuṇā vat

original: hadayasītalattahetubhāvena vuttā. Atha vā satipi mettāmuditānaṃ paresaṃ hitopasaṃhārasukhādiaparihānijjhānasabhāvatāya
analyzed: hadaya sīta latta hetu bhāvena vuttāḥ atha vā paresam hita upasaṃhāra sukha ādi a parihāni jhāna sabhāva tāya

original: sātisaye hadayasītalabhāvanibandhanatte sakalabuddhaguṇavisesakāraṇatāya tāsampi
analyzed: sa atisaye hadaya sītala bhāva nibandhana tte sakala buddha guṇa visesa kāraṇatāya tāsam pi

original: kāraṇanti karuṇāya eva hadayasītalabhāvakāraṇatā vuttā. Karuṇānidānā hi sabbepi buddhaguṇā.
analyzed: kāraṇam ti karuṇāyaḥ eva hadaya sītala bhāva kāraṇa tā vuttā karuṇā nidānāḥ hi sabbe api buddha guṇā

original: Karuṇānubhāvanibbāpiyamānasaṃsāradukkhasantāpassa hi bhagavato paradukkhāpanayanakāmatāya
analyzed: karuṇā anubhāva nibbāpiyamāna saṃsāra dukkha santāpassa hi bhagavato para dukkha apanayana kāma tāya

original: anekānipi kappānamasaṅkhyeyyāni akilantarūpasseva niravasesabuddhakaradhammasambharaṇaniratassa
analyzed: anekāni api kappānam asaṅkhyeyyāni a kilanta rūpassa iva niravasesa buddha kara dhamma sambharaṇa niratassa

original: samadhigatadhammādhipateyyassa ca sannihitesupi sattasaṅghātasamupanītahadayūpatāpanimittesu

original: na īsakampi cittasītibhāvassa aññathattamahosīti. Tīsu cettha vikappesu paṭhame vikappe

original: avisesabhūtā buddhabhūmigatā, dutiye tatheva mahākaruṇābhāvūpagatā, tatiye paṭhamābhinīhārato

original: paṭṭhāya tīsupi avatthāsu pavattā bhagavato karuṇā saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: paṭṭhāya tīsu pi avatthāsu pavattā bhagavataḥ karuṇā saṅgahitā iti daṭṭhabbam

original: Pajānātīti paññā, yathāsabhāvaṃ pakārehi paṭivijjhatīti attho. Paññapetīti vā paññā,
analyzed: pajānāti iti paññā yathāsabhāvam pakārehi paṭivijjhati iti attho paññapeti iti vā paññā

original: taṃ tadatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ karotīti attho. Sāyeva ñeyyāvaraṇappahānato pakārehi dhammasabhāvajotanaṭṭhena
analyzed: tam tad attham pākaṭam karoti iti sāyā iva ñeyya āvaraṇa ppahānataḥ pakārehi dhamma sabhāva jotana ṭṭhena

original: pajjototi paññāpajjoto. Paññavato hi ekapallaṅkenapi nisinnassa dasasahassilokadhātu
analyzed: pajjoto ti paññāpajjoto paññavataḥ hi eka pallaṅkena api nisinnassa dasa sahassi lokadhātu

original: ekapajjotā hoti. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā “cattārome bhikkhave, pajjotā. Katame cattāro?
analyzed: eka pajjotā hoti vuttam ha etam bhagavatā cattāro me bhikkhave pajjotā katame cattāro

original: Candapajjoto, sūriyapajjoto, aggipajjoto, paññāpajjoto, ime kho bhikkhave, cattāro
analyzed: canda pajjotaḥ sūriya pajjotaḥ aggi pajjotaḥ paññā pajjotaḥ ime kho bhikkhave cattāro

original: pajjotā. Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave, imesaṃ catunnaṃ pajjotānaṃ yadidaṃ paññāpajjoto”ti.
analyzed: pajjotāḥ etat aggam bhikkhave imesam catunnam pajjotānam yat idam paññāpajjotā ti

original: Tena vihato visesena samugghāṭitoti paññāpajjotavihato, visesatā cettha upari āvi
analyzed: tena vihataḥ visesena samugghāṭito ti paññāpajja uta vihataḥ visesa tā ca ittha upari āvi

original: bhavissati. Muyhanti tena, sayaṃ vā muyhati, muyhanamattameva vā tanti moho, avijjā.
analyzed: bhavissati muyhanti tena sayam vā muyhati muyhana mattam eva vā mohaḥ avijjā

original: Sveva visayasabhāvapaṭicchādanato andhakārasarikkhatāya tamo viyāti mohatamo. Satipi
analyzed: su eva visaya sabhāva paṭicchādanato andhakāra sarikkha tāya tamaḥ viyāti moha tamaḥ

original: tamasaddassa sadisakappanamantarena avijjāvācakatte mohasaddasannidhānena tabbisesakatāvettha
analyzed: tama saddassa sadisa kappanam antarena avijjā vācaka tte moha sadda sannidhānena tad visesaka tā avettha

original: yuttāti sadisakappanā. Paññāpajjotavihato mohatamo yassāti paññāpajjotavihatamohatamo,
analyzed: yuttā ati sadisa kappanā paññā pajjota vihataḥ moha tamaḥ yassa ati paññā pajjota vihata moha tamo

original: taṃ paññāpajjotavihatamohatamaṃ.
analyzed: tam paññāpajjota vihata mohatamam

original: Nanu ca sabbesampi khīṇāsavānaṃ paññāpajjotena avijjandhakārahatatā sambhavati, atha
analyzed: nanu ca sabbesam pi khīṇāsavānam paññāpajjotena avijja andhakāra hata tā sambhavati atha

original: kasmā aññasādhāraṇāvisesaguṇena bhagavato thomanā vuttāti? Savāsanappahānena anaññasādhāraṇavisesatāsambhavato.
analyzed: kasmai añña sādhāraṇa avisesa guṇena bhagavataḥ thomanā vuttā ati sa vāsanā pahānena anañña sādhāraṇa visesa tā sambhavato

original: Sabbesampi hi khīṇāsavānaṃ paññāpajjotahatāvijjandhakārattepi sati saddhādhimuttehi
analyzed: sabbesam pi hi khīṇāsavānam sati saddhā adhimuttehi

original: viya diṭṭhippattānaṃ sāvakapaccekabuddhehi sammāsambuddhānaṃ savāsanappahānena kilesappahānassa
analyzed: viya diṭṭhi ppattānam sāvaka paccekabuddhehi sammāsambuddhānam sa vāsanā ppahānena kilesa ppahānassa

original: viseso vijjatevāti. Atha vā paropadesamantarena attano santāne accantaṃ avijjandhakāravigamassa
analyzed: visesaḥ vijjate iva ati atha vā para upadesam antarena attano santāne accantam

original: nipphāditattā (nibbattitattā ma. ni. ṭī. 1.1), tattha ca sabbaññutāya balesu ca vasībhāvassa
analyzed: nipphādita ttā nibbattita ttā ma ni ṭī tattha ca sabbaññu tāya balesu ca vasībhāvassa

original: samadhigatattā, parasantatiyañca dhammadesanātisayānubhāvena sammadeva tassa pavattitattā,
analyzed: samadhigata ttā para santatiyañca dhamma desanā atisaya anubhāvena sammat eva tassa pavattita ttā

original: bhagavāyeva visesato paññāpajjotavihatamohatamabhāvena thometabboti. Imasmiñca atthavikappe
analyzed: bhagavāya iva visesataḥ imasmin ca attha vikappe

original: paññāpajjotapadena sasantānagatamohavidhamanā paṭivedhapaññā ceva parasantānagatamohavidhamanā
analyzed: paññāpajjota padena sa santāna gata moha vidhamanā paṭivedha paññā ca iva para santāna gata moha vidhamanā

original: dhammaṃ bhāvetvā ceva yaṃ phalanibbānasaṅkhātaṃ dhammaṃ, pariyattidhammapaṭipattidhammehi
analyzed: dhammam bhāvetvā ca iva yam phala nibbāna saṅkhātam dhammam pariyatti dhamma paṭipatti dhammehi

original: vā saha phalanibbānabhūtaṃ dhammaṃ sacchikatvā ca sammāsambodhisaṅkhātaṃ buddhabhāvamupagato,
analyzed: vā saha phala nibbāna bhūtam dhammam sacchikatvā ca sammāsambodhi saṅkhātam buddha bhāvam upagataḥ

original: vītamalamanuttaraṃ taṃ dhammampi vandeti.
analyzed: vīta malam anuttaram tam dhammam pi vandeti

original: Tattha buddhasaddassa tāva “bujjhitā saccānīti buddho. Bodhetā pajāyāti buddho”tiādinā
analyzed: tattha buddha saddassa tāva bujjhitā saccāni iti buddhaḥ pajāyāti buddha uti ādinā

original: niddesanayena attho veditabbo. Atha vā aggamaggañāṇādhigamena savāsanāya sammohaniddāya
analyzed: niddesa nayena atthaḥ veditabbaḥ atha vā aggamagga ñāṇa adhigamena sa vāsanāya sammoha niddāya

original: accantavigamanato, aparimitaguṇagaṇālaṅkatasabbaññutaññāṇappattiyā vikasitabhāvato
analyzed: accanta vigamanataḥ aparimita guṇa gaṇa alaṅkata sabbaññuta ññāṇa ppattiyāḥ vikasita bhāvataḥ

original: ca buddhavāti buddho jāgaraṇavikasanatthavasena. Atha vā kassacipi ñeyyadhammassa
analyzed: ca buddhavāti buddhaḥ jāgaraṇa vikasana attha vasena atha vā kassaci pi ñeyya dhammassa

original: anavabuddhassa abhāvena ñeyyavisesassa kammabhāvāgahaṇato kammavacanicchāyābhāvena
analyzed: anavabuddhassa abhāvena ñeyya visesassa kamma bhāva āgahaṇato kamma vacanicchāyā abhāvena

original: avagamanatthavasena kattuniddesova labbhati, tasmā buddhavāti buddhotipi vattabbo.
analyzed: avagamana attha vasena kattu niddesaḥ uva labbhati tasmā buddhavā ati buddhaḥ ti pi vattabbaḥ

original: Padesaggahaṇe hi asati gahetabbassa nippadesatāva viññāyati yathā “dikkhito na dadātī”ti.
analyzed: padesa ggahaṇe hi asati gahetabbassa nippadesa tā ava viññāyati yathā dikkhitaḥ na dadāti iti

original: Evañca katvā kammavisesānapekkhā kattari eva buddhasaddasiddhi veditabbā, atthato
analyzed: evam ca katvā kamma visesa anapekkhā kattari eva buddha sadda siddhi veditabbā atthataḥ

original: pana pāramitāparibhāvito sayambhuñāṇena saha vāsanāya vihataviddhastaniravasesakilesomahākaruṇāsabbaññutaññāṇādiaparimeyyaguṇagaṇādhāro
analyzed: pana pāramitā paribhāvitaḥ sayambhu ñāṇena saha vāsanāya vihata viddhasta niravasesa kilesaḥ mahā karuṇā sabbaññuta ññāṇa ādi aparimeyya guṇa gaṇa ādhāraḥ

original: khandhasantāno buddho, yathāha –
analyzed: khandha santānaḥ buddhaḥ yathā āha

original: “Buddhoti yo so bhagavā sayambhū anācariyako pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṃ saccāni abhisambujjhi, tattha ca sabbaññutaṃ patto, balesu ca vasībhāva”nti.
analyzed: buddhaḥ ti yaḥ saḥ bhagavā sayambhu an ācariyako pubbe an anussutesu dhammesu sāmam saccāni abhisambujjhi tattha ca sabbaññu tam pattaḥ balesu ca vasībhāvanti

original: Apisaddo sambhāvane, tena evaṃ guṇavisesayutto sopi nāma bhagavā īdisaṃ dhammaṃ bhāvetvā,
analyzed: api saddaḥ sambhāvane tena evam guṇa visesa yuttaḥ saḥ api nāma bhagavā īdisam dhammam bhāvetvā

original: sacchikatvā ca buddhabhāvamupagato, kā nāma kathā aññesaṃ sāvakādibhāvamupagamaneti
analyzed: sacchikatvā ca buddha bhāvam upagataḥ kā nāma kathā aññesam sāvaka ādi bhāvam upagamanā iti

original: dhamme sambhāvanaṃ dīpeti. Buddhabhāvanti sammāsambodhiṃ. Yena hi nimittabhūtena
analyzed: dhamme sambhāvanam dīpeti buddha bhāvanti sammāsambodhim yena hi nimitta bhūtena

original: sabbaññutaññāṇapadaṭṭhānena aggamaggañāṇena, aggamaggañāṇapadaṭṭhānena ca sabbaññutaññāṇena
analyzed: sabbaññu taññāṇa padaṭṭhānena aggamagga ñāṇena aggamagga ñāṇa padaṭṭhānena ca sabbaññu taññāṇena

original: bhagavati “buddho”ti nāmaṃ, tadārammaṇañca ñāṇaṃ pavattati, tamevidha “bhāvo”ti vuccati.
analyzed: bhagavati buddhaḥ iti nāmam tad ārammaṇam ca ñāṇam pavattati bhāvaḥ ti vuccati

original: Bhavanti buddhisaddā etenāti hi bhāvo. Tathā hi vadanti –
analyzed: bhavanti buddhi saddāḥ etena ati hi bhāvo tathā hi vadanti

original: “Yena yena nimittena, buddhi saddo ca vattate;
analyzed: yena yena nimittena buddhi saddo ca vattate

original: Taṃtaṃnimittakaṃ bhāvapaccayehi udīrita”nti.
analyzed: tad tad nimittakam bhāva paccayehi udīritan ti

original: Bhāvetvāti uppādetvā, vaḍḍhetvā vā. Sacchikatvāti paccakkhaṃ katvā. Ceva-saddo ca-saddo
analyzed: bhāvetvā iti uppādetvā vaḍḍhetvā vā sacchikatvā iti paccakkham katvā ca iva saddo ca saddo

original: ca tadubhayattha samuccaye. Tena hi saddadvayena na kevalaṃ bhagavā dhammassa bhāvanāmattena
analyzed: ca samuccaye tena hi sadda dvayena na kevalam bhagavā dhammassa bhāvanā mattena

original: buddhabhāvamupagato, nāpi sacchikiriyāmattena, atha kho tadubhayenevāti samuccinoti.
analyzed: buddha bhāvam upagataḥ na api sacchikiriyā mattena atha kho tat ubhayena iva ati samuccinoti

original: Upagatoti patto, adhigatoti attho. Etassa “buddhabhāva”nti padena sambandho. Vītamalanti
analyzed: upagataḥ ti pattaḥ adhigataḥ iti atthaḥ etassa buddha bhāvanti padena sambandhaḥ vīta malanti

original: ettha virahavasena eti pavattatīti vīto, malato vīto, vītaṃ vā malaṃ yassāti vītamalo,
analyzed: ettha viraha vasena eti pavattati iti vītaḥ malataḥ vītaḥ vītam vā malam yassa ati vīta malaḥ

original: taṃ vītamalaṃ. “Gatamala”ntipi pāṭho dissati, evaṃ sati saupasaggo viya anupasaggopi
analyzed: tam vīta malam gata malam tipi pāṭhaḥ dissati evam sati sa upasaggaḥ viya anupasaggaḥ api

original: gatasaddo virahatthavācako veditabbo dhātūnamanekatthattā. Gacchati apagacchatīti
analyzed: gata saddaḥ viraha ttha vācakaḥ veditabbaḥ dhātūnam aneka attha ttā gacchati apagacchati iti

original: hi gato, dhammo. Gataṃ vā malaṃ, purimanayena samāso. Anuttaranti uttaravirahitaṃ.
analyzed: hi gataḥ dhammaḥ gatam vā malam purima nayena samāsaḥ uttara virahitam

original: Yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne apāyato, saṃsārato ca apatamāne katvā dhāretīti dhammo,
analyzed: yathānusiṭṭham paṭipajjamāne apāyataḥ saṃsārataḥ ca a patamāne katvā dhāreti iti dhammo

original: navavidho lokuttaradhammo. Tappakāsanattā, sacchikiriyāsammasanapariyāyassa ca labbhamānattā
analyzed: navavidhaḥ lokuttara dhammaḥ tad pakāsana ttā sacchikiriyā sammasana pariyāyassa ca labbhamāna ttā

original: pariyattidhammopi idha saṅgahito. Tathā hi “abhidhammanayasamuddaṃ adhigacchi, tīṇi
analyzed: pariyatti dhammo api idha saṅgahito tathā hi abhidhamma naya samuddam tīṇi

original: piṭakāni sammasī”ti ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ, tathā “yaṃ dhammaṃ bhāvetvā sacchikatvā”ti
analyzed: piṭakāni sammasi iti ca aṭṭhakathāyam vuttam tathā yam dhammam bhāvetvā sacchikatvā iti

original: ca vuttattā bhāvanāsacchikiriyāyogyatāya buddhakaradhammabhūtāhi pāramitāhi saha
analyzed: ca vutta ttā bhāvanā sacchikiriyā yogyatāya buddha kara dhamma bhūtāhi pāramitāhi saha

original: pubbabhāgaadhisīlasikkhādayopi idha saṅgahitāti veditabbā. Tāpi hi vigatapaṭipakkhatāya
analyzed: pubbabhāga adhisīla sikkhā ādayaḥ api idha saṅgahitā ati veditabbā tā api hi vigata paṭipakkha tāya

original: vītamalā, anaññasādhāraṇatāya anuttarā ca. Kathaṃ pana tā bhāvetvā, sacchikatvā ca
analyzed: vīta malāḥ anañña sādhāraṇa tāya anuttarā ca katham pana tāḥ bhāvetvā sacchikatvā ca

original: bhagavā buddhabhāvamupagatoti? Vuccate – sattānañhi saṃsāravaṭṭadukkhanissaraṇāya
analyzed: bhagavā buddha bhāvam upagataḥ iti vuccate sattānam hi saṃsāra vaṭṭa dukkha nissaraṇāya

original: [nissaraṇatthāya (paṇṇāsa ṭī.) nissaraṇe (katthaci)] katamahābhinīhāro mahākaruṇādhivāsanapesalajjhāsayo
analyzed: nissaraṇa atthāya nissaraṇe katthaci kata mahā abhinīhāraḥ mahā karuṇā adhivāsana pesala jjhāsayaḥ

original: paññāvisesapariyodātanimmalānaṃ dānadamasaññamādīnaṃ uttamadhammānaṃ kappānaṃ satasahassādhikāni
analyzed: paññā visesa pariyodāta nimmalānam dāna dama saññama ādīnam uttama dhammānam kappānam sata sahassa adhikāni

original: cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni sakkaccaṃ nirantaraṃ niravasesaṃ bhāvanāsacchikiriyāhi kammādīsu
analyzed: cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni sakkaccam nirantaram niravasesam bhāvanā sacchikiriyāhi kamma ādīsu

original: adhigatavasībhāvo acchariyācinteyyamahānubhāvo adhisīlādhicittānaṃ paramukkaṃsapāramippatto
analyzed: adhigata vasībhāvaḥ acchariya acinteyya mahā anubhāvaḥ adhi sīla adhicittānam param ukkaṃsa pārami patto

original: bhagavā paccayākāre catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassamukhena mahāvajirañāṇaṃ pesetvā anuttaraṃ
analyzed: bhagavā paccaya ākāre catuvīsati koṭi sata sahassa mukhena mahā vajira ñāṇam pesetvā anuttaram

original: sammāsambodhisaṅkhātaṃ buddhabhāvamupagatoti.
analyzed: sammāsambodhi saṅkhātam buddha bhāvam upagataḥ iti

original: Imāya pana gāthāya vijjāvimuttisampadādīhi anekehi guṇehi yathārahaṃ saddhammaṃ thometi.
analyzed: imāya pana gāthāya vijjā vimutti sampad ādīhi anekehi guṇehi yathāraham saddhammam thometi

original: Kathaṃ? Ettha hi “bhāvetvā”ti etena vijjāsampadāya thometi, “sacchikatvā”ti etena
analyzed: katham ettha hi bhāvetvā ati etena vijjā sampadāya thoma iti sacchikatvā ati etena

original: vimuttisampadāya. Tathā paṭhamena jhānasampadāya, dutiyena vimokkhasampadāya. Paṭhamena
analyzed: vimutti sampadāya tathā paṭhamena jhāna sampadāya dutiyena vimokkha sampadāya paṭhamena

original: vā samādhisampadāya, dutiyena samāpattisampadāya. Atha vā paṭhamena khayañāṇabhāvena,
analyzed: vā samādhi sampadāya dutiyena samāpatti sampadāya atha vā paṭhamena khaya ñāṇa bhāvena

original: dutiyena anuppādañāṇabhāvena. Paṭhamena vā vijjūpamatāya, dutiyena vajirūpamatāya.
analyzed: dutiyena anuppāda ñāṇa bhāvena paṭhamena vā vijju upamatāya dutiyena vajirūpamatāya

original: Paṭhamena vā virāgasampattiyā, dutiyena nirodhasampattiyā. Tathā paṭhamena niyyānabhāvena,
analyzed: paṭhamena vā virāga sampattiyā dutiyena nirodha sampattiyā tathā paṭhamena niyyāna bhāvena

original: dutiyena nissaraṇabhāvena. Paṭhamena vā hetubhāvena, dutiyena asaṅkhatabhāvena. Paṭhamena
analyzed: dutiyena nissaraṇa bhāvena paṭhamena vā hetu bhāvena dutiyena asaṅkhata bhāvena paṭhamena

original: vā dassanabhāvena, dutiyena vivekabhāvena. Paṭhamena vā adhipatibhāvena, dutiyena
analyzed: vā dassana bhāvena dutiyena viveka bhāvena paṭhamena vā adhipati bhāvena dutiyena

original: amatabhāvena dhammaṃ thometi. Atha vā “yaṃ dhammaṃ bhāvetvā buddhabhāvaṃ upagato”ti
analyzed: amata bhāvena dhammam thometi atha vā yam dhammam bhāvetvā buddha bhāvam upagataḥ iti

original: etena svākkhātatāya dhammaṃ thometi, “sacchikatvā”ti etena sandiṭṭhikatāya. Tathā
analyzed: etena su ākkhāta tāya dhammam thometi sacchikatvā iti etena sandiṭṭhika tāya tathā

original: paṭhamena akālikatāya, dutiyena ehipassikatāya. Paṭhamena vā opaneyyikatāya, dutiyena
analyzed: paṭhamena akālikatāya dutiyena ehipassikatāya paṭhamena vā opaneyyikatāya dutiyena

original: paccattaṃveditabbatāya. Paṭhamena vā saha pubbabhāgasīlādīhi sekkhehi sīlasamādhipaññākkhandhehi,
analyzed: paccattam veditabba tāya paṭhamena vā saha pubbabhāga sīla ādīhi sekkhehi sīla samādhi paññā kkhandhehi

original: dutiyena saha asaṅkhatadhātuyā asekkhehi dhammaṃ thometi.
analyzed: dutiyena saha asaṅkhata dhātuyā asekkhehi dhammam thometi

original: “Vītamala”nti iminā pana saṃkilesābhāvadīpanena visuddhatāya dhammaṃ thometi, “anuttara”nti
analyzed: iminā pana saṃkilesa abhāva dīpanena visuddha tāya dhammam thometi anuttaranti

original: etena aññassa visiṭṭhassa abhāvadīpanena paripuṇṇatāya. Paṭhamena vā pahānasampadāya,
analyzed: etena aññassa visiṭṭhassa abhāva dīpanena paripuṇṇa tāya paṭhamena vā pahāna sampadāya

original: dutiyena sabhāvasampadāya. Paṭhamena vā bhāvanāphalayogyatāya. Bhāvanāguṇena hi so
analyzed: dutiyena sa bhāva sampadāya paṭhamena vā bhāvanā phala yogyatāya bhāvanā guṇena hi saḥ

original: saṃkilesamalasamugghātako, tasmānena bhāvanākiriyāya phalamāha. Dutiyena sacchikiriyāphalayogyatāya.
analyzed: saṃkilesa mala samugghātakaḥ tasmā anena bhāvanā kiriyāya phalam āha dutiyena sacchi kiriyā phala yogyatāya

original: Taduttarikaraṇīyābhāvato hi anaññasādhāraṇatāya anuttarabhāvo sacchikiriyānibbattito,
analyzed: tad uttari karaṇīya abhāvataḥ hi anañña sādhāraṇa tāya anuttara bhāvaḥ sacchikiriyā nibbattito

original: tasmānena sacchikiriyāphalamāhāti.
analyzed: tasmāt anena sacchikiriyā phalam āha ati

original: Evaṃ saṅkhepeneva sabbasaddhammaguṇehi saddhammassāpi thomanāpubbaṅgamaṃ paṇāmaṃ
analyzed: evam saṅkhepena iva sabba saddhamma guṇehi saddhammassa api thomanā pubbaṅgamam paṇāmam

original: katvā idāni ariyasaṅghassāpi thomanāpubbaṅgamaṃ paṇāmaṃ karonto “sugatassa orasāna”ntiādimāha.
analyzed: katvā idāni ariya saṅghassa api thomanā pubbaṅgamam paṇāmam karontaḥ sugatassa orasānaṃ ti ādim āha

original: Tattha sugatassāti sambandhaniddeso, “puttāna”nti etena sambajjhitabbo. Urasi bhavā,
analyzed: tattha sugatassa ati sambandha niddesaḥ puttānan ti etena sambajjhitabbaḥ urasi bhavā

original: jātā, saṃvuddhā vā orasā, attajo khettajo antevāsiko dinnakoti catubbidhesu puttesu
analyzed: jātā saṃvuddhā vā orasā atta jaḥ khetta jaḥ antevāsikaḥ dinnakaḥ ti catubbidhesu puttesu

original: attajā, taṃsarikkhatāya pana ariyapuggalā “orasā”ti vuccanti. Yathā hi manussānaṃ
analyzed: atta jāḥ taṃsa rikkha tāya pana ariya puggalāḥ orasā ti vuccanti yathā hi manussānam

original: orasaputtā attajātatāya pitusantakassa dāyajjassa visesabhāgino honti, evametepi
analyzed: orasa puttāḥ atta jāta tāya pitu santakassa dāyajjassa visesa bhāginaḥ honti evam ete pi

original: saddhammasavanante ariyāya jātiyā jātatāya bhagavato santakassa vimuttisukhassa dhammaratanassa
analyzed: saddhamma savana ante ariyāya jātiyā jāta tāya bhagavato santakassa vimutti sukhassa dhamma ratanassa

original: ca dāyajjassa visesabhāginoti. Atha vā bhagavato dhammadesanānubhāvena ariyabhūmiṃ
analyzed: ca dāyajjassa visesa bhāginaḥ ti atha vā bhagavataḥ dhamma desanā anubhāvena ariya bhūmim

original: okkamamānā, okkantā ca ariyasāvakā bhagavato ure vāyāmajanitābhijātatāya sadisakappanamantarena
analyzed: okkamamānāḥ okkantā ca ariya sāvakāḥ bhagavataḥ ure vāyāma janita abhijāta tāya sadisa kappanam antarena

original: nippariyāyeneva “orasā”ti vattabbatamarahanti. Tathā hi te bhagavatā āsayānusayacariyādhimuttiādiolokanena,
analyzed: nippariyāyena iva orasā ati vattabba tam arahanti tathā hi te bhagavatā āsaya anusaya cariyā adhimutti ādi olokanena

original: vajjānucintanena ca hadaye katvā vajjato nivāretvā anavajje patiṭṭhāpentena sīlādidhammasarīraposanena
analyzed: vajja anucintanena ca hadaye katvā vajjataḥ nivāretvā anavajje patiṭṭhāpentena sīla ādi dhamma sarīra posanena

original: saṃvaḍḍhāpitā. Yathāha bhagavā itivuttake “ahamasmi bhikkhave brāhmaṇo…pe… tassa
analyzed: saṃvaḍḍhāpitā yathā āha bhagavā itivuttake aham asmi bhikkhave brāhmaṇa upe tassa

original: me tumhe puttā orasā mukhato jātā”tiādi. Nanu sāvakadesitāpi desanā ariyabhāvāvahāti?
analyzed: me tumhe puttāḥ orasāḥ mukhataḥ jātāḥ ati ādi nanu sāvaka desitā api desanā

original: Saccaṃ, sā pana tammūlikattā, lakkhaṇādivisesābhāvato ca “bhagavato dhammadesanā”
analyzed: saccam sā pana tammūlika ttā lakkhaṇa ādi visesa abhāvataḥ ca bhagavataḥ dhamma desanā

original: icceva saṅkhyaṃ gatā, tasmā bhagavato orasaputtabhāvoyeva tesaṃ vattabboti, etena
analyzed: iccā iva saṅkhyam gatā tasmā bhagavato etena

original: catubbidhesu puttesu ariyasaṅghassa attajaputtabhāvaṃ dasseti. Attano kulaṃ punenti
analyzed: catubbidhesu puttesu ariya saṅghassa atta ja putta bhāvam dasseti attanaḥ kulam punenti

original: sodhenti, mātāpitūnaṃ vā hadayaṃ pūrentīti puttā, attajādayo. Ariyā pana dhammatantivisodhanena,
analyzed: sodhenti mātā pitūnam vā hadayam pūrenti iti puttāḥ atta ja ādayaḥ ariyā pana dhamma tanti visodhanena

original: dhammānudhammapaṭipattiyā cittārādhanena ca tappaṭibhāgatāya bhagavato puttā nāma,
analyzed: dhamma anudhamma paṭipattiyā citta ārādhanena ca tad paṭibhāga tāya bhagavato puttāḥ nāma

original: tesaṃ. Tassa “samūha”nti padena sambandho.
analyzed: tesam tassa samūhanti padena sambandhaḥ

original: Saṃkilesanimittaṃ hutvā guṇaṃ māreti vibādhatīti māro, devaputtamāro. Sināti pare
analyzed: saṃkilesa nimittam hutvā guṇam māreti vibādhati iti māraḥ deva putta māraḥ sināti pare

original: bandhati etāyāti senā, mārassa senā tathā, mārañca mārasenañca mathenti vilothentīti
analyzed: bandhati senā mārassa senā tathā māram ca māra senañca mathenti vilothenti iti

original: mārasenamathanā, tesaṃ. “Māramārasenamathanāna”nti hi vattabbepi ekadesasarūpekasesavasena
analyzed: mārasena mathanā tesam māra māra sena mathanānam ti hi vattabbe pi ekadesa sarūpa ikasesa vasena

original: sambandho. Sā hi dhammasaṅgāhakattherehi paṭhamaṃ tīṇi piṭakāni saṅgāyitvā tassa

original: atthasaṃvaṇṇanānurūpeneva vācanāmaggaṃ āropitattā tisso saṅgītiyo āruḷhāyeva, tato
analyzed: attha saṃvaṇṇanā anurūpena iva vācanā maggam āropita ttā tissaḥ saṅgītiyaḥ āruḷhāya iva tatas

original: pacchā ca mahāmahindattherena tambapaṇṇidīpamābhatā, pacchā pana tambapaṇṇiyehi mahātherehi

original: “ṭhapitā”ti ca “apanetvā āropento”ti ca etehi padehi sambajjhitabbaṃ. Ekapadampi

original: hi āvuttiyādinayehi anekatthasambandhamupagacchati. Purimasambandhena cettha sīhaḷadīpavāsīnamatthāya

original: Brahmāno cassutālāpā, sambuddhā cāpi bhāsare”ti. –

original: Hitvā punappunabhatamatthanti ekattha vutampi puna aññattha ābhatamatthaṃ punaruttibhāvato, ganthagarukabhāvato ca cajitvā tassa āgamavarassa atthaṃ pakāsayissāmīti attho.

original: idaṃ pana “vipassanā, bhāvanā”ti padadvayassa visesanaṃ.

original: sobhātisayayogena ca visesato mānanīyatāya vimāna”nti vuttaṃ. Natthi agghametesanti

original: anagghāni, aparimāṇagghāni agghitumasakkuṇeyyānīti vuttaṃ hoti. Patirūpaṃ, paccekaṃ

original: vā attharitabbānīti paccattharaṇāni, tesaṃ satāni tathā. Uttarābhimukhanti uttaradisābhimukhaṃ.

original: Dhammopi satthāyeva satthukiccanipphādanatoti vuttaṃ “buddhassa bhagavato āsanārahaṃ
analyzed: dhammaḥ api satthāya iva satthu kicca nipphādanato ti vuttam buddhassa bhagavataḥ āsana arahaṃ

original: vā satthukiccāvahattā tathārūpe āsane nisīditumarahatīti dassetumpi evaṃ vuttaṃ.

original: Āsanārahanti nisīdanārahaṃ. Dhammāsananti dhammadesakāsanaṃ, dhammaṃ vā kathetuṃ

original: Idāni āyasmato ānandassa asekkhabhūmisamāpajjanaṃ dassento “tasmiñca panā”tiādimāha.

original: Apica visajananakapupphādigandhapaṭibhāgatāya nānāvidhadukkhahetukiriyājananako kilesova

analyzed: saṃvegaḥ nāma saha uttappam ñāṇam saḥ tassāḥ bhagavato dassane uppajji iti rajjumālā vimāna vaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttam

analyzed: yojetabbam ca saddena ubhayattham aññam aññam samucca iti kasmā vuccanti iti āha ettha

original: vuttaṃ. Niruttīti nibbacanaṃ, pañcavidhā vā niruttinayā. Tesampi hi saddaracanāvisesena
analyzed: vuttam nirutti iti nibbacanam pañcavidhā vā nirutti nayā tesam pi hi sadda racanā visesena

original: atthādhigamahetuto idha gahaṇaṃ yujjati. Pubbāparaṃ nāma pubbāparānusandhi, suttassa

analyzed: vā pubba bhāgena apara bhāgassa saṃsandanam bhagavatā ca pañcavidha etad agga ṭṭhānena

original: dhammasenāpatinā ca pañcavidhakosallena pasaṭṭhabhāvānurūpanti sambandho. Dhāraṇabalanti

original: hoti. Dassento hutvā, dassanahetūtipi attho. Tañca kho atthato vā byañjanato vā anūnamanadhikanti
analyzed: hoti dassentaḥ hutvā dassana hetu utipi attho tat ca kho atthataḥ vā byañjanataḥ vā anūnam anadhikanti

original: avadhāraṇaphalamāha. Na aññathā daṭṭhabbanti pana nivattetabbatthaṃ. Na aññathāti

original: ca bhagavato sammukhā sutākārato na aññathā, na pana bhagavatā desitākārato. Acinteyyānubhāvā

original: sutākārāvirujjhanavasena dhāraṇassa adhippetattā, aññathā bhagavatā desitākāreneva

original: purimatthavasena ca asamatthoti āpajjeyyāti.

original: “Yo paro na hoti, so attā”ti vuttāya niyakajjhattasaṅkhātāya santatiyā pavattanako

analyzed: tividhaḥ pi mesaddo tasmā kiñca api niyaka jjhatta santati vasena ekasmin yevatthe mesaddo

original: dissati, tathāpi karaṇasampadānasāminiddesavasena vijjamānavibhattibhedaṃ sandhāya
analyzed: dissati tathā api karaṇa sampadāna sāmi niddesa vasena vijjamāna vibhatti bhedam sandhāya

original: vuttaṃ “tīsu atthesu dissatī”ti, tīsu vibhattiyatthesu attanā saññuttavibhattito
analyzed: vuttam tīsu atthesu dissati iti tīsu vibhattiya tthesu attanā

original: dissatīti attho. Gāthābhigītanti gāthāya abhigītaṃ abhimukhaṃ gāyitaṃ. Abhojaneyyanti
analyzed: dissati iti atthaḥ gāthā abhigītam ti gāthāya abhigītam abhimukham gāyitam abhojaneyyam ti

analyzed: bhojanam abhigīta padassa mayā iti atthaḥ evam sesesu pi

original: yathārahaṃ. Sutasaddassa kammabhāvasādhanavasena dvādhippāyikapadattā yathāyogaṃ

analyzed: mayā sutanti ca mama sutanti ca attha dvaye yujjati

analyzed: kiñca api upasaggo kiriyam viseseti jotaka matta bhāvato pana tasmin

original: na virujjhatīti āha “saupasaggo ca anupasaggo cā”ti. Assāti sutasaddassa. Upasaggavasenapi

original: dhātusaddo visesatthavācako yathā “anubhavati parābhavatī”ti vuttaṃ “gacchantoti
analyzed: dhātu saddaḥ visesa attha vācakaḥ yathā anubhavati parābhavati iti vuttam gacchantaḥ iti

original: attho”ti. Tathā anupasaggopi dhātusaddo saupasaggo viya visesatthavācakoti āha “vissutadhammassāti
analyzed: atthaḥ iti tathā anupasaggaḥ api dhātu saddo saupasaggaḥ viya visesa attha vācakaḥ ti āha vissuta dhammassa ati

original: attho”ti. Evamīdisesu. Sotaviññeyyanti sotadvāranissitena viññāṇena viññātabbaṃ,
analyzed: atthaḥ ti evamīdisesu sota viññeyyanti sota dvāra nissitena viññāṇena viññātabbam

original: sotadvārānusārena manoviññāṇena viññātadhammadharo. Na hi sotadvāranissitaviññāṇamattena

analyzed: vuttaḥ tasmā sambhavati iti evam vuttam kamma bhāva sādhanāni suta sadde

analyzed: upapanna tā anupapanna tā ca viññāyati tasmā suta saddassa iva vasena ayam atthaḥ upapannaḥ

original: anupapanno”ti vā na viññātabboti codanāya pubbāparapadasambandhavasena etadatthassa
analyzed: anupapannaḥ ti vā na viññātabbaḥ ti codanāya pubba apara pada sambandha vasena etad atthassa

analyzed: tadā iti vuttam hoti mama ati atthe sati iti sambandhīya tthe sāmi niddesa vasena mama ati

analyzed: atthe vattabbe sati yadā sambandha vasena sāmi niddeso tadā iti vuttam hoti

analyzed: suta sadda sannidhāne payuttena evaṃsaddena savana kiriyā jotakena iva bhavitabbam vijjamāna atthassa

original: jotakamattattā nipātānanti vuttaṃ “evanti sotaviññāṇādiviññāṇakiccanidassana”nti.

analyzed: savanāya eva hi ākāraḥ nidassanam avadhāraṇam pi tasmā yathā vuttaḥ evaṃsaddassa

original: tividhopi attho savanakiriyājotakabhāvena idhādhippetoti. Ādi-saddena cettha sampaṭicchanādīnaṃ
analyzed: tividhaḥ api attho savana kiriyā jotaka bhāvena idha adhippeto ti ādi saddena ca ittha sampaṭicchanā ādīnam

analyzed: dasseti yathā pana yam sutam sutam eva ati niyametabbam tathā ca tam sutam sammā sutam

analyzed: atha vā sadda antara ttha apohana vasena saddo attham vadati tasmā etassa a sutam

original: dassana”nti. Hoti cettha –
analyzed: dassananti hoti ca ittha

original: “Evādisattiyā ceva, aññatthāpohanena ca;

original: Tena hi sotadvārikaviññāṇavīthi nivattati. Nānappakārenāti vakkhamānena anekavihitena

analyzed: dhamma ppakāsanam ti vuttam na pana suta saddassa dhamma attham tena vuttam ayaṃ

original: dhammo suto”ti. Tassā hi viññāṇavīthiyā ārammaṇameva “ayaṃ dhammo suto”ti vuccati.

original: Tañca niyamiyamānaṃ yathāvuttāya viññāṇavīthiyā ārammaṇabhūtaṃ suttameva. Ayañhetthātiādi
analyzed: tat ca niyamiyamānam yathā vuttāya viññāṇa vīthiyā ārammaṇa bhūtam suttam eva ayam hi itthā tiādi

analyzed: vuttassa iva atthassa pākaṭīkaraṇam tad pākaṭīkaraṇa atthaḥ ha ittha hi saddaḥ viññāṇa vīthiyā

original: karaṇabhūtāya mayā na aññaṃ kataṃ, idaṃ pana ārammaṇaṃ kataṃ. Kiṃ pana tanti ce?

original: Ayaṃ dhammo sutoti. Ayaṃ panetthādhippāyo – ākāratthe evaṃ-sadde “ekenākārenā”ti
analyzed: ayam dhammo suto ti ayam pana itthā adhippāyaḥ ākāra atthe evaṃsadde ekena ākārena ati

original: karaṇakattukammaviseso imissā yojanāya dassito.

original: viññāṇappabandhe puggalavohāroti vuttaṃ “puggalakiccappakāsana”nti. Sādhāraṇaviññāṇappabandho

analyzed: vuttesu chasu paññatti bhedesu evam ti ādīnam paññattīnam sarūpam niddhārentaḥ tathā iti ādim āha

original: Upādāpaññatti ādayo hi porāṇaṭṭhakathāto muttā saṅgahakāreneva ācariyena vuttā. Vitthāro

analyzed: abhidhamma ṭṭhakathāya gahetabbo tam tan ti tam tam dhamma jātam sota patham āgate dhamme

analyzed: kāraṇam katvā paññatti upādā paññatti yathā tāni tāni aṅgāni upādāya rathaḥ geham

original: Paññapetabbaṭṭhena cesā paññatti nāma, na paññāpanaṭṭhena. Yā pana tassa atthassa
analyzed: paññapetabba ṭṭhena ca isā paññatti nāma na paññāpana ṭṭhena yā pana tassa atthassa

original: tabbahulūpanidhātabbisiṭṭhūpanidhā”tiādinā. Tāsu ayaṃ “dutiyaṃ tatiya”ntiādikā viya
analyzed: tad bahulūpanidhā tad bisiṭṭhūpanidhā ti ādinā tāsu ayam dutiyam tatiya nti ādikāḥ

analyzed: evam paññattiyā api attha adhigamanīya tā saṅkhātam dassetabba attham dassetvā idāni sadda sāmatthiyena

analyzed: hoti iti pakāsitaḥ ayam atthaḥ tasmā tathā suta saddena pakāsitā attanā paṭividdha suttassa

analyzed: pakāra visesāḥ evanti therena tena evaṃsaddena asammohaḥ dīpitaḥ nāma

original: tenāha “evanti vacanena asammohaṃ dīpetī”ti. Asammohanti ca yathāsute sutte asammohaṃ.
analyzed: tena āha evam iti vacanena asammoham dīpeti iti asammohanti ca yathā sute sutte asammoham

original: Tadeva yuttiyā, byatirekena ca samatthehi “na hī”tiādinā vakkhamānañca suttaṃ nānappakāraṃ
analyzed: tat eva yuttiyāḥ byatirekena ca samatthehi na hi iti ādinā vakkhamānam ca suttam nānappakāram

analyzed: duppaṭividdham ca evam nānā pakāre duppaṭividdhe sutte katham sammūḷhaḥ nānā pakāra paṭivedha samatthaḥ

analyzed: bhavissati imāya yuttiyā iminā ca byatirekena therassa tattha asammūḷha bhāva saṅkhāto

original: dīpetabbo attho viññāyatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Evamīdisesu yathārahaṃ. Bhagavato sammukhā
analyzed: dīpetabbaḥ atthaḥ viññāyati iti vuttam hoti evam īdisesu yathāraham bhagavataḥ sammukhā

original: sutākārassa yāthāvato upari therena dassiyamānattā “suttassa asammosaṃ dīpetī”ti
analyzed: suta ākārassa yāthāvataḥ upari therena dassiyamāna ttā suttassa asammosam dīpeti iti

original: vuttaṃ. Kālantarenāti sutakālato aparena kālena. Yassa…pe… paṭijānāti, therassa pana

original: suvaṇṇabhājane pakkhittasīhavasā viya anassamānaṃ asammuṭṭhaṃ tiṭṭhati, tasmā so

analyzed: evam paṭijānāti iti vuttam hoti evam dīpitena pana atthena kim pakāsitanti āha iccassa atiādi

original: Tattha iccassāti iti assa, tasmā asammohassa, asammosassa ca dīpitattā assa therassapaññāsiddhītiādinā
analyzed: tattha iti assa tasmai asammohassa asammosassa ca dīpita ttā assa therassa paññā siddhi iti ādinā

original: sambandho. Asammohenāti sammohābhāvena. Paññāvajjitasamādhiādidhammajātena taṃsampayuttāya
analyzed: sambandhaḥ asammohena ati sammoha abhāvena paññā vajjita samādhi ādi dhamma jātena tad sampayuttāya

analyzed: paññāya siddhi sahajāta ādi sattiyā sijjhanato sammoha paṭipakkhena vā paññā saṅkhātena

original: dhammajātena. Savanakālasambhūtāya hi paññāya taduttarikālapaññāsiddhi upanissayādikoṭiyā
analyzed: dhamma jātena savana kāla sambhūtāya hi paññāya tad uttari kāla paññā siddhi upanissaya ādi koṭiyā

original: sijjhanato. Itaratthāpi yathārahaṃ nayo netabbo.
analyzed: sijjhanataḥ itarattha api yathāraham nayaḥ netabbo

original: Evaṃ pakāsitena pana atthena kiṃ vibhāvitanti āha “tatthā”tiādi. Tatthāti tesu dubbidhesu
analyzed: evam pakāsitena pana atthena kim vibhāvitanti āha tattha atiādi tattha ati tesu dubbidhesu

analyzed: dhammesu byañjanānam paṭivijjhitabbaḥ ākāraḥ na ati gambhīraḥ yathā suta dhāraṇam eva tattha

original: karaṇīyaṃ, tasmā tattha satiyā byāpāro adhiko, paññā pana guṇībhūtāti vuttaṃ “paññāpubbaṅgamāyā”tiādi.
analyzed: karaṇīyam tasmā tattha satiyā byāpāraḥ adhikaḥ paññā pana guṇībhūtā iti vuttam paññā pubbaṅgamāya itiādi

analyzed: paññāya pubbaṅgamā paññā pubbaṅgamā ti hi nibbacanam pubbaṅgama tā ca ittha padhāna bhāvaḥ

analyzed: manaḥ pubbaṅgamāḥ dhammā ti ādīsu viya api ca yathā cakkhu viññāṇa ādīsu āvajjana ādayaḥ pubbaṅgamā

original: samānāpi tadārammaṇassa avijānanato appadhānabhūtā, evaṃ pubbaṅgamāyapi appadhānatte
analyzed: samānā api tad ārammaṇassa avijānanataḥ appadhāna bhūtā evam pubbaṅgamāya api appadhāna tte

original: sati paññāpubbaṅgamā etissāti nibbacanampi yujjati. Pubbaṅgamatā cettha purecāribhāvo.
analyzed: sati paññā pubbaṅgamā etissa ati nibbacanam pi yujjati pubbaṅgama tā ca ittha purecāri bhāvaḥ

original: Iti sahajātapubbaṅgamo purejātapubbaṅgamoti duvidhopi pubbaṅgamo idha sambhavati,
analyzed: iti sahajāta pubbaṅgamo purejāta pubbaṅgamo ti duvidhaḥ api pubbaṅgamaḥ idha sambhavati

original: yathā cettha, evaṃ sati “pubbaṅgamāyā”ti etthāpi yathāsambhavamesa nayo veditabbo.
analyzed: yathā ca ittha evam sati pubbaṅgam āyāti ettha api yathāsambhavam esa nayaḥ veditabbaḥ

original: Evaṃ vibhāvitena samatthatāvacanena kimanubhāvitanti āha “tadubhayasamatthatāyogenā”tiādi.
analyzed: evam vibhāvitena samattha tā vacanena kim anubhāvitan ti āha tad ubhaya samattha tā yogena atiādi

original: Tattha atthabyañjanasampannassāti atthabyañjanena paripuṇṇassa, saṅkāsanādīhi vā

original: vā rasena sādurasassa. Pariyattidhammoyeva navalokuttararatanasannidhānato sattavidhassa,

original: viyāti bhaṇḍāgāriko, dhammassa anurakkhako bhaṇḍāgārikoti tameva sadisatākāraṇadassanena
analyzed: viyāti bhaṇḍāgārikaḥ dhammassa anurakkhakaḥ bhaṇḍāgārikaḥ ti tam eva sadisa tā kāraṇa dassanena

original: “Bahussuto dhammadharo, sabbapāṭhī ca sāsane;
analyzed: bahu ssutaḥ dhamma dharaḥ sabba pāṭhī ca sāsane

analyzed: ānandaḥ nāma nāmena dhamma ārakkhaḥ tavam muni iti

original: Aññathāpi dīpetabbamatthaṃ dīpeti “aparo nayo”tiādinā, evaṃ saddena vuccamānānaṃ
analyzed: aññathā api dīpetabbam attham dīpeti aparaḥ naya uti ādinā evam saddena vuccamānānam

analyzed: yonisaḥ manasikārassa dīpanam yuttanti vuttam yonipe dīpeti iti ayoniso ti ādinā

analyzed: byatirekena ñāpaka hetu dassanam tattha katthaci hi saddaḥ dissati saḥ kāraṇe kasmā iti

analyzed: attho iminā vacanena iva yonisas manasikarotaḥ nānā pakāra paṭivedha sambhavataḥ aggi viya

analyzed: dhūmena kāriyena kāraṇa bhūto so viññāyati iti tad anvayam pi atthāpattiyā dasseti esa

analyzed: vikkhitta cittassa ati ādinā byatireka kāraṇena ñāpaka hetum dassetvā tat eva samatthā iti

analyzed: tathā hi itiādinā sabba sampattiyā ti sabbena attha byañjana desaka payojana ādinā sampattiyā

original: Kiṃ iminā pakāsitanti āha “yoniso manasikārena cetthā”tiādi. Etthāti etasmiṃ dhammadvaye.

analyzed: phala bhūtassa saddhamma ssavanassa siddhiyāḥ eva samatthanam vuttam avikkhepena pana

analyzed: sappurisa upanissayassa siddhiyā samatthanam na vuttam kasmā iti ce vikkhitta cittānam

original: sappurise payirupāsanābhāvassa atthato siddhattā. Atthavaseneva hi so pākaṭoti na vutto.
analyzed: sappurise atthataḥ siddha ttā attha vasena iva hi so pākaṭaḥ ti na vutto

original: Etthāha – yathā yoniso manasikārena phalabhūtena attasammāpaṇidhipubbekatapuññatānaṃ
analyzed: ettha āha yathā yonisas manasikārena phala bhūtena atta sammāpaṇidhi pubbekata puñña tānam

analyzed: kāraṇa bhūtānam siddhi vattabbā siyā assutavataḥ sappurisa upanissaya virahitassa ca

analyzed: vuttā ayam pana itthā adhippāyaḥ saddhamma ssavana sappurisa upanissayāḥ na ekantena avikkhepassa

analyzed: kāraṇam bāhira kāraṇa ttā avikkhepaḥ pana sappurisa upanissayaḥ viya saddhamma ssavanassa

analyzed: ekanta kāraṇam ajjhattika kāraṇa ttā tasmai ekanta kāraṇe honte kim atthiyāḥ anekanta kāraṇam

original: pati phalabhāvaparikappanāti tathāyevetassa siddhi vuttāti. Ettha ca paṭhamaṃ phalena
analyzed: pati phala bhāva parikappanā ti tathāya iva etassa siddhi vuttā ati ettha ca paṭhamam phalena

original: kāraṇassa siddhidassanaṃ nadīpūrena viya upari vuṭṭhisabbhāvassa, dutiyaṃ kāraṇena
analyzed: kāraṇassa siddhi dassanam nadīpūrena viya upari vuṭṭhi sabbhāvassa dutiyam kāraṇena

original: phalassa siddhidassanaṃ ekantavassinā viya meghavuṭṭhānena vuṭṭhipavattiyā.

original: “Aparo nayo”tiādinā aññathāpi dīpetabbatthamāha, yasmā na hotīti sambandho. Evanti…pe…

analyzed: tesu pi samayesu iti karuṇā kicca para hita paṭipatti dhammi kathā desanā samayesu pi aññataram

original: Aññattha viya bhummavacanena ca karaṇavacanena ca niddesamakatvā idha upayogavacanena

original: gaṇabhojanasikkhāpadādīsu addhānagamanasamayasaddassa padabhājanīyabhūte vibhaṅge.

original: Aḍḍhayojanampi addhānamaggo, pageva taduttari. Aḍḍhameva yojanassa aḍḍhayojanaṃ,
analyzed: aḍḍha yojanam pi addhāna maggaḥ pagā iva tad uttari aḍḍham eva yojanassa aḍḍha yojanam

original: dvigāvutamattaṃ. Idha pana catugāvutappamāṇaṃ yojanameva, tasmā “addhānamaggapaṭipanno”ti vadatīti adhippāyo.

original: Mahantasaddo uttamattho, bahvattho ca idhādhippetoti āha “mahatā”tiādi. Guṇamahattenāti
analyzed: mahanta saddo uttama atthaḥ bahu atthaḥ ca idha adhippetaḥ iti āha mahatā atiādi guṇa mahattena ati

original: appicchatādiguṇamahantabhāvena. Saṅkhyāmahattenāti gaṇanamahantabhāvena. Tadevatthaṃ

original: samattheti “so hī”tiādinā. So bhikkhusaṅghoti idha āgato tadā parivārabhūto bhikkhusaṅgho.

original: Mahāti uttamo. Vākyepi hi tamicchanti payogavasā. Appicchatāti nillobhatā saddo cettha
analyzed: mahā ati uttamaḥ vākye pi hi tam icchanti payoga vasāḥ ca ittha

original: sāvaseso, attho pana niravaseso. Na hi “appalobhatāti abhitthavitumarahatī”ti aṭṭhakathāsu
analyzed: sa avasesaḥ attho pana niravasesaḥ na hi appalobha tā ati abhitthavitum arahati iti aṭṭhakathāsu

analyzed: manasi katvā byañjanam sa avasesam viya ati aṭṭhakathāyam vuttam appasaddo pana ittha

original: mahāti gaṇanāyapi bahu ahosi, “bhikkhusaṅgho”ti padāvatthikantavacanavasena saṃvaṇṇetabbapadassa

original: dasseti. Rājāgārakaṃ nāma vessavaṇamahārājassa devāyatananti eke.
analyzed: dasseti rājāgārakam nāma vessavaṇa mahā rājassa devāyatanan ti eke

original: Bahuparissayoti bahupaddavo. Kehīti vuttaṃ “core’hipī”tiādi. Handāti vacanavossaggatthe
analyzed: bahu parissayo ti bahu paddavaḥ kehi iti vuttam corehi pi itiādi handa ati vacana vossagga atthe

original: nipāto, tadānubhāvato nipparissayatthāya idāni upagantvā sve gamissāmīti adhippāyo.
analyzed: nipātaḥ tadā anubhāvataḥ nipparissaya tthāya idāni upagantvā sve gamissāmi iti adhippāyaḥ

original: “Saddhiṃ antevāsinā brahmadattena māṇavenā” ticceva sīhaḷaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ, tañca
analyzed: saddhim antevāsinā brahmadattena māṇavena ticca iva sīhaḷaṭṭhakathāyam vuttam tat ca

original: kho pāḷiāruḷhavaseneva, na pana tadā suppiyassa parisāya abhāvatoti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ

original: “saddhiṃ attano parisāyā”ti idha vuttaṃ. Kasmā panettha brahmadattoyeva pāḷiyamāruḷho,
analyzed: saddhim attano parisāya iti idha vuttam kasmā pana ittha

original: na pana tadavasesā suppiyassa parisāti? Desanānadhīnabhāvena payojanābhāvato. Yathā
analyzed: na pana tad avasesā suppiyassa parisā ati desanā anadhīna bhāvena payojana abhāvataḥ yathā

original: cetaṃ, evaṃ aññampi edisaṃ payojanābhāvato saṅgītikārakehi na saṅgītanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: evam aññam pi edisam payojana abhāvato saṅgīti kārakehi na saṅgītan ti daṭṭhabbam

original: Keci pana “pāḷiyaṃ vutta”nti ādhāraṃ vatvā ‘tadetaṃ na sīhaḷaṭṭhakathānayadassanaṃ,
analyzed: keci pana pāḷiyam vuttanti ādhāram vatvā tat etam na sīhaḷaṭṭhakathā naya dassanam

original: pāḷiyaṃ vuttabhāvadassanamevā’ti” vadanti, taṃ na yujjati. Pāḷiāruḷhavaseneva pāḷiyaṃ
analyzed: pāḷiyam vutta bhāva dassanam evā ti vadanti tam na yujjati pāḷi āruḷha vasena iva pāḷiyam

original: vuttanti adhippetatthassa āpajjanato. Tasmā yathāvuttanayeneva attho gahetabboti.

original: “Vuttanti vā amhehipi idha vattabbanti attho. Evañhi tadā aññāyapi parisāya vijjamānabhāvadassanatthaṃ
analyzed: vuttanti vā amhehi pi idha vattabbanti attho evam hi tadā parisāya vijjamāna bhāva dassana ttham

original: evaṃ vuttaṃ, pāḷiyamāruḷhavasena pana aññathāpi idha vattabbanti adhippāyo yutto”ti vadanti.
analyzed: evam vuttam pāḷiyam āruḷha vasena pana aññathā api idha vattabbanti adhippāyaḥ yutto ti vadanti

original: Idāni “tatrāpi suda”ntiādipāḷiyā sambandhaṃ dassetuṃ “evaṃ vāsaṃ upagato panā”tiādi

original: vuttaṃ. Parivāretvā nisinno hotīti sambandho. Kucchitaṃ kattabbanti kukataṃ, tassa
analyzed: vuttam parivāretvā nisinnaḥ hoti iti sambandho kucchitam kattabbanti kukatam tassa

original: bhāvo kukkuccaṃ, kucchitakiriyā, ito cito ca cañcalananti attho, hatthassa kukkuccaṃ

original: tathā. “Sā hī”tiādinā tathābhūtatāya kāraṇaṃ dasseti. Nivāteti vātavirahitaṭṭhāne.
analyzed: tathā sā hi iti ādinā tathābhūta tāya kāraṇam dasseti nivātā iti vāta virahita ṭṭhāne

original: Yathāvuttadosābhāvena niccalā. Taṃ vibhūtinti tādisaṃ sobhaṃ. Vippalapantīti sativossaggavasena
analyzed: yathā vutta dosa abhāvena niccalā tam tādisam sobham vippalapanti iti sati vossagga vasena

original: vividhā lapanti. Nillālitajivhāti ito cito ca nikkhantajivhā. Kākacchamānāti kākānaṃ
analyzed: vividhāḥ lapanti nillālita jivhā ati itas citas ca nikkhanta jivhā kākacchamānā ati kākānam

original: saddasadisaṃ saddaṃ kurumānā. Gharugharupassāsinoti gharugharuiti saddaṃ janetvā

original: passasantā. Issāvasenāti yathāvuttehi dvīhi kāraṇehi usūyanavasena. “Sabbaṃ vattabba”nti
analyzed: passasantā issā vasena ati yathā vuttehi dvīhi kāraṇehi usūyana vasena sabbam vattabbanti

original: iminā “ādipeyyālanayoya”nti dasseti.
analyzed: iminā dasseti

original: 3. Sammā pahonti taṃ taṃ kammanti sampahulā, bahavo, tenāha “bahukāna”nti. Sabbantimena
analyzed: sammā pahonti tam tam kammanti sampahulāḥ bahavaḥ tena āha bahu kānanti

original: paricchedena catuvaggasaṅgheneva vinayakammassa kattabbattā “vinayapariyāyenā”tiādi
analyzed: paricchedena catu vagga saṅghena iva vinaya kammassa kattabbattā vinaya pariyāyena atiādi

original: vuttaṃ. Tayo janāti cesa upalakkhaṇaniddeso dvinnampi sampahulattā. Tattha tattha
analyzed: vuttam tayaḥ ca isaḥ upalakkhaṇa niddeso dvinnam pi sampahula ttā tattha tattha

original: tathāyevāgatattā “suttantapariyāyenā”tiādimāha. Taṃ taṃ pāḷiyā āgatavohāravasena
analyzed: suttanta pariyāyena ati ādim āha tam tam pāḷiyā āgata vohāra vasena

original: hi ayaṃ bhedo. Tayo janā tayo eva nāma, tato paṭṭhāya uttari catupañcajanādikā sampahulāti
analyzed: hi ayam bhedo eva nāma tatas paṭṭhāya uttari catu pañca jana ādikā

original: attho. Tatoti cāyaṃ mariyādāvadhi. Maṇḍalamāḷoti anekatthapavattā samaññā, idha pana

original: īdisāya evāti niyamento āha “katthacī”tiādi. Kaṇṇikā vuccati kūṭaṃ. Haṃsavaṭṭakacchannenāti
analyzed: īdisāya eva ati niyamentaḥ āha katthaci itiādi kaṇṇikā vuccati kūṭam haṃsa vaṭṭaka channena ati

original: haṃsamaṇḍalākārachannena. Tadeva channaṃ aññattha “supaṇṇavaṅkacchadana”nti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: haṃsa maṇḍala ākāra channena tat eva channam aññattha su paṇṇa vaṅka chadanam ti vuttam

original: Kūṭena yutto agāro, soyeva sālāti kūṭāgārasālā. Thambhapantiṃ parikkhipitvāti thambhamālaṃ
analyzed: kūṭena yuttaḥ agāraḥ saḥ yā iva sālā ati kūṭāgāra sālā thambha pantim parikkhipitvā ati thambha mālam

original: parivāretvā, parimaṇḍalākārena thambhapantiṃ katvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Upaṭṭhānasālā nāma
analyzed: parivāretvā parimaṇḍala ākārena thambha pantim katvā iti vuttam hoti upaṭṭhānasālā nāma

original: payirupāsanasālā. Yattha upaṭṭhānamattaṃ karonti, na ekarattadirattādivasena nisīdanaṃ,
analyzed: upaṭṭhāna mattam karonti na nisīdanam

original: idha pana tathā katā nisīdanasālāyevāti dasseti “idha panā”tiādinā. Teneva pāḷiyaṃ

original: “sannipatitāna” ntveva avatvā “sannisinnāna”ntipi vuttaṃ. Mānitabboti māḷo, mīyati

original: pamīyatīti vā māḷo. Maṇḍalākārena paṭicchanno māḷoti maṇḍalamāḷo, anekakoṇavanto

original: paṭissayaviseso. “Sannisinnāna”nti nisajjanavasena vuttaṃ, nisajjanavasena vā “sannisinnāna”nti

original: saṃvaṇṇetabbapadamajjhāharitvā sambandho. Iminā nisīdanairiyāpathaṃ, kāyasāmaggīvasena

original: ca samodhānaṃ sandhāya padadvayametaṃ vuttanti dasseti. Saṅkhiyā vuccati kathā sammā

original: khiyanato kathanato. Kathādhammoti kathāsabhāvo, upaparikkhā vidhīti keci.
analyzed: khiyanataḥ kathanataḥ kathā dhammo ti kathā sabhāvaḥ upaparikkhā vidhi iti keci

original: “Acchariya”ntiādi tassa rūpadassananti āha “katamo pana so”tiādi. Soti kathādhammo.
analyzed: tassa rūpa dassananti āha katamaḥ pana saḥ tiādi saḥ ti kathā dhammo

original: “Nīyatīti nayo, attho, saddasatthaṃ anugato nayo saddanayo”ti ācariyadhammapālattherena
analyzed: nīyati iti nayaḥ attho sadda sattham anugataḥ nayaḥ sadda nayo ti ācariya dhammapāla ttherena

original: saddanayo. Tattha hi anabhiṇhavuttike acchariya-saddo icchito ruḷhivasena. Tenevāha
analyzed: tattha hi an abhiṇhavuttike acchariya saddaḥ icchitaḥ ruḷhi vasena tena iva āha

original: evamidampi. Accharāyoggaṃ acchariyaṃ niruttinayena yoggasaddassa lopato, taddhitavasena

analyzed: vā ṇiya paccayassa vicitra vuttitaḥ saḥ pana porāṇa ṭṭhakathā ayam eva āgata ttā aṭṭhakathā anayā iti

original: vutto. Pubbe abhūtanti abhūtapubbaṃ, etena na bhūtaṃ abhūtanti nibbacanaṃ, bhūta-saddassa

original: etassa ca “suppaṭividitā”ti etena sambandho. Yāva cayattakaṃ idaṃ ayaṃ nānādhimuttikatā

analyzed: su paṭividitā tam ettakam evā ti na sakkā amhehi paṭivijjhitum akkhātum ca ati sa pāṭha sesa tthaḥ

original: Tenevāha “tena suppaṭividitatāya appameyyataṃ dassetī”ti.

original: aggamaggañāṇaṃ. Tadubhayañhi sammā aviparītaṃ sayameva bujjhati, sammā vā pasaṭṭhā

original: jānatā sabbaññutānāvaraṇañāṇehi passatāti attho.

original: Dutiyaṃ vijjattayavasena. Pubbenivāsādīhīti pubbenivāsāsavakkhayañāṇehi. Tatiyaṃ
analyzed: dutiyam vijjattaya vasena pubbenivāsa ādīhi iti pubbenivāsa āsava kkhaya ñāṇehi tatiyam

analyzed: paññāyāti sabbaññuta ññāṇena kuṭṭassa bhittiyā tiras param antar vā tad ādīsu gatāni

original: Ativisuddhenāti ativiya visuddhena pañcavaṇṇasamannāgatena sunīlapāsādikaakkhilomasamalaṅkatena
analyzed: ati visuddhena ati visuddhena pañca vaṇṇa samannāgatena su nīla pāsādika akkhiloma samalaṅkatena

original: rattiñceva divā ca samantā yojanaṃ passantena maṃsacakkhunā. Pañcamaṃ paṭivedhadesanāñāṇavasena.

original: “Attahitasādhikāyā”ti ekaṃsato vuttaṃ, pariyāyato panesā parahitasādhikāpi hoti.

original: Tāya hi dhammasabhāvapaṭicchādakakilesasamugghātāya desanāñāṇādi sambhavati. Paṭivedhapaññāyāti

original: ariyamaggapaññāya. Vipassanāsahagato samādhi padaṭṭhānaṃ āsannakāraṇametissāti samādhipadaṭṭhānā,
analyzed: ariya magga paññāya vipassanā sahagataḥ samādhi padaṭṭhānam āsanna kāraṇam etissa ati samādhi padaṭṭhānā

original: tāya. Desanāpaññāyāti desanākiccanipphādakena sabbaññutaññāṇena. Arīnanti kilesārīnaṃ,
analyzed: tāya desanā paññāya ati desanā kicca nipphādakena sabbaññuta ññāṇena arīnanti kilesa arīnam

original: pañcamārānaṃ vā, sāsanapaccatthikānaṃ vā aññatitthiyānaṃ. Tesaṃ hananaṃ pāṭihāriyehi
analyzed: pañca mārānam vā sāsana paccatthikānam vā añña titthiyānam tesam hananam pāṭihāriyehi

original: abhibhavanaṃ appaṭibhānatākaraṇaṃ, ajjhupekkhanañca majjhimapaṇṇāsake pañcamavagge

original: Ato nāvacanassa tābyappadeso mahāvisayenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Apica arayo hanatīti antasaddena
analyzed: a tassa na a vacanassa tābi appadesaḥ mahā visayena ati daṭṭhabbam apica arayaḥ hanati iti anta saddena

original: padasiddhi, ikārassa ca akāro. Paccayādīnaṃ sampadānabhūtānaṃ, tesaṃ vā paṭiggahaṇaṃ,
analyzed: pada siddhi ikārassa ca akāraḥ paccaya ādīnam sampadāna bhūtānam tesam vā paṭiggahaṇam

original: paṭiggahituṃ vā arahatīti arahanti dasseti “paccayādīnañca arahattā”ti iminā. Sammāti

original: vadanti. “Kupitā kopena anattamanā domanassenā”ti iminā “evaṃ paṭhamena nayenā”tiādinā

original: vuttavacanaṃ atthantarābhāvadassanena samattheti. “Tumhāka”nti iminā samānattho “tumha”nti
analyzed: vutta vacanam attha antara abhāva dassanena samatthā iti tumhākam ti iminā samāna atthaḥ tumhan ti

original: eko saddo “amhāka”nti iminā samānattho “amha”nti saddo viya yathā “tasmā hi amhaṃ
analyzed: ekaḥ saddaḥ amhākam ti iminā samāna atthaḥ amhanti saddaḥ viya yathā tasmā hi amhanti

original: daharā na mīyare”ti āha “tumhākaṃyevā”ti. Atthavasā liṅgavipariyāyoti katvā “tāya
analyzed: daharā na āha tumhākaṃyeva ati attha vasā katvā tāya

original: ca anattamanatāyā”ti vuttaṃ. “Antarāyo”ti vutte samaṇadhammavisesānanti atthassa
analyzed: ca anatta manatāya iti vuttam antarāyo ti vutte samaṇa dhamma visesānam ti atthassa

original: pakaraṇato viññāyamānattā, viññāyamānatthassa ca saddassa payoge kāmacārattā “paṭhamajjhānādīnaṃ
analyzed: pakaraṇataḥ viññāyamāna ttā viññāyamāna atthassa ca saddassa payoge kāmacārattā paṭhamajjhāna ādīnam

original: antarāyo”ti vuttaṃ. Ettha ca “antarāyo”ti idaṃ manopadosassa akaraṇīyatāya kāraṇavacanaṃ.
analyzed: antarāyo ti vuttam ettha ca antarāyo ti idam manaḥ upadosassa a karaṇīya tāya kāraṇa vacanam

original: Yasmā tumhākameva tena kopādinā paṭhamajjhānādīnamantarāyo bhaveyya, tasmā te kopādipariyāyena
analyzed: tumhākam eva tena kopa ādinā paṭhamajjhāna ādīnam antarāyaḥ tasmā te kopa ādi pariyāyena

original: vuttā āghātādayo na karaṇīyāti adhippāyo, tena “nāhaṃ sabbaññū”ti issarabhāvena tumhe
analyzed: vuttāḥ āghāta ādayaḥ na karaṇīyā ati adhippāyaḥ tena na aham sabbaññū ti issara bhāvena tumhe

original: tato nivāremi, atha kho imināva kāraṇenāti dasseti. Taṃ pana kāraṇavacanaṃ yasmā
analyzed: tatas nivāremi atha kho iminā ava kāraṇena ati dassā iti tam pana kāraṇa vacanam yasmā

original: ādīnavavibhāvanaṃ hoti, tasmā “ādīnavaṃ dassento”ti heṭṭhā vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: ādīnava vibhāvanam hoti tasmai ādīnavam dassento ti heṭṭhā vuttan ti daṭṭhabbaṃ

original: So pana manopadoso na kevalaṃ kālantarabhāvinoyeva hitasukhassa antarāyakaro, atha
analyzed: so pana manaḥ upadosaḥ na kevalam hita sukhassa antarāya karaḥ atha

original: kho taṅkhaṇapavattanārahassapi hitasukhassa antarāyakaroti manopadose ādīnavaṃ daḷhataraṃ
analyzed: kho hita sukhassa antarāya karoti manaḥ upadose ādīnavam daḷhataram

original: katvā dassetuṃ “api nū”tiādimāhātipi sambandho vattabbo. Paresanti ye attato aññe,
analyzed: katvā dassetum api nu iti ādim āha atipi sambandhaḥ vattabbo paresanti ye attataḥ aññe

original: tesanti attho, na pana “pare avaṇṇaṃ bhāseyyu”ntiādīsu viya paṭiviruddhasattānanti
analyzed: tesan ti atthaḥ na pana pare avaṇṇam bhāseyyun tiādīsu viya paṭiviruddha sattānam ti

original: āha “yesaṃ kesañcī”ti. Tadevatthaṃ samattheti “kupito hī”tiādinā. Pāḷiyaṃ subhāsitadubbhāsitavacanajānanampi
analyzed: āha kesañci iti tat evattham samatthā iti kupitaḥ hi iti ādinā pāḷiyam subhāsita dubbhāsita vacana jānanam pi

original: tadatthajānaneneva siddhanti āha “subhāsitadubbhāsitassa attha”nti.
analyzed: tad attha jānanena iva siddhanti āha subhāsita dubbhāsitassa atthanti

original: Andhaṃtamanti andhabhāvakaraṃ tamaṃ, ativiya vā tamaṃ. Yaṃ naraṃ sahate abhibhavati,
analyzed: andhaṃtamanti andha bhāva karam tamam vā tamam yam naram sahate abhibhavati

original: tassa andhatamanti sambandho. Yanti vā bhummatthe paccattavacanaṃ, yasmiṃ kāle sahate,
analyzed: tassa sambandhaḥ vā bhumma atthe paccatta vacanam yasmin kāle sahate

original: tadā andhatamaṃ hotīti attho, kāraṇaniddeso vā, yena kāraṇena sahate, tena andhatamanti.
analyzed: tadā andhatamam hoti iti atthaḥ kāraṇa niddesaḥ vā yena kāraṇena sahate tena andhatamanti

original: Evaṃ sati yaṃtaṃ-saddānaṃ niccasambandhattā “yadā”ti ajjhāharitabbaṃ. Kiriyāparāmasanaṃ
analyzed: evam sati nicca sambandha ttā yadā ati ajjhāharitabbam kiriyā parāmasanam

original: vā etaṃ, “kodho sahate”ti yadetaṃ kodhassa abhibhavanaṃ vuttaṃ, etaṃ andhatamanti.
analyzed: vai etam kodhaḥ sahata iti yat etam kodhassa abhibhavanam vuttam etam andhataman ti

original: Tato ca kuddho atthaṃ na jānāti, kuddho dhammaṃ na passatīti yojetabbaṃ. Atthaṃ dhammanti
analyzed: tatas ca kuddhaḥ attham na jānāti kuddhaḥ dhammam na passati iti yojetabbam attham dhammanti

original: pāḷiatthaṃ, pāḷidhammañca. Cittappakopanoti cittassa pakatibhāvavijahanena padūsako.
analyzed: pāḷi attham pāḷi dhammam ca citta ppakopanaḥ ti cittassa pakati bhāva vijahanena padūsako

original: Antaratoti abbhantarato, cittato vā kodhavasena bhayaṃ jātaṃ. Nti tathāsabhāvaṃ kodhaṃ,
analyzed: antarataḥ ti abbhantarataḥ cittataḥ vā kodha vasena bhayam jātam tathā a sabhāvam kodham

original: kodhassa vā anatthajananādippakāraṃ.
analyzed: kodhassa vā anattha janana ādi ppakāram

original: Sabbatthāpīti sabbesupi paṭhamadutiyatatiyanayesu. “Avaṇṇe paṭipajjitabbākāra”nti
analyzed: sabbattha api iti sabbesu pi paṭhama dutiya tatiya nayesu avaṇṇe paṭipajjitabba ākāram ti

original: adhikāro. Avaṇṇabhāsakānamavisayattā “tatrā”ti padassa tasmiṃ avaṇṇeti atthova dassito.
analyzed: adhikāraḥ avaṇṇa bhāsakānam avisaya ttā padassa tasmin avaṇṇā iti atthaḥ uva dassito

original: Abhūtanti kattubhūtaṃ vacanaṃ, yaṃ vacanaṃ abhūtaṃ hotīti attho. Abhūtatoti pana
analyzed: abhūtanti kattu bhūtam vacanam yam vacanam abhūtam hoti iti atthaḥ pana

original: abhūtatākiriyāva bhāvappadhānattā, bhāvalopattā cāti dasseti “abhūtabhāvenevā”ti
analyzed: abhūta tā kiriyā ava bhāva ppadhāna ttā bhāva lopattā ca ati dasseti abhūta bhāvena iva ati

original: iminā. “Itipeta”ntiādi nibbeṭhanākāranidassananti dassetuṃ “katha”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: iminā nibbeṭhana ākāra nidassanan ti dassetum katham tiādi vuttam

original: Tatrāti tasmiṃ vacane. Yojanāti adhippāyapayojanā. Tuṇhīti abhāsanatthe nipāto, bhāvanapuṃsako
analyzed: tatra ati tasmin vacane yojanā ati adhippāya payojanā tuṇhī iti a bhāsana tthe nipātaḥ bhāva napuṃsakaḥ

original: cesa. “Itipetaṃ abhūta”nti vatvā “yaṃ tumhehī”tiādinā tadatthaṃ vivarati. Imināpīti
analyzed: vatvā yam vatvā yam iti ādinā tad attham vivarati iminā api iti

original: pi-saddena anekavidhaṃ kāraṇaṃ sampiṇḍeti. Kāraṇasarūpamāha “sabbaññuyevā”tiādinā.
analyzed: pi saddena anekavidham kāraṇam sampiṇḍeti kāraṇa sarūpam āha

original: Eva-saddo tīsupi padesu yojetabbo, sabbaññubhāvato na asabbaññū, svākkhātattā na
analyzed: eva saddaḥ tīsu pi padesu yojetabbaḥ sabbaññu bhāvataḥ na asabbaññū su ākkhāta ttā na

original: durakkhāto, suppaṭipannattā na duppaṭipannoti imināpi kāraṇena nibbeṭhetabbanti vuttaṃ
analyzed: durakkhātaḥ suppaṭipanna ttā na duppaṭipannaḥ ti iminā api kāraṇena nibbeṭhetabbanti vuttam

original: hoti. “Kasmā pana sabbaññū”tiādipaṭicodanāyapi taṃkāraṇadassanena nibbeṭhetabbamevāti
analyzed: hoti kasmā pana tad kāraṇa dassanena nibbeṭhetabbam eva ati

original: āha “tatra idañcidañca kāraṇa”nti. Tatrāti tesu sabbaññutādīsu. Idañca idañca kāraṇanti
analyzed: āha tatra idam ca idam ca kāraṇam ti tatra ati tesu sabbaññu tā ādīsu idam ca idam ca kāraṇam ti

original: anekavidhena kāraṇānukāraṇaṃ dassetvā “na sabbaññū”tiādivacanaṃ nibbeṭhetabbanti
analyzed: anekavidhena kāraṇa anukāraṇam dassetvā na sabbaññūti ādi vacanam nibbeṭhetabbanti

original: attho. Tatridaṃ kāraṇaṃ – sabbaññū eva amhākaṃ satthā aviparītadhammadesanattā. Svākkhāto
analyzed: atthaḥ tatra idam kāraṇam sabbaññū eva amhākam satthā aviparīta dhamma desanattā su ākkhātaḥ

original: eva dhammo ekantaniyyānikattā. Suppaṭipanno eva saṅgho saṃkilesarahitattāti. Kāraṇānukāraṇadassanampettha
analyzed: eva dhammo ekanta niyyānika ttā suppaṭipannaḥ eva saṅgho saṃkilesa rahita ttā ati kāraṇa anukāraṇa dassanam pa ittha

original: asabbaññutādivacana-nibbeṭhanameva tathādassanassa tesampi kāraṇabhāvatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: asabbaññu tā ādi vacana nibbeṭhanam eva tathā dassanassa tesam pi kāraṇa bhāvato ti daṭṭhabbam

original: Kāraṇakāraṇampi hi “kāraṇa”ntveva vuccati, patiṭṭhānapatiṭṭhānampi “patiṭṭhāna”ntveva
analyzed: kāraṇa kāraṇam pi hi kāraṇam tu eva vuccati patiṭṭhāna patiṭṭhānam pi patiṭṭhānam tu eva

original: yathā “tiṇehi bhattaṃ siniddhaṃ, pāsāde dhammamajjhāyatī”ti. Dutiyaṃ padanti “ataccha”nti
analyzed: yathā tiṇehi bhattam siniddham pāsāde dhammam ajjhāyati iti dutiyam padanti a tacchanti

original: padaṃ. Paṭhamassa padassāti “abhūta”nti padassa. Catutthanti “na ca panetaṃ amhesu
analyzed: padam paṭhamassa padassa ati abhūta nti padassa catutthanti na ca pana itam amhesu

original: saṃvijjatī”ti padaṃ. Tatiyassāti “natthi cetaṃ amhesū”ti padassa. Vividhamekattheyeva
analyzed: saṃvijjati iti padam tatiyassa ati natthi ca itam amhesu iti padassa vividham ekatthā iva iva

original: pavattaṃ vacanaṃ vivacanaṃ, tadeva vevacanaṃ, vacananti vā attho saddena vacanīyattā

original: vigataṃ vacanaṃ yassāti vevacanaṃ vuttanayena, pariyāyavacananti attho.
analyzed: vigatam vacanam yassa ati vevacanam vutta nayena pariyāya vacanan ti atthaḥ

original: Etthāha – kasmā panettha pariyāyavacanaṃ vuttaṃ, nanu ekekapadavaseneva adhippeto
analyzed: ettha āha kasmā pana ittha pariyāya vacanam vuttam nanu ekeka pada vasena iva adhippetaḥ

original: attho siddho, evaṃ siddhe sati kimete tena pariyāyavacanena. Tadetañhi ganthagāravādianekadosakaraṃ,
analyzed: atthaḥ siddhaḥ evam siddhe sati kim ete tena pariyāya vacanena tat etat hi gantha gārava ādi aneka dosa karam

original: yadi ca taṃ vattabbaṃ siyā, tadeva vuttaṃ assa, na tadaññanti? Vuccate – desanākāle,
analyzed: yadi ca tam vattabbam siyā tat eva vuttam assa na tad aññan ti vuccate desanā kāle

original: hi āyatiñca kassaci kathañci tadatthapaṭivedhanatthaṃ pariyāyavacanaṃ vuttaṃ. Desanāpaṭiggāhakesu
analyzed: hi āyatim ca kassaci kathañci tad attha paṭivedhana attham pariyāya vacanam vuttam desanā paṭiggāhakesu

original: hi yo tesaṃ pariyāyavacanānaṃ yaṃ pubbe saṅketaṃ karoti “idamimassatthassa vacana”nti,
analyzed: hi yaḥ tesam pariyāya vacanānam yam pubbe saṅketam karoti idam imassa atthassa vacananti

original: tassa teneva tadatthapaṭivedho hoti. Apica tasmiṃ khaṇe vikkhittacittānaṃ aññavihitānaṃ
analyzed: tassa tena iva tad attha paṭivedhaḥ hoti apica tasmin khaṇe vikkhitta cittānam añña vihitānam

original: vipariyāyānaṃ aññena pariyāyena tadatthāvabodhanatthampi pariyāyavacanaṃ vuttaṃ.
analyzed: vipariyāyānam aññena pariyāyena tad attha avabodhana attham pi pariyāya vacanam vuttam

original: Yañhi ye na suṇanti, tapparihāyanavasena tesaṃ sabbathā paripuṇṇassa yathāvuttassa
analyzed: yat hi ye na suṇanti tad parihāyana vasena tesam sabbathā paripuṇṇassa yathā vuttassa

original: atthassa anavabodho siyā, pariyāyavacane pana vutte tabbasena paripuṇṇamatthāvabodho
analyzed: atthassa anavabodhaḥ siyā pariyāya vacane pana vutte tad basena paripuṇṇam attha avabodhaḥ

original: hoti. Atha vā mandabuddhīnaṃ punappunaṃ tadatthalakkhaṇena asammohanatthaṃ pariyāyavacanaṃ
analyzed: hoti atha vā manda buddhīnam punappunam tad attha lakkhaṇena a sammohana attham pariyāya vacanam

original: vuttaṃ. Mandabuddhīnañhi ekeneva padena ekatthassa sallakkhaṇena sammoho hoti, anekena
analyzed: vuttam manda buddhīnam hi ekena iva padena eka atthassa sat lakkhaṇena sammohaḥ hoti anekena

original: pariyāyena pana ekatthassa sallakkhaṇena tathāsammoho na hoti anekappavattinimittena
analyzed: pariyāyena pana eka atthassa sat lakkhaṇena tathā sammohaḥ na hoti aneka ppavatti nimittena

original: ekattheyeva pavattasaddena yathādhippetassa atthassa nicchitattā.
analyzed: ekatthā iya iva pavatta saddena yathā adhippetassa atthassa nicchita ttā

original: Aparo nayo – “anekepi atthā samānabyañjanā hontī”ti yā atthantaraparikappanā siyā,
analyzed: aparaḥ nayaḥ aneke pi atthā samāna byañjanāḥ honti iti yā atthantara parikappanā siyā

original: tassā parivajjanatthampi pariyāyavacanaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Anekesampi hi atthānaṃ
analyzed: parivajjana attham pi pariyāya vacanam vuttan ti veditabbam anekesam pi hi atthānam

original: ekapadavacanīyatāvasena samānabyañjanattā yathāvuttassa padassa “ayamattho nu kho
analyzed: eka pada vacanīya tā vasena samāna byañjana ttā yathāvuttassa padassa ayam atthaḥ nu kho

original: adhippeto, udāhu ayamatthovā”ti pavattaṃ sotūnamatthantaraparikappanaṃ vevacanaṃ
analyzed: adhippetaḥ udāhu ayam atthaḥ uvāti pavattam sotūnam atthantara parikappanam vevacanam

original: aññamaññaṃ bhedakavasena parivajjeti. Vuttañca –
analyzed: aññam aññam bhedaka vasena parivajja iti vuttam ca

original: “Nekatthavuttiyā saddo, na visesatthañāpako;
analyzed: na eka attha vuttiyā saddaḥ na visesa attha ñāpakaḥ

original: Pariyāyena yutto tu, pariyāyo ca bhedako”ti.
analyzed: pariyāyena yutto tu pariyāyo ca bhedako ti

original: Aparo nayo – anaññassāpi pariyāyavacanassa vacane anekāhi tāhi tāhi nāmapaññattīhi
analyzed: aparaḥ nayaḥ anaññassa api pariyāya vacanassa vacane anekāhi tāhi tāhi nāma paññattīhi

original: tesaṃ tesaṃ atthānaṃ paññāpanatthampi pariyāyavacanaṃ vattabbaṃ hoti. Tathā hi pariyāyavacane
analyzed: tesam tesam atthānam paññāpana attham pi pariyāya vacanam vattabbam hoti tathā hi pariyāya vacane

original: vutte “imassatthassa idamidampi nāma”nti sotūnaṃ anekadhā nāmapaññattivijānanaṃ.
analyzed: vutte imassa atthassa idam idam pi nāma nti sotūnam anekadhā nāma paññatti vijānanam

original: Tato ca taṃtaṃpaññattikosallaṃ hoti seyyathāpi nighaṇṭusatthe paricayataṃ. Apica
analyzed: ca taṃ taṃ paññatti kosallam hoti seyyathā api nighaṇṭu satthe apica

original: dhammakathikānaṃ tantiatthupanibandhanaparāvabodhanānaṃ sukhasiddhiyāpi pariyāyavacanaṃ.
analyzed: dhamma kathikānam tanti attha upanibandhana para avabodhanānam sukha siddhiyā api pariyāya vacanam

original: Tabbacanena hi dhammadesakānaṃ tantiatthassa attano citte upanibandhanena ṭhapanena
analyzed: tad bacanena hi dhamma desakānam tanti atthassa attano citte upanibandhanena ṭhapanena

original: paresaṃ sotūnamavabodhanaṃ sukhasiddhaṃ hoti. Atha vā sammāsambuddhassa attano dhammaniruttipaṭisambhidāsampattiyā
analyzed: paresam sotūnam avabodhanam sukha siddham hoti atha vā sammāsambuddhassa attanaḥ dhamma nirutti paṭisambhidā sampattiyā

original: vibhāvanatthaṃ, veneyyānañca tattha bījavāpanatthaṃ pariyāyavacanaṃ bhagavā niddisati.
analyzed: vibhāvana attham tattha bīja vāpana attham pariyāya vacanam bhagavā niddisati

original: Tadasampattikassa hi tathāvacanaṃ na sambhavati. Tena ca pariyāyavacanena yathāsutena
analyzed: tad asampattikassa hi tathā vacanam na sambhavati tena ca pariyāya vacanena yathā sutena

original: tassaṃ dhammaniruttipaṭisambhidāsampattiyaṃ tapparicaraṇena, tadaññasucaritasamupabrūhanena

original: ca puññasaṅkhātassa bījassa vapanaṃ sambhavati. Ko hi īdisāya sampattiyā viññāyamānāya
analyzed: ca puñña saṅkhātassa bījassa vapanam sambhavati kaḥ hi īdisāya sampattiyā viññāyamānāya

original: tadetaṃ nābhipattheyyāti, kiṃ vā bahunā. Yassā dhammadhātuyā suppaṭividdhattā sammāsambuddho
analyzed: tat etam na abhipattheyya ati kim vā bahunā yassā dhammadhātuyā sammāsambuddhaḥ

original: yathā sabbasmiṃ atthe appaṭihatañāṇacāro, tathā sabbasmiṃ saddavohāreti ekampi atthaṃ
analyzed: yathā sabbasmim atthe appaṭihata ñāṇa cāro tathā sabbasmim sadda vohāre iti ekam pi attham

original: anekehi pariyāyehi bodheti, natthi tattha dandhāyitattaṃ vitthāritattaṃ, nāpi dhammadesanāya
analyzed: anekehi pariyāyehi bodheti natthi tattha dandhāyi tattam vitthāri tattam na api dhamma desanāya

original: hāni, āveṇiko cāyaṃ buddhadhammo. Sabbaññutaññāṇassa hi suppaṭividitabhāvena paṭisambhidāñāṇehi
analyzed: hāni āveṇikaḥ ca ayam buddha dhammo sabbaññu ta ññāṇassa hi suppaṭividita bhāvena paṭisambhidā ñāṇehi

original: viya tenapi ñāṇena atthe, dhamme, niruttiyā ca appaṭihatavuttitāya buddhalīḷāya ekampi
analyzed: viya tena api ñāṇena atthe dhamme niruttiyā ca appaṭihata vutti tāya buddha līḷāya ekam pi

original: atthaṃ anekehi pariyāyehi bodheti, na pana tasmiṃ saddavohāre, tathābodhane vā mandabhāvo
analyzed: attham anekehi pariyāyehi bodheti na pana tasmin sadda vohāre tathā bodhane vā manda bhāvaḥ

original: sammābodhanassa sādhanattā, na ca tena atthassa vitthārabhāvo ekassevatthassa desetabbassa
