analyzed: pavicaya hetukam iti yathā ādimhi paṭhama abhinīhāra kāle pavicitā samādinnā ca tathā

original: desitā. Yathāha “vicinanto tadādakkhiṃ, paṭhamaṃ dānapārami”ntiādi tenetaṃ vuccati –
analyzed: desitāḥ yathā āha vicinantaḥ paṭhamam dāna pāramin tiādi tena itam vuccati

original: “Paṭhamaṃ samādānatā-vasenāyaṃ kamo ruto;
analyzed: paṭhamam samādāna tā vasena ayam kamaḥ

original: Atha vā aññamaññassa, bahūpakāratopi cā”ti.
analyzed: atha vā aññamaññassa bahu upakārataḥ pi ca ati

original: Tattha hi dānaṃ sīlassa bahūpakāraṃ, sukarañcāti taṃ ādimhi vuttaṃ. Dānaṃ pana sīlapariggahitaṃ
analyzed: tattha hi dānam sīlassa bahu upakāram sukaram ca ati tat ādimhi vuttam dānam pana sīla pariggahitam

original: mahapphalaṃ hoti mahānisaṃsanti dānānantaraṃ sīlaṃ vuttaṃ. Sīlaṃ nekkhammapariggahitaṃ…pe…
analyzed: mahapphalam hoti dāna anantaram sīlam vuttam sīlam nekkhamma pariggahitam pe

original: nekkhammaṃ paññāpariggahitaṃ…pe… paññā vīriyapariggahitā…pe… vīriyaṃ khantipariggahitaṃ…pe…
analyzed: nekkhammam paññā pariggahitam pe paññā vīriya pariggahitā pe vīriyam khanti pariggahitam pe

original: khanti saccapariggahitā…pe… saccaṃ adhiṭṭhānapariggahitaṃ…pe… adhiṭṭhānaṃ mettāpariggahitaṃ…pe…
analyzed: khanti sacca pariggahitā pe saccam adhiṭṭhāna pariggahitam pe adhiṭṭhānam mettā pariggahitam pe

original: mettā upekkhāpariggahitā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṃsāti mettānantaraṃ upekkhā vuttā.
analyzed: mettā upekkhā pariggahitā mahapphalā hoti mahā nisaṃsā iti mettā anantaram upekkhā vuttā

original: Upekkhā pana karuṇāpariggahitā, karuṇā ca upekkhāpariggahitāti veditabbā. Kathaṃ
analyzed: upekkhā pana karuṇā pariggahitā karuṇā ca upekkhā pariggahitā ti veditabbā katham

original: pana mahākāruṇikā bodhisattā sattesu upekkhakā hontīti? Upekkhitabbayuttakesu kañci
analyzed: pana mahā kāruṇikāḥ bodhisattāḥ sattesu upekkhakāḥ honti iti upekkhitabba yuttakesu kañci

original: kālaṃ upekkhakā honti, na pana sabbattha, sabbadā cāti keci. Apare pana na ca sattesu
analyzed: kālam upekkhakā honti na pana sabbattha sabbadā ca ati keci apare pana na ca sattesu

original: upekkhakā, sattakatesu pana vippakāresu upekkhakā hontīti, idamevettha yuttaṃ.
analyzed: upekkhakā satta katesu pana vippakāresu upekkhakāḥ honti iti idam eva ittha yuttam

original: Aparo nayo –
analyzed: aparaḥ nayaḥ

original: Sabbasādhāraṇatādi-kāraṇehipi īritaṃ;
analyzed: īritam

original: Dānaṃ ādimhi sesā tu, purimepi apekkhakā.
analyzed: dānam ādimhi sesā tu purime pi apekkhakā

original: Pacurajanesupi hi pavattiyā sabbasattasādhāraṇattā, appaphalattā, sukarattā ca dānaṃ
analyzed: pacura janesu pi hi pavattiyā sabba satta sādhāraṇa ttā appaphala ttā sukara ttā ca dānam

original: ādimhi vuttaṃ. Sīlena dāyakapaṭiggāhakasuddhito parānuggahaṃ vatvā parapīḷānivattivacanato,
analyzed: ādimhi vuttam sīlena dāyaka paṭiggāhaka suddhitaḥ para anuggaham vatvā para pīḷā nivatti vacanataḥ

original: kiriyadhammaṃ vatvā akiriyadhammavacanato, bhogasampattihetuṃ vatvā bhavasampattihetuvacanato
analyzed: kiriya dhammam vatvā akiriya dhamma vacanataḥ bhoga sampatti hetum vatvā bhava sampatti hetu vacanato

original: ca dānassānantaraṃ sīlaṃ vuttaṃ. Nekkhammena sīlasampattisiddhito, kāyavacīsucaritaṃ
analyzed: ca dānassa anantaram sīlam vuttam nekkhammena sīla sampatti siddhitaḥ kāya vacī su caritam

original: vatvā manosucaritavacanato, visuddhasīlassa sukheneva jhānasamijjhanato, kammāparādhappahānena
analyzed: vatvā manaḥ su carita vacanataḥ visuddha sīlassa sukhena iva jhāna samijjhanataḥ kamma aparādha ppahānena

original: payogasuddhiṃ vatvā kilesāparādhappahānena āsayasuddhivacanato, vītikkamappahāne
analyzed: payoga suddhim vatvā kilesa aparādha pahānena āsaya suddhi vacanataḥ vītikkama ppahāne

original: ṭhitassa pariyuṭṭhānappahānavacanato ca sīlassānantaraṃ nekkhammaṃ vuttaṃ. Paññāya
analyzed: ṭhitassa pariyuṭṭhāna ppahāna vacanataḥ ca sīlassa anantaram nekkhammam vuttam paññāya

original: nekkhammassa siddhiparisuddhito, jhānābhāve paññābhāvavacanato. Samādhipadaṭṭhānā
analyzed: nekkhammassa siddhi parisuddhitaḥ jhāna abhāve paññā abhāva vacanataḥ samādhi padaṭṭhānā

original: hi paññā, paññāpaccupaṭṭhāno ca samādhi. Samathanimittaṃ vatvā upekkhānimittavacanato,
analyzed: hi paññā paññā paccupaṭṭhāno ca samādhi samatha nimittam vatvā upekkhā nimitta vacanato

original: parahitajjhānena parahitakaraṇūpāyakosallavacanato ca nekkhammassānantaraṃ paññā
analyzed: para hita jhānena para hita karaṇa upāya kosalla vacanataḥ ca nekkhammassa anantaram paññā

original: vuttā. Vīriyārambhena paññākiccasiddhito, sattasuññatādhammanijjhānakkhantiṃ vatvā
analyzed: vuttāḥ vīriya ārambhena paññā kicca siddhitaḥ satta suñña tā dhamma nijjhāna kkhantim vatvā

original: sattahitāya ārambhassa acchariyatāvacanato, upekkhānimittaṃ vatvā paggahanimittavacanato,
analyzed: satta hitāya ārambhassa acchariya tā vacanataḥ upekkhā nimittam vatvā paggaha nimitta vacanataḥ

original: nisammakāritaṃ vatvā uṭṭhānavacanato ca. Nisammakārino hi uṭṭhānaṃ phalavisesamāvahatīti
analyzed: nisammakāritam vatvā uṭṭhāna vacanato ca nisammakārinaḥ hi uṭṭhānam phala visesam āvahati iti

original: paññāyānantaraṃ vīriyaṃ vuttaṃ.
analyzed: paññāya anantaram vīriyam vuttam

original: Vīriyena titikkhāsiddhito. Vīriyavā hi āraddhavīriyattā sattasaṅkhārehi upanītaṃ
analyzed: vīriyena titikkhā siddhitaḥ vīriyavā hi āraddha vīriya tā satta saṅkhārehi upanītam

original: dukkhaṃ abhibhuyya viharati. Vīriyassa titikkhālaṅkārabhāvato. Vīriyavato hi titikkhā
analyzed: dukkham abhibhuyya viharati vīriyassa titikkha alaṅkāra bhāvataḥ vīriyavataḥ hi titikkhā

original: sobhati. Paggahanimittaṃ vatvā samathanimittavacanato, accārambhena uddhaccadosappahānavacanato.
analyzed: sobhati paggaha nimittam vatvā samatha nimitta vacanataḥ acca ārambhena uddhacca dosa pahāna vacanataḥ

original: Dhammanijjhānakkhantiyā hi uddhaccadoso pahīyati. Vīriyavato sātaccakaraṇavacanato.
analyzed: dhamma nijjhāna kkhantiyā hi uddhacca doso pahīyati vīriyavataḥ sātacca karaṇa vacanataḥ

original: Khantibahulo hi anuddhato sātaccakārī hoti. Appamādavato parahitakiriyārambhe paccupakārataṇhābhāvavacanato.
analyzed: khanti bahulaḥ hi anuddhataḥ sātacca kārī hoti appamādavato para hita kiriyā ārambhe paccupakāra taṇhā bhāva vacanato

original: Yāthāvato dhammanijjhāne hi sati taṇhā na hoti. Parahitārambhe paramepi parakatadukkhasahanatāvacanato
analyzed: yāthāvataḥ dhamma nijjhāne hi sati taṇhā na hoti para hita ārambhe parame api para kata dukkha sahana tā vacanato

original: ca vīriyassānantaraṃ khanti vuttā. Saccena khantiyā cirādhiṭṭhānato, apakārino apakārakhantiṃ
analyzed: ca vīriyassa anantaram khanti vuttā saccena khantiyā cira adhiṭṭhānataḥ apakārinaḥ apakāra khantim

original: vatvā tadupakārakaraṇe avisaṃvādavacanato, khantiyā apavādavācāvikampanena bhūtavāditāya
analyzed: vatvā tad upakāra karaṇe a visaṃvāda vacanataḥ apavāda vācā vikampanena bhūta vāditāya

original: avijahanavacanato, sattasuññatādhamma-nijjhānakkhantiṃ vatvā tadupabrūhitañāṇasaccassa
analyzed: avijahana vacanataḥ satta suñña tā dhamma nijjhāna kkhantim vatvā tad upabrūhita ñāṇa saccassa

original: vacanato ca khantiyānantaraṃ saccaṃ vuttaṃ. Adhiṭṭhānena saccasiddhito. Acalādhiṭṭhānassa
analyzed: vacanato ca khantiyā anantaram saccam vuttam adhiṭṭhānena sacca siddhitaḥ acala adhiṭṭhānassa

original: hi virati sijjhati. Avisaṃvāditaṃ vatvā tattha acalabhāvavacanato. Saccasandho hi
analyzed: hi virati sijjhati avisaṃvāditam vatvā tattha acala bhāva vacanataḥ sacca sandhaḥ hi

original: dānādīsu paṭiññānurūpaṃ niccalo pavattati. Ñāṇasaccaṃ vatvā sambhāresu pavattiniṭṭhāpanavacanato.
analyzed: dāna ādīsu paṭiññā anurūpam niccalaḥ pavattati ñāṇa saccam vatvā sambhāresu pavatti niṭṭhāpana vacanato

original: Yathābhūtañāṇavā hi bodhisambhāresu adhiṭṭhāti, te ca niṭṭhāpeti. Paṭipakkhehi akampiyabhāvato
analyzed: yathābhūta ñāṇavā hi bodhi sambhāresu adhiṭṭhāti te ca niṭṭhāpeti paṭipakkhehi a kampiya bhāvato

original: ca saccassānantaraṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ. Mettāya parahitakaraṇasamādānādhiṭṭhānasiddhito,
analyzed: ca saccassa anantaram adhiṭṭhānam vuttam mettāya para hita karaṇa samādāna adhiṭṭhāna siddhito

original: adhiṭṭhānaṃ vatvā hitūpasaṃhāravacanato. Bodhisambhāre hi adhitiṭṭhamāno mettāvihārī
analyzed: adhiṭṭhānam vatvā hitu upasaṃhāra vacanataḥ bodhi sambhāre hi adhitiṭṭhamānaḥ mettā vihārī

original: hoti. Acalādhiṭṭhānassa samādānāvikopanena samādānasambhavato ca adhiṭṭhānassānantaraṃ
analyzed: hoti acala adhiṭṭhānassa samādāna a vikopanena samādāna sambhavato ca adhiṭṭhānassa anantaram

original: mettā vuttā. Upekkhāya mettāvisuddhito, sattesu hitūpasaṃhāraṃ vatvā tadaparādhesu
analyzed: mettā vuttā upekkhāya mettā visuddhitaḥ sattesu hitu upasaṃhāram vatvā tad aparādhesu

original: udāsīnatāvacanato, mettābhāvanaṃ vatvā tannissandabhāvanāvacanato, “hitakāmasattepi
analyzed: udāsīna tā vacanataḥ mettā bhāvanam vatvā tad nissanda bhāvanā vacanataḥ hita kāma satte pi

original: upekkhako”ti acchariyaguṇatāvacanato ca mettāyānantaraṃ upekkhā vuttāti evametāsaṃ kamo veditabbo.
analyzed: upekkhakaḥ ti acchariya guṇa tā vacanato ca mettāya anantaram upekkhā vuttā iti evam etāsam kamaḥ veditabbo

original: Kāni lakkhaṇādīni sabbathāti ettha pana avisesena –
analyzed: kāni lakkhaṇa ādīni sabbathā ti ettha pana avisesena

original: Paresamanuggahaṇaṃ, lakkhaṇanti pavuccati;
analyzed: paresam anuggahaṇam lakkhaṇam ti pavuccati

original: Upakāro akampo ca, raso hitesitāpi ca.
analyzed: upakāraḥ akampaḥ ca rasaḥ ca

original: Buddhattaṃ paccupaṭṭhānaṃ, dayā ñāṇaṃ pavuccati;
analyzed: buddhattam paccupaṭṭhānam dayā ñāṇam pavuccati

original: Padaṭṭhānanti tāsantu, paccekaṃ tāni bhedato.
analyzed: padaṭṭhānanti tāsantu paccekam tāni bhedato

original: Sabbāpi hi pāramiyo parānuggahalakkhaṇā, paresaṃ upakārakaraṇarasā, avikampanarasā
analyzed: sabbāḥ api hi pāramiyaḥ para anuggaha lakkhaṇāḥ paresam upakāra karaṇa rasāḥ a vikampana rasā

original: vā, hitesitāpaccupaṭṭhānā, buddhattapaccupaṭṭhānā vā, mahākaruṇāpadaṭṭhānā, karuṇūpāyakosallapadaṭṭhānā vā.
analyzed: vā hita isitā paccupaṭṭhānā buddhatta paccupaṭṭhānā vā mahākaruṇā padaṭṭhānā karuṇūpāya kosalla padaṭṭhānā vā

original: Visesena pana yasmā karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahitā attupakaraṇapariccāgacetanā dānapāramī.
analyzed: visesena pana yasmā karuṇūpāya kosalla pariggahitā attu upakaraṇa pariccāga cetanā dāna pāramī

original: Karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahitaṃ kāyavacīsucaritaṃ atthato akattabbavirati, kattabbakaraṇacetanādayo
analyzed: karuṇūpāya kosalla pariggahitam kāya vacī su caritam atthataḥ akattabba virati kattabba karaṇa cetanā ādayaḥ

original: ca sīlapāramī. Karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahito ādīnavadassanapubbaṅgamo kāmabhavehi
analyzed: ca sīla pāramī karuṇū pāya kosalla pariggahitaḥ ādīnava dassana pubbaṅgamo kāma bhavehi

original: nikkhamanacittuppādo nekkhammapāramī. Karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahito dhammānaṃ sāmaññavisesalakkhaṇāvabodho
analyzed: nikkhamana cittuppādaḥ nekkhamma pāramī karuṇūpāya kosalla pariggahito dhammānam sāmañña visesa lakkhaṇa avabodho

original: paññāpāramī. Karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahito kāyacittehi parahitārambho vīriyapāramī.
analyzed: paññāpāramī karuṇūpāya kosalla pariggahito kāya cittehi para hita ārambho vīriya pāramī

original: Karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahito sattasaṅkhārāparādhasahanasaṅkhāto adosappadhāno tadākārappavatto
analyzed: karuṇūpāya kosalla pariggahito satta saṅkhāra aparādha sahana saṅkhāto adosa ppadhāno tad ākāra ppavatto

original: cittuppādo khantipāramī. Karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahitaṃ viraticetanādibhedaṃ avisaṃvādanaṃ
analyzed: cittuppādo khanti pāramī karuṇūpāya kosalla pariggahitam virati cetanā ādi bhedam a visaṃvādanam

original: saccapāramī. Karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahito acalasamādānādhiṭṭhānasaṅkhāto tadākārappavatto
analyzed: sacca pāramī karuṇūpāya kosalla pariggahitaḥ acala samādāna adhiṭṭhāna saṅkhāto tad ākāra ppavatto

original: cittuppādo adhiṭṭhānapāramī. Karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahito lokassa hitasukhūpasaṃhāro
analyzed: cittuppādaḥ adhiṭṭhāna pāramī karuṇu upāya kosalla pariggahito lokassa hita sukhu upasaṃhāro

original: atthato abyāpādo mettāpāramī. Karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahitā anunayapaṭighaviddhaṃsanasaṅkhātā
analyzed: atthataḥ a byāpādaḥ mettā pāramī karuṇū upāya kosalla pariggahitā anunaya paṭigha viddhaṃsana saṅkhātā

original: iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu sattasaṅkhāresu samappavatti upekkhāpāramī.
analyzed: iṭṭha aniṭṭhesu satta saṅkhāresu sama pavatti upekkhā pāramī

original: Tasmā pariccāgalakkhaṇaṃ dānaṃ, deyyadhamme lobhaviddhaṃsanarasaṃ, anāsattipaccupaṭṭhānaṃ,
analyzed: tasmā pariccāga lakkhaṇam dānam deyya dhamme lobha viddhaṃsana rasam anāsatti paccupaṭṭhānam

original: bhavavibhavasampattipaccupaṭṭhānaṃ vā, pariccajitabbavatthupadaṭṭhānaṃ. Sīlanalakkhaṇaṃ
analyzed: bhava vibhava sampatti paccupaṭṭhānam vā pariccajitabba vatthu padaṭṭhānam sīlana lakkhaṇam

original: sīlaṃ, samādhānalakkhaṇaṃ, patiṭṭhānalakkhaṇaṃ vāti vuttaṃ hoti. Dussīlyaviddhaṃsanarasaṃ,
analyzed: sīlam samādhāna lakkhaṇam patiṭṭhāna lakkhaṇam vā ati vuttam hoti dussīlya viddhaṃsana rasam

original: anavajjarasaṃ vā, soceyyapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, hirottappapadaṭṭhānaṃ. Kāmato, bhavato ca
analyzed: anavajja rasam vā soceyya paccupaṭṭhānam hira uttappa padaṭṭhānam kāmataḥ bhavato ca

original: nikkhamanalakkhaṇaṃ nekkhammaṃ, tadādīnavavibhāvanarasaṃ, tatoyeva vimukhabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ,
analyzed: nikkhamana lakkhaṇam nekkhammam tad ādīnava vibhāvana rasam vimukha bhāva paccupaṭṭhānam

original: saṃvegapadaṭṭhānaṃ. Yathāsabhāvapaṭivedhalakkhaṇā paññā, akkhalitapaṭivedhalakkhaṇā
analyzed: saṃvega padaṭṭhānam yathā sabhāva paṭivedha lakkhaṇā paññā akkhalita paṭivedha lakkhaṇā

original: vā kusalissāsakhittausupaṭivedho viya, visayobhāsanarasā padīpo viya, asammohapaccupaṭṭhānā
analyzed: vā viya visaya ubhāsana rasā padīpaḥ viya asammoha paccupaṭṭhānā

original: araññagatasudesako viya, samādhipadaṭṭhānā, catusaccapadaṭṭhānā vā. Ussāhalakkhaṇaṃ
analyzed: arañña gata sudesakaḥ viya samādhi padaṭṭhānā catusacca padaṭṭhānā vā ussāha lakkhaṇam

original: vīriyaṃ, upatthambhanarasaṃ, asaṃsīdanapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, vīriyārambhavatthupadaṭṭhānaṃ,
analyzed: vīriyam upatthambhana rasam a saṃsīdana paccupaṭṭhānam vīriya ārambha vatthu padaṭṭhānam

original: saṃvegapadaṭṭhānaṃ vā.
analyzed: saṃvega pada ṭṭhānam vā

original: Khamanalakkhaṇā khanti, iṭṭhāniṭṭhasahanarasā, adhivāsanapaccupaṭṭhānā, avirodhapaccupaṭṭhānā
analyzed: khamana lakkhaṇā khanti iṭṭha aniṭṭha sahana rasā adhivāsana paccupaṭṭhānā avirodha paccupaṭṭhānā

original: vā, yathābhūtadassanapadaṭṭhānā. Avisaṃvādanalakkhaṇaṃ saccaṃ, yāthāvavibhāvanarasaṃ,
analyzed: vā yathābhūta dassana padaṭṭhānā avisaṃvādana lakkhaṇam saccam yāthāva vibhāvana rasam

original: sādhutāpaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, soraccapadaṭṭhānaṃ. Bodhisambhāresu adhiṭṭhānalakkhaṇaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ,
analyzed: sādhu tā paccupaṭṭhānam soracca padaṭṭhānam bodhi sambhāresu adhiṭṭhāna lakkhaṇam adhiṭṭhānam

original: tesaṃ paṭipakkhābhibhavanarasaṃ, tattha acalatāpaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, bodhisambhārapadaṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: tesam paṭipakkha abhibhavana rasam tattha acala tā paccupaṭṭhānam bodhi sambhāra padaṭṭhānam

original: Hitākārappavattilakkhaṇā mettā, hitūpasaṃhārarasā, āghātavinayanarasā vā, sommabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā,

original: Taṇhādīhi aghātatā, rahitatā vikappānaṃ;
analyzed: taṇhā ādīhi aghāta tā rahita tā vikappānam

original: Vodānanti vijāniyā, sabbāsameva tāsampi.
analyzed: vodānanti vijāniyā sabbāsam eva tāsam pi

original: Anupaghātā hi taṇhā māna diṭṭhi kodhu panāha makkha palāsa issāmacchariya māyā sāṭheyya
analyzed: anupaghātā hi taṇhā māna diṭṭhi kodhu panāha makkha palāsa issā macchariya māyā sāṭheyya

original: thambha sārambha mada pamādādīhi kilesehi deyyapaṭiggāhakavikappādirahitā ca dānādipāramiyo
analyzed: thambha sa ārambha mada pamāda ādīhi kilesehi ca dāna ādi pāramiyaḥ

original: parisuddhā pabhassarā bhavantīti.
analyzed: parisuddhāḥ pabhassarāḥ bhavanti iti

original: Ko paṭipakkhoti –
analyzed: kaḥ paṭipakkhaḥ ti

original: Akusalā kilesā ca, paṭipakkhā abhedato;
analyzed: akusalā kilesā ca paṭipakkhāḥ abhedato

original: Bhedato pana pubbepi, vuttā macchariyādayo.
analyzed: bhedataḥ pana pubbe api vuttāḥ macchariya ādayaḥ

original: Avisesena hi sabbepi akusalā dhammā, sabbepi kilesā ca etāsaṃ paṭipakkhā. Visesena
analyzed: avisesena hi sabbe pi akusalāḥ dhammāḥ sabbe pi kilesāḥ ca etāsam paṭipakkhāḥ visesena

original: pana pubbe vuttā macchariyādayoti veditabbā. Apica deyyapaṭiggāhakadānaphalesu alobhādosāmohaguṇayogato
analyzed: pana pubbe vuttā macchariya ādayaḥ ti veditabbāḥ apica deyya paṭiggāhaka dāna phalesu alobhā dosā moha guṇa yogataḥ

original: lobhadosamohapaṭipakkhaṃ dānaṃ, kāyādidosattayavaṅkāpagamato lobhādipaṭipakkhaṃ sīlaṃ,
analyzed: lobha dosa moha paṭipakkham dānam kāya ādi dosa ttaya vaṅka apagamataḥ lobha ādi paṭipakkham sīlam

original: kāmasukhaparūpaghātaattakilamathaparivajjanato dosattayapaṭipakkhaṃ nekkhammaṃ, lobhādīnaṃ
analyzed: kāma sukha para upaghāta atta kilamatha parivajjanataḥ dosa ttaya paṭipakkham nekkhammam lobha ādīnam

original: andhīkaraṇato, ñāṇassa ca anandhīkaraṇato lobhādipaṭipakkhā paññā, alīnānuddhatañāyārambhavasena
analyzed: andhīkaraṇataḥ ñāṇassa ca an andhīkaraṇataḥ lobha ādi paṭipakkhā paññā alīna anuddhata ñāya ārambha vasena

original: lobhādipaṭipakkhaṃ vīriyaṃ, iṭṭhāniṭṭhasuññatānaṃ khamanato lobhādipaṭipakkhā khanti,
analyzed: lobha ādi paṭipakkham vīriyam iṭṭha aniṭṭha suññatānam khamanataḥ lobha ādi paṭipakkhā khanti

original: satipi paresaṃ upakāre, apakāre ca yathābhūtappavattiyā lobhādipaṭipakkhaṃ saccaṃ,
analyzed: sati api paresam upakāre apakāre ca yathā bhūta ppavattiyā lobha ādi paṭipakkham saccam

original: lokadhamme abhibhuyya yathāsamādinnesu sambhāresu acalanato lobhādipaṭipakkhaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ,
analyzed: loka dhamme abhibhuyya yathā samādinnesu sambhāresu acalanataḥ lobha ādi paṭipakkham adhiṭṭhānam

original: nīvaraṇavivekato lobhādipaṭipakkhā mettā, iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu anunayapaṭighaviddhaṃsanato,
analyzed: nīvaraṇa vivekataḥ lobha ādi paṭipakkhā mettā iṭṭha aniṭṭhesu anunaya paṭigha viddhaṃsanato

original: samappavattito ca lobhādipaṭipakkhā upekkhāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: sama ppavattitaḥ ca lobha ādi paṭipakkhā upekkhā ati daṭṭhabbam

original: Kā paṭipattīti –
analyzed: kā paṭipatti iti

original: Dānākārādayo eva, uppāditā anekadhā;
analyzed: dāna ākāra ādayaḥ eva uppāditāḥ anekadhā

original: Paṭipattīti viññeyyā, pāramīpūraṇakkame.
analyzed: paṭipatti iti viññeyyā pāramī pūraṇa kkame

original: Dānapāramiyā hi tāva sukhūpakaraṇasarīrajīvitapariccāgena, bhayāpanayanena, dhammopadesena
analyzed: dāna pāramiyā hi tāva sukhu upakaraṇa sarīra jīvita pariccāgena bhaya apanayanena dhamma upadesena

original: ca bahudhā sattānaṃ anuggahakaraṇaṃ paṭipatti. Tattha āmisadānaṃ abhayadānaṃ dhammadānanti
analyzed: ca bahudhā sattānam anuggaha karaṇam paṭipatti tattha āmisa dānam abhaya dānam dhamma dānanti

original: dātabbavatthuvasena tividhaṃ dānaṃ. Tesu bodhisattassa dātabbavatthu ajjhattikaṃ,
analyzed: dātabba vatthu vasena tividham dānam tesu bodhisattassa dātabba vatthu ajjhattikam

original: bāhiranti duvidhaṃ. Tattha bāhiraṃ annaṃ pānaṃ vatthaṃ yānaṃ mālā gandhaṃ vilepanaṃ
analyzed: bāhiranti duvidham tattha bāhiram annam pānam vattham yānam mālā gandham vilepanam

original: seyyā āvasathaṃ padīpeyyanti dasavidhaṃ. Annādīnaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyādivibhāgena
analyzed: āvasatham dasavidham anna ādīnam khādanīya bhojanīya ādi vibhāgena

original: anekavidhañca. Tathā rūpārammaṇaṃ yāva dhammārammaṇanti ārammaṇato chabbidhaṃ. Rūpārammaṇādīnañca
analyzed: anekavidham ca tathā rūpa ārammaṇam yāva dhamma ārammaṇanti ārammaṇataḥ chabbidham rūpa ārammaṇa ādīnam ca

original: nīlādivibhāgena anekavidhaṃ. Tathā maṇikanakarajatamuttāpavāḷādikhettavatthuārāmādi
analyzed: nīla ādi vibhāgena anekavidham tathā maṇi kanaka rajata muttāpa vāḷa ādi khetta vatthu ārāma ādi

original: dāsīdāsagomahiṃsādinānāvidhavatthūpakaraṇavasena anekavidhaṃ.
analyzed: anekavidham

original: Tattha mahāpuriso bāhiraṃ vatthuṃ dento “yo yena atthiko, taṃ tasseva deti. Dento
analyzed: tattha mahā purisaḥ bāhiram vatthum dentaḥ yaḥ yena atthikaḥ tam tassa iva deti dentaḥ

original: ca tassa atthiko”ti sayameva jānanto ayācitopi deti, pageva yācito. Muttacāgo deti,
analyzed: ca tassa atthikaḥ ti sayam eva jānantaḥ a yācitaḥ api deti pagā iva yācitaḥ mutta cāgaḥ deti

original: no amuttacāgo. Pariyattaṃ deti, no apariyattaṃ. Sati deyyadhamme paccupakārasannissito
analyzed: no amutta cāgaḥ pariyattam deti no a pariyattam sati deyya dhamme paccupakāra sannissito

original: na deti, asati deyyadhamme, pariyatte ca saṃvibhāgārahaṃ vibhajati. Na ca deti parūpaghātāvahaṃ
analyzed: na deti asati deyya dhamme pariyatte ca saṃvibhāga araham vibhajati na ca deti parūpa ghāta āvaham

original: satthavisamajjādikaṃ, nāpi kīḷanakaṃ, yaṃ anatthupasaṃhitaṃ, pamādāvahañca, na ca
analyzed: sattha visamajja ādikam na api kīḷanakam yam anattha upasaṃhitam pamāda āvaham ca na ca

original: gilānassa yācakassa pānabhojanādiasappāyaṃ, pamāṇarahitaṃ vā deti, pamāṇayuttaṃ pana sappāyameva deti.
analyzed: gilānassa yācakassa pāna bhojana ādi asappāyam pamāṇa rahitam vā deti pamāṇa yuttam pana sappāyam eva deti

original: Tathā yācito gahaṭṭhānaṃ gahaṭṭhānucchavikaṃ deti, pabbajitānaṃ pabbajitānucchavikaṃ
analyzed: tathā yācitaḥ gaha ṭṭhānam gaha ṭṭha anucchavikam deti pabbajitānam pabbajita anucchavikam

original: deti. Mātāpitaro ñātisālohitā mittāmaccā puttadāradāsakammakarāti etesu kassaci pīḷaṃ
analyzed: deti mātā pitaraḥ ñāti sālohitāḥ mitta amaccā putta dāra dāsa kamma karāti etesu kassaci

original: ajanento deti, na ca uḷāraṃ deyyadhammaṃ paṭijānitvā lūkhaṃ deti, na ca lābhasakkārasilokasannissito
analyzed: a janentaḥ deti na ca uḷāram deyya dhammam paṭijānitvā lūkham deti na ca lābha sakkāra siloka sannissito

original: deti, na ca paccupakārasannissito deti, na ca phalapāṭikaṅkhī deti aññatra sammāsambodhiyā,
analyzed: deti na ca paccupakāra sannissito deti na ca phala pāṭikaṅkhī deti aññatra sammāsambodhiyā

original: na ca yācito, deyyadhammaṃ vā jigucchanto deti, na ca asaññatānaṃ yācakānaṃ akkosakaparibhāsakānampi
analyzed: na ca yācitaḥ deyya dhammam vā jigucchantaḥ deti na ca asaññatānam yācakānam akkosaka paribhāsakānam pi

original: apaviddhā dānaṃ deti, aññadatthu pasannacitto anukampanto sakkaccameva deti, na ca
analyzed: apaviddhā dānam deti añña datthu pasanna cittaḥ anukampanto sakkaccam eva deti na ca

original: kotūhalamaṅgaliko hutvā deti, kammaphalameva pana saddahanto deti, nāpi yācake payirupāsanādīhi
analyzed: kotūhala maṅgalikaḥ hutvā deti kamma phalam eva pana saddahantaḥ deti nā api yācake

original: saṃkilametvā deti, aparikilamento eva pana deti, na ca paresaṃ vañcanādhippāyo, bhedādhippāyo
analyzed: saṃkilametvā deti a parikilamentaḥ eva pana deti na ca paresam vañcanā adhippāyaḥ bheda adhippāyaḥ

original: vā dānaṃ deti, asaṃkiliṭṭhacittova deti, nāpi pharusavāco bhākuṭikamukho dānaṃ deti,
analyzed: vā dānam deti a saṃkiliṭṭha cittaḥ uva deti na api pharusa vācaḥ bhākuṭika mukhaḥ dānam deti

original: piyavādī ca pana pubbabhāsī mihitasitavacano hutvā deti, yasmiṃ ce deyyadhamme uḷāramanuññatāya
analyzed: piya vādī ca pana pubbabhāsī mihita sita vacanaḥ hutvā deti yasmin ce deyya dhamme uḷāra manuñña tāya

original: vā ciraparicayena vā gedhasabhāvatāya vā lobhadhammo adhimatto hoti, jānanto bodhisatto
analyzed: vā cira paricayena vā gedha sabhāva tāya vā lobha dhammo adhimattaḥ hoti jānantaḥ bodhisatto

original: taṃ khippameva paṭivinodayitvā yācake pariyesetvāpi deti, yañca deyyavatthu parittaṃ,
analyzed: tam khippam eva paṭivinodayitvā yācake pariyesetvā api deti yat ca deyya vatthu parittam

original: yācakopi paccupaṭṭhito, taṃ acintetvā api attānaṃ dhāvitvā dento yācakaṃ sammāneti
analyzed: yācakaḥ api paccupaṭṭhitaḥ tam a cintetvā api attānam dhāvitvā dentaḥ yācakam sammāneti

original: yathā taṃ akittipaṇḍito, na ca mahāpuriso attano puttadāradāsakammakaraporise yācito
analyzed: yathā tam akitti paṇḍitaḥ na ca mahā purisaḥ attano putta dāra dāsa kammakara porise yācito

original: te asaññāpite domanassappatte yācakānaṃ deti, sammadeva pana saññāpite somanassappatte
analyzed: te a saññāpite domanassa ppatte yācakānam deti sammat eva pana saññāpite somanassa ppatte

original: deti, dento ca yakkharakkhasapisācādīnaṃ vā manussānaṃ vā kurūrakammantānaṃ jānanto
analyzed: deti dento ca yakkha rakkhasa pisāca ādīnam vā manussānam vā kurūra kammantānam jānanto

original: na deti, tathā rajjampi tādisānaṃ na deti, ye lokassa ahitāya dukkhāya anatthāya
analyzed: na deti tathā rajjam pi tādisānam na deti ye lokassa ahitāya dukkhāya anatthāya

original: paṭipajjanti, ye pana dhammikā dhammena lokaṃ pālenti, tesaṃ rajjadānaṃ deti. Evaṃ
analyzed: paṭipajjanti ye pana dhammikāḥ dhammena lokam pālenti tesam rajja dānam deti evam

original: tāva bāhiradāne paṭipatti veditabbā.
analyzed: tāva bāhira dāne paṭipatti veditabbā

original: Ajjhattikadānampi dvīhākārehi veditabbaṃ. Kathaṃ? Yathā nāma koci puriso ghāsacchādanahetu
analyzed: ajjhattika dānam pi dvīhākārehi veditabbam katham yathā nāma koci purisaḥ ghāsa chādana hetu

original: attānaṃ parassa nissajjati, vidheyyabhāvaṃ upagacchati dāsabyaṃ, evameva mahāpuriso
analyzed: attānam parassa nissajjati vidheyya bhāvam upagacchati dāsabyam evam eva mahā purisaḥ

original: sambodhihetu nirāmisacitto sattānaṃ anuttaraṃ hitasukhaṃ icchanto attano dānapāramiṃ
analyzed: sambodhi hetu sattānam anuttaram hita sukham icchantaḥ dāna pāramim

original: paripūretukāmo attānaṃ parassa nissajjati, vidheyyabhāvaṃ upagacchati yathākāmakaraṇīyataṃ,
analyzed: paripūretu kāmaḥ attānam parassa nissajjati vidheyya bhāvam upagacchati yathākāma karaṇīya tam

original: karacaraṇanayanādiaṅgapaccaṅgaṃ tena tena atthikānaṃ akampito alīno anuppadeti, na
analyzed: kara caraṇa nayana ādi aṅga paccaṅgam tena tena atthikānam akampitaḥ alīnaḥ anuppadeti na

original: tattha sajjati, na saṅkocaṃ āpajjati yathā taṃ bāhiravatthusmiṃ. Tathā hi mahāpuriso
analyzed: tattha sajjati na saṅkocam āpajjati yathā tam bāhira vatthusmim tathā hi mahā purisaḥ

original: dvīhākārehi bāhiravatthuṃ pariccajati yathāsukhaṃ paribhogāya vā yācakānaṃ, tesaṃ
analyzed: dvīhākārehi bāhira vatthum pariccajati yathāsukham paribhogāya vā yācakānam tesam

original: manorathaṃ pūrento attano vasībhāvāya vā. Tattha sabbena sabbaṃ muttacāgo evamāha
analyzed: manoratham pūrentaḥ attanaḥ vasībhāvāya vā tattha sabbena sabbam mutta cāgaḥ evam āha

original: “nissaṅgabhāvenāhaṃ sambodhiṃ pāpuṇissāmī”ti, evaṃ ajjhattikavatthusmimpi veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: nissaṅga bhāvena aham sambodhim pāpuṇissāmi iti evam ajjhattika vatthusmim pi veditabbam

original: Tattha yaṃ ajjhattikavatthu diyyamānaṃ yācakassa ekanteneva hitāya saṃvattati, taṃ
analyzed: tattha yam ajjhattika vatthu diyyamānam yācakassa ekantena iva hitāya saṃvattati tam

original: deti, na itaraṃ. Na ca mahāpuriso mārassa, mārakāyikānaṃ vā devatānaṃ vihiṃsādhippāyānaṃ
analyzed: deti naḥ itaram na ca mahā purisaḥ mārassa māra kāyikānam vā devatānam vihiṃsā adhippāyānam

original: attano attabhāvaṃ, aṅgapaccaṅgāni vā jānamāno deti “mā tesaṃ anattho ahosī”ti. Yathā
analyzed: attanaḥ atta bhāvam aṅga paccaṅgāni vā jānamānaḥ deti mā tesam anatthaḥ ahosi iti yathā

original: ca mārakāyikānaṃ, evaṃ tehi anvāviṭṭhānampi na deti, nāpi ummattakānaṃ, itaresaṃ
analyzed: ca māra kāyikānam evam tehi anvāviṭṭhānam api na deti na api ummattakānam itaresam

original: pana yāciyamāno samanantarameva deti tādisāya yācanāya dullabhabhāvato, tādisassa
analyzed: pana yāciyamānaḥ samanantaram eva deti tādisāya yācanāya dullabha bhāvato tādisassa

original: ca dānassa dukkarabhāvato.
analyzed: ca dānassa dukkara bhāvato

original: Abhayadānaṃ pana rājato corato aggito udakato verīpuggalato sīhabyagghādivāḷamigato nāgayakkharakkhasapisācādito sattānaṃ bhaye paccupaṭṭhite tato parittāṇabhāvena dātabbaṃ.
analyzed: abhaya dānam pana rājataḥ corataḥ aggitaḥ udakataḥ verī puggalataḥ sīha byaggha ādi vāḷa migataḥ nāga yakkha rakkhasa pisāca āditaḥ sattānam bhaye paccupaṭṭhite tatas paritta āṇa bhāvena dātabbam

original: Dhammadānaṃ pana asaṃkiliṭṭhacittassa aviparītadhammadesanā. Opāyiko hi tassa upadeso
analyzed: dhamma dānam pana asaṃkiliṭṭha cittassa aviparīta dhamma desanā opāyikaḥ hi tassa upadesaḥ

original: diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthavasena, yena sāsane anotiṇṇānaṃ avatāraṇaṃ otiṇṇānaṃ
analyzed: diṭṭhadhammika samparāyika paramattha vasena yena sāsane anotiṇṇānam avatāraṇam otiṇṇānam

original: paripācanaṃ. Tatthāyaṃ nayo – saṅkhepato tāva dānakathā sīlakathā saggakathā kāmānaṃ
analyzed: paripācanam tattha ayam nayo saṅkhepato tāva dāna kathā sīla kathā sagga kathā kāmānam

original: ādīnavo saṃkileso okāro ca nekkhamme ānisaṃso. Vitthārato pana sāvakabodhiyaṃ adhimuttacittānaṃ
analyzed: ādīnavaḥ saṃkilesaḥ okāro ca nekkhamme ānisaṃso vitthārato pana sāvaka bodhiyam adhimutta cittānam

original: saraṇagamanaṃ, sīlasaṃvaro, indriyesu guttadvāratā, bhojane mattaññutā, jāgariyānuyogo,
analyzed: saraṇa gamanam sīla saṃvaraḥ indriyesu gutta dvāra tā bhojane mattaññu tā jāgariya anuyogo

original: satta saddhammā, aṭṭhatiṃsāya ārammaṇesu kammakaraṇavasena samathānuyogo, rūpamukhādīsu
analyzed: satta saddhammāḥ aṭṭhatiṃsāya ārammaṇesu kamma karaṇa vasena samatha anuyogaḥ rūpa mukha ādīsu

original: vipassanābhinivesesu yathārahaṃ abhinivesanamukhena vipassanānuyogo, tathā visuddhipaṭipadāya
analyzed: vipassanā abhinivesesu yathāraham abhinivesana mukhena vipassanā anuyogaḥ tathā visuddhi paṭipadāya

original: sammattagahaṇaṃ, tisso vijjā, cha abhiññā, catasso paṭisambhidā, sāvakabodhīti etesaṃ
analyzed: sammatta gahaṇam tissaḥ vijjā cha abhiññā catasso paṭisambhidā sāvaka bodhi iti etesam

original: guṇasaṃkittanavasena yathārahaṃ tattha tattha patiṭṭhāpanā, pariyodapanā ca. Tathā
analyzed: guṇa saṃkittana vasena yathāraham tattha tattha patiṭṭhāpanā pariyodapanā ca tathā

original: paccekabodhiyaṃ, sammāsambodhiyañca adhimuttacittānaṃ yathārahaṃ dānādipāramīnaṃ
analyzed: paccekabodhiyam sammāsambodhiyam ca adhimutta cittānam yathāraham dāna ādi pāramīnam

original: sabhāvasarasalakkhaṇādisaṃkittanamukhena tīsupi avatthābhedesu tesaṃ buddhānaṃ mahānubhāvatāvibhāvanena
analyzed: sabhāva sarasa lakkhaṇa ādi saṃkittana mukhena tīsu pi avatthā bhedesu tesam buddhānam mahā anubhāva tā vibhāvanena

original: yānadvaye patiṭṭhāpanā, pariyodapanā ca. Evaṃ mahāpuriso sattānaṃ dhammadānaṃ deti.
analyzed: yāna dvaye patiṭṭhāpanā pariyodapanā ca evam mahā puriso sattānam dhamma dānam deti

original: Tathā mahāpuriso āmisadānaṃ dento “imināhaṃ dānena sattānaṃ āyuvaṇṇasukhabalapaṭibhānādisampattiñca
analyzed: tathā mahā purisaḥ āmisa dānam dentaḥ iminā aham dānena sattānam āyu vaṇṇa sukha bala paṭibhāna ādi sampattim ca

original: ramaṇīyaṃ aggaphalasampattiñca nipphādeyya”nti annaṃ deti, tathā sattānaṃ kāmakilesapipāsavūpasamāya
analyzed: ramaṇīyam agga phala sampattiñca annam deti tathā sattānam kāma kilesa pipāsa vūpasamāya

original: pānaṃ deti, tathā suvaṇṇavaṇṇatāya, hirottappālaṅkārassa ca nipphattiyā vatthāni
analyzed: pānam deti tathā suvaṇṇa vaṇṇa tāya hira uttappa alaṅkārassa ca nipphattiyā vatthāni

original: deti, tathā iddhividhassa ceva nibbānasukhassa ca nipphattiyā yānaṃ deti, tathā sīlagandhanipphattiyā
analyzed: deti tathā iddhividhassa ca iva nibbāna sukhassa ca nipphattiyā yānam deti tathā sīla gandha nipphattiyā

original: pāramiyo, paresaṃ kārāpanavasena pavattā upapāramiyo, sayaṃ karaṇavasena pavattā
analyzed: pāramiyaḥ paresam kārāpana vasena pavattā upapāramiyaḥ sayam karaṇa vasena pavattā

original: paramatthapāramiyo”ti vadanti. Tathā “bhavasukhāvaho puññañāṇasambhāro pāramī, attano
analyzed: paramattha pāramiyaḥ ti vadanti tathā bhava sukha āvahaḥ puñña ñāṇa sambhāro pāramī attano

original: nibbānasukhāvaho upapāramī, paresaṃ tadubhayasukhāvaho paramatthapāramī”ti eke.
analyzed: nibbāna sukha āvahaḥ upapāramī paresam tad ubhaya sukha āvahaḥ paramattha pāramī iti eke

original: Puttadāradhanādiupakaraṇapariccāgo pana dānapāramī, attano aṅgapariccāgo dānaupapāramī,
analyzed: putta dāra dhana ādi upakaraṇa pariccāgaḥ pana dāna pāramī attanaḥ aṅga pariccāgaḥ dānaupapāramī

original: attano jīvitapariccāgo dānaparamatthapāramī. Tathā puttadārādikassa tividhassāpi
analyzed: attanaḥ jīvita pariccāgaḥ dāna paramattha pāramī tathā putta dāra ādikassa tividhassa api

original: hetu avītikkamanavasena tisso sīlapāramiyo, tesu eva tividhesu vatthūsu ālayaṃ upacchinditvā
analyzed: hetu avītikkamana vasena tisso sīla pāramiyaḥ tesu eva tividhesu vatthūsu ālayam upacchinditvā

original: nikkhamanavasena tisso nekkhammapāramiyo, upakaraṇaaṅgajīvitataṇhaṃ samūhanitvā sattānaṃ
analyzed: nikkhamana vasena tissaḥ nekkhamma pāramiyaḥ upakaraṇa aṅga jīvita taṇham samūhanitvā sattānam

original: hitāhitavinicchayakaraṇavasena tisso paññāpāramiyo, yathāvuttabhedānaṃ pariccāgādīnaṃ
analyzed: hita ahita vinicchaya karaṇa vasena tisso paññāpāramiyaḥ yathā vutta bhedānam pariccāga ādīnam

original: vāyamanavasena tisso vīriyapāramiyo, upakaraṇaaṅgajīvitantarāyakarānaṃ khamanavasena
analyzed: vāyamana vasena tissaḥ vīriya pāramiyaḥ upakaraṇa aṅga jīvita antarāya karānam khamana vasena

original: tisso khantipāramiyo, upakaraṇaaṅgajīvitahetu saccāpariccāgavasena tisso saccapāramiyo,
analyzed: tissaḥ khanti pāramiyaḥ upakaraṇa aṅga jīvita hetu sacca a pariccāga vasena tisso sacca pāramiyaḥ

original: dānādipāramiyo akuppādhiṭṭhānavaseneva samijjhantīti upakaraṇādivināsepi acalādhiṭṭhānavasena
analyzed: dāna ādi pāramiyaḥ akuppa adhiṭṭhāna vasena iva samijjhanti iti upakaraṇa ādi vināse pi acala adhiṭṭhāna vasena

original: tisso adhiṭṭhānapāramiyo, upakaraṇādivighātakesupi sattesu mettāya avijahanavasena
analyzed: tissaḥ adhiṭṭhāna pāramiyaḥ upakaraṇa ādi vighātakesu pi sattesu mettāya a vijahana vasena

original: tisso mettāpāramiyo, yathāvuttavatthuttayassa upakārāpakāresu sattasaṅkhāresu majjhattatāpaṭilābhavasena
analyzed: tissaḥ mettā pāramiyaḥ yathāvutta vatthuttayassa upakāra apakāresu satta saṅkhāresu majjhatta tā paṭilābha vasena

original: tisso upekkhāpāramiyoti evamādinā etāsaṃ vibhāgo veditabbo.
analyzed: tissaḥ upekkhā pāramiyaḥ ti evamādinā etāsam vibhāgaḥ veditabbo

original: Ko saṅgahoti ettha pana –
analyzed: kaḥ saṅgahaḥ ti ettha pana

original: Yathā vibhāgato tiṃsa-vidhā saṅgahato dasa;
analyzed: yathā vibhāgataḥ tiṃsavidhā saṅgahataḥ dasa

original: Chappakārāva etāsu, yugaḷādīhi sādhaye.
analyzed: etāsu yugaḷa ādīhi sādhaye

original: Yathā hi esā vibhāgato tiṃsavidhāpi dānapāramiādibhāvato dasavidhā, evaṃ dānasīlakhantivīriyajhānapaññāsabhāvena
analyzed: yathā hi esā vibhāgataḥ tiṃsavidhā api dāna pārami ādi bhāvataḥ dasavidhā evam dāna sīla khanti vīriya jhāna paññā sa bhāvena

original: chabbidhā. Etāsu hi nekkhammapāramī sīlapāramiyā saṅgahitā tassā pabbajjābhāve. Nīvaraṇavivekabhāve
analyzed: chabbidhā etāsu hi nekkhamma pāramī sīla pāramiyā saṅgahitā tassā pabbajja abhāve nīvaraṇa viveka bhāve

original: pana jhānapāramiyā, kusaladhammabhāve chahipi saṅgahitā, saccapāramī sīlapāramiyā
analyzed: pana jhāna pāramiyā kusala dhamma bhāve chahi pi saṅgahitā sacca pāramī sīla pāramiyā

original: ekadesā eva vacīsaccaviratisaccapakkhe. Ñāṇasaccapakkhe pana paññāpāramiyā saṅgahitā,
analyzed: eka desāḥ eva vacī sacca virati sacca pakkhe ñāṇa sacca pakkhe pana paññāpāramiyā saṅgahitā

original: mettāpāramī jhānapāramiyā eva, upekkhāpāramī jhānapaññāpāramīhi, adhiṭṭhānapāramī
analyzed: mettā pāramī jhāna pāramiyā eva upekkhā pāramī jhāna paññāpāramīhi adhiṭṭhāna pāramī

original: sabbāhipi saṅgahitāti.
analyzed: sabbāhi pi saṅgahitā ati

original: Etesañca dānādīnaṃ channaṃ guṇānaṃ aññamaññasambandhānaṃ pañcadasa yugaḷādīni pañcadasa
analyzed: etesam ca dāna ādīnam channam guṇānam aññamañña sambandhānam pañcadasa yugaḷa ādīni pañcadasa

original: yugaḷādisādhakāni honti. Seyyathidaṃ? Dānasīlayugaḷena parahitāhitānaṃ karaṇākaraṇayugaḷasiddhi,
analyzed: yugaḷa ādi sādhakāni honti sā iyyathidam dāna sīla yugaḷena karaṇa akaraṇa yugaḷa siddhi

original: dānakhantiyugaḷena alobhādosayugaḷasiddhi, dānavīriyayugaḷena cāgasutayugaḷasiddhi,
analyzed: dāna khanti yugaḷena dāna vīriya yugaḷena cāga suta yugaḷa siddhi

original: dānajhānayugaḷena kāmadosappahānayugaḷasiddhi, dānapaññāyugaḷena ariyayānadhurayugaḷasiddhi,
analyzed: dāna jhāna yugaḷena kāma dosa ppahāna yugaḷa siddhi dāna paññā yugaḷena ariya yāna dhura yugaḷa siddhi

original: sīlakhantidvayena payogāsayasuddhadvayasiddhi, sīlavīriyadvayena bhāvanādvayasiddhi,
analyzed: sīla khanti dvayena sīla vīriya dvayena bhāvanā dvaya siddhi

original: sīlajhānadvayena dussīlyapariyuṭṭhānappahānadvayasiddhi, sīlapaññādvayena dānadvayasiddhi,
analyzed: sīla jhāna dvayena dussīlya pariyuṭṭhāna ppahāna dvaya siddhi sīla paññā dvayena dāna dvaya siddhi

original: khantivīriyadvayena khamātejadvayasiddhi, khantijhānadukena virodhānurodhappahānadukasiddhi,
analyzed: khanti vīriya dvayena khamā teja dvaya siddhi khanti jhāna dukena virodha anurodha ppahāna duka siddhi

original: khantipaññādukena suññatākhantipaṭivedhadukasiddhi, vīriyajhānadukena paggahāvikkhepadukasiddhi,
analyzed: khanti paññā dukena suñña tā khanti paṭivedha duka siddhi vīriya jhāna dukena paggaha avikkhepa duka siddhi

original: vīriyapaññādukena saraṇadukasiddhi, jhānapaññādukena yānadukasiddhi. Dānasīlakhantitikena
analyzed: vīriya paññā dukena saraṇa duka siddhi jhāna paññā dukena yāna duka siddhi dāna sīla khantitikena

original: lobhadosamohappahānatikasiddhi, dānasīlavīriyatikena bhogajīvitakāyasārādānatikasiddhi,
analyzed: lobha dosa moha ppahāna atika siddhi dāna sīla vīriya tikena bhoga jīvita kāya sāra ādāna atika siddhi

original: dānasīlajhānatikena puññakiriyavatthutikasiddhi, dānasīlapaññātikena āmisābhayadhammadānatikasiddhīti
analyzed: dāna sīla jhāna tikena puñña kiriya vatthutika siddhi dāna sīla paññātikena āmisa abhaya dhamma dāna tika siddhi iti

original: evaṃ itarehipi tikehi, catukkādīhi ca yathāsambhavaṃ tikāni, catukkādīni ca yojetabbāni.
analyzed: evam itarehi pi tikehi catukka ādīhi ca yathāsambhavam tikāni catukka ādīni ca yojetabbāni

original: Evaṃ chabbidhānampi pana imāsaṃ pāramīnaṃ catūhi adhiṭṭhānehi saṅgaho veditabbo.
analyzed: evam chabbidhānam api pana imāsam pāramīnam catūhi adhiṭṭhānehi saṅgahaḥ veditabbo

original: Sabbapāramīnaṃ samūhasaṅgahato hi cattāri adhiṭṭhānāni. Seyyathidaṃ? Saccādhiṭṭhānaṃ,
analyzed: sabba pāramīnam samūha saṅgahato hi cattāri adhiṭṭhānāni seyyathīdam sacca adhiṭṭhānam

original: cāgādhiṭṭhānaṃ, upasamādhiṭṭhānaṃ, paññādhiṭṭhānanti. Tattha adhitiṭṭhati etena,
analyzed: cāga adhiṭṭhānam upasama adhiṭṭhānam paññā adhiṭṭhānam ti tattha adhitiṭṭhati etena

original: ettha vā adhitiṭṭhati, adhiṭṭhānamattameva vā tanti adhiṭṭhānaṃ, saccañca taṃ adhiṭṭhānañca,
analyzed: ettha vā adhitiṭṭhati adhiṭṭhāna mattam eva vā adhiṭṭhānam saccam ca tam adhiṭṭhānañca

original: saccassa vā adhiṭṭhānaṃ, saccaṃ vā adhiṭṭhānametassāti saccādhiṭṭhānaṃ. Evaṃ sesesupi.
analyzed: saccassa vā adhiṭṭhānam saccam vā adhiṭṭhānam etassa ati sacca adhiṭṭhānam evam sesesu pi

original: Tattha avisesato tāva katābhinīhārassa anukampitasabbasattassa mahāsattassa paṭiññānurūpaṃ
analyzed: tattha avisesato tāva kata abhinīhārassa anukampita sabba sattassa mahāsattassa paṭiññā anurūpam

original: sabbapāramīpariggahato saccādhiṭṭhānaṃ, tesaṃ paṭipakkhapariccāgato cāgādhiṭṭhānaṃ,
analyzed: sabba pāramī pariggahato sacca adhiṭṭhānam tesam paṭipakkha pariccāgato cāga adhiṭṭhānam

original: sabbapāramitāguṇehi upasamanato upasamādhiṭṭhānaṃ. Tehi eva parahitesu upāyakosallato paññādhiṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: sabba pāramitā guṇehi upasamanataḥ upasamā dhiṭṭhānam tehi eva para hitesu upāya kosallato paññā adhiṭṭhānam

original: Visesato pana “yācakānaṃ janānaṃ avisaṃvādetvā dassāmī”ti paṭijānanato, paṭiññaṃ
analyzed: visesataḥ pana yācakānam janānam a visaṃvādetvā dassāmi iti paṭijānanato paṭiññam

original: avisaṃvādetvā dānato, dānaṃ avisaṃvādetvā anumodanato, macchariyādipaṭipakkhapariccāgato,
analyzed: a visaṃvādetvā dānataḥ dānam a visaṃvādetvā anumodanataḥ macchariya ādi paṭipakkha pariccāgato

original: deyyapaṭiggāhakadānadeyyadhammakkhayesu lobhadosamohabhayavūpasamanato, yathārahaṃ
analyzed: deyya paṭiggāhaka dāna deyya dhamma kkhayesu lobha dosa moha bhaya vūpasamanataḥ yathāraham

original: yathākālaṃ yathāvidhānañca dānato, paññuttarato ca kusaladhammānaṃ caturadhiṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: yathākālam yathā vidhānam ca dānataḥ paññuttarataḥ ca kusala dhammānam catur adhiṭṭhāna padaṭṭhānam

original: dānaṃ. Tathā saṃvarasamādānassa avītikkamanato, dussīlyapariccāgato, duccaritavūpasamanato,
analyzed: dānam tathā saṃvara samādānassa a vītikkamanataḥ dussīlya pariccāgataḥ duccarita vūpasamanataḥ

original: paññuttarato ca caturadhiṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānaṃ sīlaṃ. Yathāpaṭiññaṃ khamanato, katāparādhavikappapariccāgato,
analyzed: paññuttarato ca catur adhiṭṭhāna padaṭṭhānam sīlam yathāpaṭiññam khamanataḥ kata aparādha vikappa pariccāgato

original: kodhapariyuṭṭhānavūpasamanato, paññuttarato ca caturadhiṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānākhanti. Paṭiññānurūpaṃ
analyzed: kodha pariyuṭṭhāna vūpasamanataḥ paññuttarataḥ ca catur adhiṭṭhāna padaṭṭhāna akhanti paṭiññā anurūpam

original: parahitakaraṇato, visayapariccāgato, akusalavūpasamanato, paññuttarato ca caturadhiṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: para hita karaṇataḥ visaya pariccāgataḥ akusala vūpasamanataḥ paññuttarataḥ ca catur adhiṭṭhāna padaṭṭhānam

original: vīriyaṃ. Paṭiññānurūpaṃ lokahitānucintanato, nīvaraṇapariccāgato, cittavūpasamanato,
analyzed: vīriyam paṭiññā anurūpam loka hita anucintanataḥ nīvaraṇa pariccāgataḥ citta vūpasamanataḥ

original: paññuttarato ca caturadhiṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānaṃ jhānaṃ. Yathāpaṭiññaṃ parahitūpāyakosallato,
analyzed: paññuttarataḥ ca catur adhiṭṭhāna padaṭṭhānam jhānam yathāpaṭiññam para hitu upāya kosallato

original: anupāyakiriyapariccāgato, mohajapariḷāhavūpasamanato, sabbaññutāpaṭilābhato ca caturadhiṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānā paññā.
analyzed: an upāya kiriya pariccāgataḥ moha ja pariḷāha vūpasamanataḥ sabbaññu tā paṭilābhato ca catur adhiṭṭhāna padaṭṭhānā paññā

original: Tattha ñeyyapaṭiññānuvidhānehi saccādhiṭṭhānaṃ, vatthukāmakilesakāmapariccāgehi cāgādhiṭṭhānaṃ,
analyzed: tattha ñeyya paṭiññā anuvidhānehi sacca adhiṭṭhānam vatthu kāma kilesa kāma pariccāgehi cāga adhiṭṭhānam

original: dosadukkhavūpasamehi upasamādhiṭṭhānaṃ, anubodhapaṭivedhehi paññādhiṭṭhānaṃ. Tividhasaccapariggahitaṃ
analyzed: dosa dukkha vūpasamehi upasama adhiṭṭhānam anubodha paṭivedhehi paññā adhiṭṭhānam tividha sacca pariggahitam

original: dosattayavirodhi saccādhiṭṭhānaṃ, tividhacāgapariggahitaṃ dosattayavirodhi cāgādhiṭṭhānaṃ,
analyzed: dosa ttaya virodhi sacca adhiṭṭhānam tividha cāga pariggahitam dosa ttaya virodhi cāga adhiṭṭhānam

original: tividhavūpasamapariggahitaṃ dosattayavirodhi upasamādhiṭṭhānaṃ, tividhañāṇapariggahitaṃ
analyzed: tividha vūpasama pariggahitam dosa ttaya virodhi upasama adhiṭṭhānam tividha ñāṇa pariggahitam

original: dosattayavirodhi paññādhiṭṭhānaṃ. Saccādhiṭṭhānapariggahitāni cāgūpasamapaññādhiṭṭhānāni
analyzed: dosa ttaya virodhi paññā adhiṭṭhānam sacca adhiṭṭhāna pariggahitāni ca agūpasama paññā adhiṭṭhānāni

original: avisaṃvādanato, paṭiññānuvidhānato ca. Cāgādhiṭṭhānapariggahitāni saccūpasamapaññādhiṭṭhānāni
analyzed: a visaṃvādanato paṭiññā anuvidhānato ca cāga adhiṭṭhāna pariggahitāni sacca upasama paññā adhiṭṭhānāni

original: paṭipakkhapariccāgato, sabbapariccāgaphalattā ca. Upasamādhiṭṭhānapariggahitāni saccacāgapaññādhiṭṭhānāni
analyzed: paṭipakkha pariccāgataḥ sabba pariccāga phala ttā ca upasama adhiṭṭhāna pariggahitāni sacca cāga paññā adhiṭṭhānāni

original: kilesapariḷāhūpasamanato, kammapariḷāhūpasamanato ca. Paññādhiṭṭhānapariggahitāni
analyzed: kilesa pariḷāha upasamanataḥ kamma pariḷāha upasamanataḥ ca paññā adhiṭṭhāna pariggahitāni

original: saccacāgūpasamādhiṭṭhānāni ñāṇapubbaṅgamato, ñāṇānuparivattanato cāti evaṃ sabbāpi
analyzed: sacca cāga upasama adhiṭṭhānāni ñāṇa pubbaṅgamataḥ ñāṇa anuparivattanato ca ati evam sabbā api

original: pāramiyo saccappabhāvitā cāgaparibyañjitā upasamopabrūhitā paññāparisuddhā. Saccañhi
analyzed: pāramiyaḥ sacca ppabhāvitā cāga paribyañjitā upasamopabrūhitā paññā parisuddhā

original: etāsaṃ janakahetu, cāgo paṭiggāhakahetu, upasamo paribuddhihetu paññā pārisuddhihetu.
analyzed: etāsam janaka hetu cāgaḥ paṭiggāhaka hetu upasamaḥ paribuddhi hetu paññā pārisuddhi hetu

original: Tathā ādimhi saccādhiṭṭhānaṃ saccapaṭiññattā, majjhe cāgādhiṭṭhānaṃ katapaṇidhānassa
analyzed: tathā ādimhi sacca adhiṭṭhānam sacca paṭiññattā majjhe cāga adhiṭṭhānam kata paṇidhānassa

original: parahitāya attapariccāgato, ante upasamādhiṭṭhānaṃ sabbūpasamapariyosānattā. Ādimajjhapariyosānesu
analyzed: para hitāya atta pariccāgato ante upasama adhiṭṭhānam sabba upasama pariyosāna ttā ādi majjha pariyosānesu

original: paññādhiṭṭhānaṃ tasmiṃ sati sambhavato, asati asambhavato, yathāpaṭiññañca sambhavato.
analyzed: paññā adhiṭṭhānam tasmin sati sambhavataḥ asati asambhavataḥ yathāpaṭiññam ca sambhavataḥ

original: Tattha mahāpurisā satataṃ attahitaparahitakarehi garupiyabhāvakarehi saccacāgādhiṭṭhānehi
analyzed: tattha mahā purisā satatam atta hita para hita karehi garupiya bhāva karehi sacca cāga adhiṭṭhānehi

original: gihibhūtā āmisadānena pare anuggaṇhanti. Tathā attahitaparahitakarehi, garupiyabhāvakarehi,
analyzed: gihi bhūtāḥ āmisa dānena pare anuggaṇhanti tathā atta hita para hita karehi garupiya bhāva karehi

original: upasamapaññādhiṭṭhānehi ca pabbajitabhūtā dhammadānena pare anuggaṇhanti.
analyzed: upasama paññā adhiṭṭhānehi ca pabbajita bhūtāḥ dhamma dānena pare anuggaṇhanti

original: Tattha antimabhave bodhisattassa caturadhiṭṭhānaparipūraṇaṃ. Paripuṇṇacaturadhiṭṭhānassa
analyzed: tattha antima bhave bodhisattassa catur adhiṭṭhāna paripūraṇam paripuṇṇa catur adhiṭṭhānassa

original: hi carimakabhavūpapattīti eke. Tatrāpi hi gabbhāvakkantiabhinikkhamanesu paññādhiṭṭhānasamudāgamena
analyzed: hi carimaka bhava upapatti iti eke tatra api hi gabbha avakkanti abhinikkhamanesu paññā adhiṭṭhāna samudāgamena

original: sato sampajāno saccādhiṭṭhānapāripūriyā sampatijāto uttarābhimukho sattapadavītihārena
analyzed: sataḥ sampajāno sacca adhiṭṭhāna pāripūriyā sampatijātaḥ uttara abhimukhaḥ satta padavī tihārena

original: gantvā sabbā disā oloketvā saccānuparivattinā vacasā “aggohamasmi lokassa, jeṭṭhohamasmi
analyzed: gantvā sabbāḥ disāḥ oloketvā sacca anuparivattinā vacasā aggaḥ uham asmi lokassa jeṭṭhaḥ uham asmi

original: lokassa, seṭṭhohamasmi lokassā”ti tikkhattuṃ sīhanādaṃ nadi, upasamādhiṭṭhānasamudāgamena
analyzed: lokassa seṭṭhaḥ ham asmi lokassa ati tikkhattum sīhanādam nadi upasama adhiṭṭhāna samudāgamena

original: Āsabhinti uttamaṃ, akampanikaṃ vā, nibbhayanti attho. Usabhassa idanti hi āsabhaṃ,

original: tathā, iminā musāsaṅkhātena kāyavacīpayogena, musāsaṅkhātaṃ vā kāyavacīpayogaṃ vadati
analyzed: tathā iminā musā saṅkhātena kāya vacī payogena musā saṅkhātam vā kāya vacī payogam vadati

original: viññāpeti, samuṭṭhāpeti vā etenāti musāvādoti atthamāha. “Vādo”ti vutte visaṃvādanacittaṃ,
analyzed: viññāpeti samuṭṭhāpeti vā etena ati musāvādaḥ ti attham āha vādaḥ ti vutte visaṃvādana cittam

original: tajjo vāyāmo, parassa tadatthavijānananti lakkhaṇattayaṃ vibhāvitameva hoti.
analyzed: tad jaḥ vā āyāmaḥ parassa tad attha vijānana nti lakkhaṇa ttayam vibhāvitam eva hoti

original: “Atathaṃ vatthu”nti lakkhaṇaṃ pana avibhāvitameva musā-saddassa payogasaṅkhātakiriyāvācakattā.
analyzed: atatham vatthun ti lakkhaṇam pana avibhāvitam eva musā saddassa payoga saṅkhāta kiriyā vācaka ttā

original: Tasmā idha naye lakkhaṇassa abyāpitatāya, musā-saddassa ca visaṃvāditabbatthavācakatāsambhavato
analyzed: tasmai idha naye lakkhaṇassa a byāpita tāya musā saddassa ca

original: paripuṇṇaṃ katvā musāvādalakkhaṇaṃ dassetuṃ “aparo nayo”tiādi vuttaṃ. Lakkhaṇatoti
analyzed: paripuṇṇam katvā musāvāda lakkhaṇam dassetuṃ aparaḥ naya uti ādi vuttam lakkhaṇato ti

original: sabhāvato. Tathāti tena tathākārena. Kāyavacīviññattiyo samuṭṭhāpetīti viññattisamuṭṭhāpikā.
analyzed: sabhāvataḥ tathā ti tena tathākārena kāya vacī viññattiyaḥ samuṭṭhāpeti iti viññatti samuṭṭhāpikā

original: Imasmiṃ pana naye musā vatthu vadīyati vuccati etenāti musāvādoti nibbacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: imasmin pana naye musā vatthu vadīyati vuccati etena ati musāvādaḥ ti nibbacanam daṭṭhabbam

original: “So yamattha”ntiādinā kammapathappattassa vatthuvasena appasāvajjamahāsāvajjabhāvamāha.
analyzed: saḥ yam attha nti ādinā kamma patha ppattassa vatthu vasena appa sāvajja mahāsāvajja bhāvam āha

original: Yassa atthaṃ bhañjati, tassa appaguṇatāya appasāvajjo, mahāguṇatāya mahāsāvajjoti
analyzed: yassa attham bhañjati tassa appaguṇa tāya appasāvajjaḥ mahāguṇa tāya mahāsāvajjaḥ iti

original: adinnādāne viya guṇavasenāpi yojetabbaṃ. Kilesānaṃ mudutibbatāvasenāpi appasāvajjamahāsāvajjatā labbhatiyeva.
analyzed: adinnādāne viya guṇa vasena api yojetabbam kilesānam mudu tibba tā vasena api appa sāvajja mahāsāvajja tā

original: “Apicā”tiādinā musāvādasāmaññassāpi appasāvajjamahāsāvajjabhāvaṃ dasseti. Attano
analyzed: apica ati ādinā musāvāda sāmaññassa api appasāvajja mahāsāvajja bhāvam dasseti attano

original: santakaṃ adātukāmatāyāti, hi hasādhippāyenāti ca musāvādasāmaññato vuttaṃ. Ubhayatthāpi
analyzed: santakam a dātu kāma tāya iti hi hasa adhippāyena ati ca musāvāda sāmaññato vuttam ubhayattha api

original: ca visaṃvādanapurekkhāreneva musāvādo, na pana vacanamattena. Tattha pana cetanā
analyzed: ca visaṃvādana purekkhārena iva musāvādaḥ na pana vacana mattena tattha pana cetanā

original: balavatī na hotīti appasāvajjatā vuttā. Nadī maññeti nadī viya. Appatāya ūnassa atthassa
analyzed: balavatī na hoti iti appa sāvajja tā vuttā nadī maññeti nadī viya appa tāya ūnassa atthassa

original: pūraṇavasena pavattā kathā pūraṇakathā, bahutarabhāvena vuttakathāti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: pūraṇa vasena pavattā kathā pūraṇa kathā bahutara bhāvena vutta kathā iti vuttam hoti

original: Tenākārena jāto tajjo, tassa visaṃvādanassa anurūpoti attho. Vāyāmoti vāyāmasīsena
analyzed: tena ākārena jātaḥ tajjo tassa visaṃvādanassa anurūpo ti attho vāyāmaḥ iti vāyāma sīsena

original: payogamāha. Vīriyappadhānā hi kāyikavācasikakiriyā idha adhippetā, na vāyāmamattaṃ.
analyzed: payogam āha vīriya ppadhānāḥ hi kāyika vācasika kiriyāḥ idha adhippetāḥ na vā āyāma mattam

original: Visaṃvādanādhippāyena payoge katepi aparena tasmiṃ atthe aviññāte visaṃvādanassa
analyzed: visaṃvādana adhippāyena payoge kate api aparena tasmin atthe a viññāte visaṃvādanassa

original: asijjhanato parassa tadatthavijānanampi ekasambhārabhāvena vuttaṃ. Keci pana “abhūtavacanaṃ,
analyzed: parassa tad attha vijānanam pi eka sambhāra bhāvena vuttam keci pana abhūta vacanam

original: visaṃvādanacittaṃ, parassa tadatthavijānana”nti tayo sambhāre vadanti. Kāyikova sāhatthikoti
analyzed: visaṃvādana cittam parassa tad attha vijānanan ti tayo sambhāre vadanti kāyikaḥ uva sāhatthikaḥ ti

original: koci maññeyyāti taṃ nivāraṇatthaṃ “so kāyena vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tāya ce kiriyāya paro
analyzed: koci maññeyyāti tam nivāraṇa attham so kāyena vā iti ādi vuttam tāya ce kiriyāya paraḥ

original: tamatthaṃ jānātīti taṅkhaṇe vā dandhatāya vicāretvā pacchā vā jānanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.

original: cetanāya pavattakkhaṇe eva. Musāvādakammunā bajjhatīti visaṃvādanacetanāsaṅkhātena

original: saṅgahakārassa attano matibhedaṃ dassetuṃ “yasmā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha “yathā…pe…
analyzed: saṅgaha kārassa attanaḥ mati bhedam dassetum yasmā pana ati ādi vuttam tattha yathā pe

original: tathā”ti etena sāhatthiko viya āṇattikādayopi gahetabbā, aggahaṇe kāraṇaṃ natthi

original: gahaṇe kāraṇaṃ, “paṇṇaṃ…pe… nissajjantopī”ti nissaggiyassa, “ayamattho…pe… ṭhapentopī”ti
analyzed: gahaṇe kāraṇam nissajjantaḥ upi iti nissaggiyassa ayam atthaḥ upe ṭhapentaḥ upi iti

original: Saccanti vacīsaccaṃ, saccena saccanti purimena vacīsaccena pacchimaṃ vacīsaccaṃ. Paccayavasena dhātupadantalopaṃ sandhāya “sandahatī”ti vuttaṃ. Saddavidū pana –

original: Pharusanti sinehābhāvena lūkhaṃ. Sayampi pharusāti domanassasamuṭṭhitattā sabhāvena

original: Ettha pana paṭhamanaye pharusaṃ karotīti vacanatthena vā phalūpacārena vā vācāya
analyzed: ettha pana paṭhama naye pharusam karoti iti vacana tthena vā phala upacārena vā vācāya

analyzed: pharusa sadda ppavatti veditabbā dutiya naye mamma cheda vasena pavattiyāḥ ekanta niṭṭhura tāya

original: Yenāti palāpasaṅkhātena niratthakavacanena. Samphanti “sa”nti vuttaṃ sukhaṃ, hitañca

original: tassāyeva ca pahātabbatā yuttito adhippetāti attho.

analyzed: upatāpita cittassa vā dūsita cittassa ati vuttam hoti cetanā iti etena sambandhaḥ yena

analyzed: byāsa visaye upacāra vasena ati daṭṭhabbam yassa yatas bhedam karoti tesu abhinnesu

analyzed: yassa pesuññam upasaṃharati saḥ bhijjatu vā mā vā tassa tad attha viññāpanam eva pamāṇanti

original: Nimitte cetaṃ bhummaṃ, bhāvalakkhaṇe vā. Acchathāti nisīdatha. Bhuñjantassevāti bhuñjato
analyzed: nimitte ca itam bhummam bhāva lakkhaṇe vā acchatha ati nisīdatha bhuñjantassa iva ati bhuñjataḥ

original: eva bhikkhuno, sampadānavacanaṃ, anādaratthe vā sāmivacanaṃ. Kiriyantarāvacchedanayogena
analyzed: eva bhikkhuno sampadāna vacanam an ādara atthe vā sāmi vacanam kiriya antara avacchedana yogena

original: hettha anādaratā. Gīvāyāmakanti bhāvanapuṃsakavacanaṃ, gīvaṃ āyametvā āyataṃ katvāti
analyzed: ha itthā an ādara tā bhāva napuṃsaka vacanam gīvam āyam etvā āyatam katvā iti

original: attho, yathā vā bhutte atibhuttatāya gīvā āyamitabbā hoti, tathātipi vaṭṭati. Catumāsampīti
analyzed: atthaḥ yathā vā bhutte ati bhutta tāya gīvā āyamitabbā hoti tathā atipi vaṭṭati catu māsam pi iti

original: vassānassa cattāro māsepi. Kuṭumbaṃ vuccati dhanaṃ, tadassatthīti kuṭumbiko, muṇḍo
analyzed: vassānassa cattāraḥ māse pi kuṭumbam vuccati dhanam tat assa atthi iti kuṭumbikaḥ muṇḍaḥ

original: ca so kuṭumbiko cāti muṇḍakuṭumbiko, tassa jīvikaṃ tathā, taṃ katvā jīvatīti attho.
analyzed: ca so kuṭumbiko ca ati muṇḍa kuṭumbiko tassa jīvikam tathā tam katvā jīvati iti attho

original: Nayadassanamattañcetaṃ āmisapadena dassitānaṃ sannidhivatthūnanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: āmisa padena dassitānam sannidhi vatthūnam ti daṭṭhabbam

original: Tabbirahitaṃ samaṇapaṭipattiṃ dassento “bhikkhuno panā”tiādimāha. Tattha “guḷapiṇḍo
analyzed: tad virahitam samaṇa paṭipattim dassentaḥ bhikkhuno pana iti ādim āha tattha guḷa piṇḍaḥ

original: tālapakkappamāṇa”nti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ. Catubhāgamattanti kuṭumbamattanti
analyzed: tāla pakkappamāṇanti sāratthadīpaniyam vuttam catu bhāga mattanti kuṭumba mattanti

original: vuttaṃ. “Ekā taṇḍulanāḷī”ti vuttattā pana tassā catubhāgo ekapatthoti vadanti. Vuttañca –

original: “Kuḍuvo pasato eko, pattho te caturo siyuṃ;
analyzed: kuḍuvaḥ pasataḥ ekaḥ patthaḥ te caturaḥ siyum

original: Āḷhako caturo patthā, doṇaṃ vā caturāḷhaka”nti.
analyzed: āḷhakaḥ caturo patthā doṇam vā

original: Kasmāti vuttaṃ “te hī”tiādi. Āharāpetvāpi ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati, pageva yathāladdhaṃ.
analyzed: kasmā iti vuttam te hi itiādi āharāpetvā api ṭhapetum vaṭṭati pagā iva yathāladdham

original: Sammutikuṭikādayo catasso, avāsāgārabhūtena vā uposathāgārādinā saha pañcakuṭiyo

original: sandhāya “kappiyakuṭiya”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Sannidhi nāma natthi tattha antovutthaantopakkassa

original: anuññātattā. “Tathāgatassā”tiādinā adhikārānurūpaṃ atthaṃ payojeti. Pilotikakhaṇḍanti jiṇṇacoḷakhaṇḍaṃ.
analyzed: anuññāta ttā tathāgatassa ati ādinā adhikāra anurūpam attham payojeti pilotika khaṇḍanti jiṇṇa coḷa khaṇḍam

original: 13. “Gīvaṃ pasāretvā”ti etena sayameva āpāthagamane doso natthīti dasseti. Ettakampīti
analyzed: gīvam pasāretvā iti etena sayam eva āpātha gamane doso natthi iti dasseti ettakam pi iti

original: vinicchayavicāraṇā vatthukittanampi. Payojanamattamevāti padatthayojanamattameva.
analyzed: vinicchaya vicāraṇā vatthu kittanam pi payojana mattam evā ati padattha yojana mattam eva

original: Yassa pana padassa vitthārakathaṃ vinā na sakkā attho viññātuṃ, tattha vitthārakathāpi

original: padatthasaṅgahameva gacchati.
analyzed: padattha saṅgaham eva gacchati

original: Kutūhalavasena pekkhitabbato pekkhaṃ, naṭasatthavidhinā payogo. Naṭasamūhena pana

original: janasamūhe kattabbavasena “naṭasammajja”nti vuttaṃ. Janānaṃ sammadde samūhe katanti

original: hi sammajjaṃ. Sārasamāse pana “pekkhāmaha”ntipi vadanti, “sammajjadassanussava”nti
analyzed: hi sammajjam sārasa māse pana vadanti

original: tesaṃ mate attho. Bhāratanāmakānaṃ dvebhātukarājūnaṃ, rāmarañño ca yujjhanādikaṃ

original: tappasutehi ācikkhitabbato akkhānaṃ. Gantumpi na vaṭṭati, pageva taṃ sotuṃ. Pāṇinā

original: tāḷitabbaṃ saraṃ pāṇissaranti āha “kaṃsatāḷa”nti, lohamayo tūriyajātiviseso kaṃso,
analyzed: tāḷitabbam saram āha kaṃsatāḷanti loha mayaḥ tūriya jāti visesaḥ kaṃsaḥ

original: pāṇitāḷantipi vadanti. Ghanasaṅkhātānaṃ tūriyavisesānaṃ tāḷanaṃ ghanatāḷaṃ nāma,
analyzed: vadanti ghana saṅkhātānam tūriya visesānam tāḷanam ghanatāḷam nāma

original: daṇḍamayasammatāḷaṃ silātalākatāḷaṃ vā. Mantenāti bhūtāvisanamantena. Eketi sārasamāsācariyā,

original: uttaravihāravāsino ca, yathā cettha, evamito paresupi “eke”ti āgataṭṭhānesu. Te kira

original: dīghanikāyassatthavisesavādino. Caturassaambaṇakatāḷaṃ nāma rukkhasāradaṇḍādīsu yena
analyzed: nāma rukkha sāra daṇḍa ādīsu yena

original: kenaci caturassaambaṇaṃ katvā catūsu passesu dhammena onaddhitvā vāditabhaṇḍassa
analyzed: kenacid catur assa ambaṇam katvā catūsu passesu dhammena onaddhitvā vādita bhaṇḍassa

original: tāḷanaṃ. Tañhi ekādasadoṇappamāṇamānavisesasaṇṭhānattā “ambaṇaka”nti vuccati, bimbisakantipi
analyzed: tāḷanam tat hi ekādasa doṇa ppamāṇa māna visesa saṇṭhāna ttā ambaṇakanti vuccati bimbisakam ti pi

original: tasseva nāmaṃ. Tathā kumbhasaṇṭhānatāya kumbho, ghaṭoyeva vā, tassa dhunananti khuddakabhāṇakā.
analyzed: tassa iva nāmam tathā kumbha saṇṭhāna tāya kumbhaḥ vā tassa khuddakabhāṇakā

original: Abbhokkiraṇaṃ raṅgabalikaraṇaṃ. Te hi naccaṭṭhāne devatānaṃ balikaraṇaṃ nāma katvā
analyzed: raṅga bali karaṇam te hi nacca ṭṭhāne devatānam bali karaṇam nāma katvā

original: kīḷanti, yaṃ “nandī”tipi vuccati. Itthipurisasaṃyogādikilesajanakaṃ paṭibhānacittaṃ

original: sobhanakaraṇato sobhanakaraṃ nāma. “Sobhanagharaka”nti sārasamāse vuttaṃ. Caṇḍāya
analyzed: sobhana karaṇataḥ sobhanakaram nāma sobhana gharakam ti sārasa māse vuttam caṇḍāya

analyzed: alanti caṇḍālam ayaḥ guḷa kīḍā caṇḍālāḥ nāma hīna jātikā su nakha maṃsa bhojinaḥ tesam

analyzed: caṇḍālam sāṇe udakena temetvā aññam aññam ākoṭana kīḷā sāṇa dhovana kīḷā vaṃsena

original: Pariharitabbanti sāriyo pariharituṃ yuttakaṃ. Ito cito ca saranti parivattantīti

original: hi pāsako, catubbīsatividho akkho. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ –

original: Catukkaṃ bahulaṃ ñeyyaṃ, dvi bindusantibhadrakaṃ;
Catuvīsati āyā ca, munindena pakāsitā”ti.
analyzed: catuvīsati āyā ca munindena pakāsitā ati

original: Tena kīḷanamidha pāsakakīḷanaṃ. Ghaṭanaṃ paharaṇaṃ, tena kīḷā ghaṭikāti āha “dīghadaṇḍakenā”tiādi.
analyzed: tena pāsaka kīḷanam ghaṭanam paharaṇam tena kīḷā ghaṭikā iti āha dīghadaṇḍakena atiādi

original: Ghaṭena kumbhena kīḷā ghaṭikāti eke. Mañjiṭṭhikāya vāti mañjiṭṭhisaṅkhātassa yojanavallirukkhassa

original: ca pakkamadhusitthodakaṃ. Salākahatthanti tālahīrādīnaṃ kalāpassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
analyzed: ca pakka madhu sittha udakam salāka hattham ti tāla hīra ādīnam kalāpassa itam adhivacanam

original: Bahūsu salākāsu visesarahitaṃ ekaṃ salākaṃ gahetvā tāsu pakkhipitvā puna taññeva
analyzed: bahūsu salākāsu visesa rahitam ekam salākam gahetvā tāsu pakkhipitvā puna taññeva

original: uddharantā salākahatthena kīḷantīti keci. Guḷakīḷāti guḷaphalakīḷā, yena kenaci vā
analyzed: uddharantā salāka hatthena kīḷanti iti keci guḷa kīḷā ati guḷa phala kīḷā yena kenaci vā

original: kataguḷakīḷā. Paṇṇena vaṃsākārena katā nāḷikā paṇṇanāḷikā, tenevāha “taṃdhamantā”ti.
analyzed: kata guḷa kīḷā paṇṇena vaṃsa ākārena katā nāḷikā paṇṇa nāḷikā tena iva āha tam dhamanta iti

original: Khuddake ka-paccayoti dasseti “khuddakanaṅgala”nti iminā. Hatthapādānaṃ mokkhena
analyzed: khuddake ka paccayaḥ ti dasseti khuddaka naṅgalam ti iminā hattha pādānam mokkhena

original: mocanena cayati parivattati etāyāti mokkhacikā, tenāha “ākāse vā”tiādi. Paribbhamanattāyeva

original: 25. Devassāti meghassa. Dhārānuppavecchanaṃ vassanaṃ. Avaggāhoti dhārāya avaggahaṇaṃ

original: apanayanaṃ paṭuppādanaṃ [saṭuppādanaṃ (aṭṭhakathāyaṃ)] “saduppādana”ntipi paṭhanti,

original: Paṭibhānakavīti ettha aṅguttarāgame vuttānanti seso, kavīnaṃ kabyakaraṇanti sambandho,
analyzed: paṭibhāna kavi iti ettha aṅguttara āgame vuttānam ti sesaḥ kavīnam sambandhaḥ

original: etena kavīhi kataṃ, kavīnaṃ vā idaṃ kāveyyanti atthaṃ dasseti. “Attano cintāvasenā”tiādi
analyzed: etena kavīhi katam kavīnam vai idam kāveyyanti attham dasseti attanaḥ cintā vasena atiādi

original: tesaṃ sabhāvadassanaṃ. Tathā hi vatthuṃ, anusandhiñca sayameva cirena cintetvā karaṇavasena
analyzed: tesam sabhāva dassanam tathā hi vatthum anusandhim ca sayam eva cirena cintetvā karaṇa vasena

original: cintākavi veditabbo. Kiñci sutvā sutena asutaṃ anusandhetvā karaṇavasena sutakavi,
analyzed: cintā kavi veditabbaḥ kiñci sutvā sutena a sutam anusandhetvā karaṇa vasena suta kavi

original: kiñci atthaṃ upadhāretvā tassa saṅkhipanavitthāraṇādivasena atthakavi, yaṃ kiñci
analyzed: kiñci attham upadhāretvā tassa saṅkhipana vitthāraṇa ādi vasena attha kavi yam kiñci

original: parena kataṃ kabbaṃ vā nāṭakaṃ vā disvā taṃsadisameva aññaṃ attano ṭhānuppattikapaṭibhānena

original: “Kattabba”nti ettha visesanaṃ, “karissāmī”ti ettha vā bhāvanapuṃsakaṃ. Ṭhānuppattikapaṭibhānavasenāti

analyzed: kāraṇa anurūpam pavattanaka ñāṇa vasena jīvika atthāya iti pakaraṇa adhigata vasena iva vuttam

original: Kavīnaṃ idanti kabyaṃ, yaṃ “gīta”nti vuccati.
analyzed: kavīnam kabyam yam vuccati

original: 26. Pariggahabhāvena dārikāya gaṇhanaṃ āvāhanaṃ. Tathā dānaṃ vivāhanaṃ. Idha pana
analyzed: pariggaha bhāvena dārikāya gaṇhanam āvāhanam tathā dānam vivāhanam

analyzed: parassa dinnam pariyudañcanam pubbe paricchinna kāle a sampatte pi uddharita miṇam uṭṭhānam

original: yathāparicchinnakāle pana sampatte iṇanti keci, tadayuttameva iṇagahaṇeneva sijjhanato.
analyzed: yathā a paricchinna kāle pana sampatte keci tat ayuttam eva iṇa gahaṇena iva

original: Paresaṃ dinnaṃ iṇaṃ vā dhananti sambandho. Thāvaranti ciraṭṭhitikaṃ. Desantare diguṇatiguṇādigahaṇavasena
analyzed: paresam dinnam iṇam vā dhananti sambandho thāvaranti cira ṭṭhitikam desa antare diguṇa tiguṇa ādi gahaṇa vasena

analyzed: bhaṇḍa payojanam payogo tattha vā aññattha vā yathā kāla paricchedam vaḍḍhi gahaṇa vasena

analyzed: payojanam uddhāraḥ vāṇijam katvā ettakena udayena saha mūlam

original: dethā’ti dhanadānaṃ payogo, tāvakālikadānaṃ uddhāro”tipi vadanti. Ajja payojitaṃ
analyzed: dhana dānam vadanti payojitam

analyzed: diguṇam catuguṇam hoti iti yadi ajja payojitam bhaṇḍam evam aparajja diguṇam ajja

original: vinassanto kammaṃ vinā na vinassatīti adhippāyena tamaññātra dvīhi kāraṇehīti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: vinassantaḥ kammam vinā na vinassati iti adhippāyena tam aññā atra dvīhi kāraṇehi iti vuttam

original: Nibbāpanīyanti upasamakaraṃ. Paṭikammanti yathā te na khādanti, tathā paṭikaraṇaṃ.
analyzed: nibbāpanīyanti upasama karam paṭikammanti yathā te na khādanti tathā paṭikaraṇam

original: āvudhādinā saha ukkhittahatthānaṃ aññattha parivattanatthaṃ, attanā gopitaṭṭhāne

original: akhipetvā parattha khipanatthanti vuttaṃ hoti. Khipatīti ca aññattha khipatīti attho.
analyzed: a khipetvā parattha khipana atthanti vuttam hoti khipati iti ca aññattha khipati iti attho

original: Vinicchayaṭṭhāneti aḍḍavinicchayaṭṭhāne. Icchitatthassa devatāya kaṇṇe kathanavasena
analyzed: vinicchaya ṭṭhāne iti aḍḍa vinicchaya ṭṭhāne icchitatthassa devatāya kaṇṇe kathana vasena

original: jappanaṃ kaṇṇajappananti ca vadanti. Devataṃ otāretvāti ettha mantajappanena devatāya

analyzed: otāraṇam jīvika tthāya ati yathā pāricariyam katvā jīvita vutti hoti tathā jīvita vutti karaṇa tthāya

original: Ādiccapāricariyāti karamālāhi pūjaṃ katvā sakaladivasaṃ ādiccābhimukhāvaṭṭhānena
analyzed: ādicca pāricariyā ati kara mālāhi pūjam katvā sakala divasam ādicca abhimukha avaṭṭhānena

original: ādiccassa paricaraṇaṃ. “Tathevā”ti iminā “jīvikatthāyā”ti padamākaḍḍhati. Sirivhāyananti
analyzed: ādiccassa paricaraṇam tathā iva ati iminā jīvika atthāya ati padam ākaḍḍhati sirivhāyanam ti

original: ī-kārato a-kāralopena sandhiniddeso, tenāha “siriyā avhāyana”nti. “Sirenā”ti pana

original: ṭhānavasena avhāyanākāraṃ dasseti. Ye tu a-kārato a-kārassa lopaṃ katvā “siravhāyana”nti
analyzed: ṭhāna vasena avhāyana ākāram dasseti ye tu akārataḥ akārassa lopam katvā siravhāyananti

original: paṭhanti, tesaṃ pāṭhe ayamattho “mantaṃ jappetvā sirasā icchitassa atthassa avhāyana”nti.
analyzed: paṭhanti tesam pāṭhe ayam atthaḥ mantam jappetvā sirasā icchitassa atthassa

original: 27. Devaṭṭhānanti devāyatanaṃ. Upahāranti pūjaṃ. Samiddhikāleti āyācitassa atthassa
analyzed: deva ṭṭhāna nti devāyatanam upahāra nti pūjam samiddhi kāle iti āyācitassa atthassa

original: siddhakāle. Santipaṭissavakammanti devatāyācanāya yā santi paṭikattabbā, tassā paṭissavakaraṇaṃ.
analyzed: siddha kāle santi paṭissava kammanti devatā yācanāya yā santi paṭikattabbā tassā paṭissava karaṇam

original: Santīti cettha mantajappanena pūjākaraṇaṃ, tāya santiyā āyācanappayogoti attho. Tasminti
analyzed: santi iti ca ittha manta jappanena pūjā karaṇam tāya santiyā āyācana payogo ti attho tasmin ti

original: yaṃ “sace me idaṃ nāma samijjhissatī”ti vuttaṃ, tasmiṃ paṭissavaphalabhūte yathābhipatthitakammasmiṃ.
analyzed: yam sace me idam nāma samijjhissati iti vuttam tasmin paṭissava phala bhūte yathā abhipatthita kammasmin

original: Tassāti yo “paṇidhī”ti ca vutto, tassa paṭissavassa. Yathāpaṭissavañhi upahāre kate
analyzed: tassa ati yaḥ paṇidhi iti ca vutto tassa paṭissavassa yathāpaṭissavam hi upahāre kate

original: paṇidhiāyācanā katā niyyātitā hotīti. Gahitamantassāti uggahitamantassa. Payogakaraṇanti
analyzed: paṇidhi āyācanā katā niyyātitā hoti iti gahitam antassa ati uggahitam antassa payoga karaṇanti

original: upacārakammakaraṇaṃ. Itīti kāraṇatthe nipāto, tena vassavossa-saddānaṃ purisapaṇḍakesu
analyzed: upacāra kamma karaṇam iti iti kāraṇa atthe nipātaḥ tena purisa paṇḍakesu

original: pavattiṃ kāraṇabhāvena dasseti, paṇḍakato visesena asati bhavatīti vasso. Purisaliṅgato
analyzed: pavattim kāraṇa bhāvena dasseti paṇḍakataḥ visesena asati bhavati iti vassaḥ purisa liṅgato

original: virahena avaasati hīḷito hutvā bhavatīti vosso. Viseso rāgassavo yassāti vasso. Vigato
analyzed: virahena avaasati hīḷitaḥ hutvā bhavati iti vossaḥ visesaḥ rāga ssavaḥ yassa ati vassaḥ vigataḥ

original: rāgassavo yassāti vossoti niruttinayena padasiddhītipi vadanti. Vassakaraṇaṃ tadanurūpabhesajjena.
analyzed: rāga ssavaḥ yassa ati vossaḥ ti nirutti nayena vadanti vassa karaṇam tad anurūpa bhesajjena

original: Vossakaraṇaṃ pana uddhatabījatādināpi, teneva jātakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “vossavarāti uddhatabījā
analyzed: vossa karaṇam pana uddhata bīja tā ādinā api tena iva jāta kaṭṭha kathā ayam uddhata bījā

original: orodhapālakā”ti vuttaṃ. Acchandikabhāvamattanti itthiyā akāmabhāvamattaṃ. Liṅganti purisanimittaṃ.
analyzed: orodha pālakā iti vuttam acchandika bhāva mattam ti itthiyāḥ akāma bhāva mattam liṅgam ti purisa nimittam

original: Vatthubalikammakaraṇanti gharavatthusmiṃ balikammassa karaṇaṃ, taṃ pana upaddavapaṭibāhanatthaṃ,
analyzed: vatthu bali kamma karaṇam ti ghara vatthusmim bali kammassa karaṇam tam pana upaddava paṭibāhana attham

original: vaḍḍhanatthañca karonti, mantajappanena attano, aññesañca mukhasuddhikaraṇaṃ. Tesanti
analyzed: vaḍḍhana attham ca karonti manta jappanena attanaḥ aññesam ca mukha suddhi karaṇam tesan ti

original: aññesaṃ. Yoganti bhesajjapayogaṃ. Vamananti pacchindanaṃ. Uddhaṃvirecananti vamanabhedameva
analyzed: aññesam bhesajja payogam vamananti pacchindanam uddhaṃvirecananti vamana bhedam eva

original: “uddhaṃ dosānaṃ nīharaṇa”nti vuttattā. Virecananti pakativirecanameva. Adhovirecananti

original: paṭicchanno ghaṭo ālokena abhibyattiṃ gacchati, evamayampīti.
analyzed: paṭicchannaḥ ghaṭaḥ ālokena abhibyattim gacchati evam ayam pi iti

original: Idamettha vicāretabbaṃ – kiṃ karonto āloko ghaṭaṃ pakāsetīti vuccati, yadi ghaṭavisayaṃ

original: anuppannāya eva buddhiyā uppattidīpanato. Tathā sassatavādopi teneva kāraṇena. Atha

analyzed: dassā iti yā pana ati ādinā piya vatthu virahena piya vatthu alābhena vā citta vigghātaḥ

original: ukkaṇṭhitā, sā panatthato domanassacittuppādova, tenāha “paṭighasampayuttā”ti. Sā
analyzed: ukkaṇṭhitā sā pana atthataḥ domanassa cittuppādaḥ uva tena āha paṭigha sampayuttā iti sā

original: brahmaloke natthi jhānānubhāvapahīnattā. Taṇhādiṭṭhisaṅkhātā cittassa purimāvatthāya

original: uppannā “ahaṃ mama”nti gahaṇassa ca kāraṇabhūtā. Tena vakkhati “taṇhātassa nāpi diṭṭhitassanāpi
analyzed: uppannā aham gahaṇassa ca kāraṇa bhūtā tena vakkhati taṇhā tassa na api diṭṭhi tassa na api

analyzed: vaṭṭati iti nanu vuttam atthuddhāre imaṃyeva pāḷim nīharitvā aho vata aññe pi sattā

original: itthattaṃ āgaccheyyunti ayaṃ taṇhātassanā nāmā”ti? Saccaṃ, taṃ pana diṭṭhitassanāya

original: diṭṭhitassanāya alabbhamānattāti na doso. Idāni samānasaddavacanīyānaṃ atthānamuddharaṇaṃ

analyzed: katvā idha adhippetam vibhāvetum sā pana isā iti ādim āha paṭigha saṅkhāto cittu trāso eva

analyzed: evam aññattha api yathāraham jātim paṭicca atiādi vibhaṅga pāḷi tatra ayam attha kathā

original: – jātiṃ paṭicca bhayanti jātipaccayā uppannabhayaṃ. Bhayānakanti ākāraniddeso. Chambhitattanti

analyzed: puna sabhāvataḥ dassitanti ṭīkā ayam pana bhayānakam ti bherava ārammaṇa nimittam

original: balavabhayaṃ, tena sarīrassa thaddhabhāvo chambhitatta”nti vuttaṃ, aneneva bhayanti

original: ettha khuddakabhayaṃ dassitaṃ, iti ettha payoge ayaṃ tassanāti evaṃ sabbattha attho.

original: Paritassitavipphanditamevāti ettha “diṭṭhisaṅkhātena ceva taṇhāsaṅkhātena ca paritassitena
analyzed: paritassita vipphanditam eva ati ettha diṭṭhi saṅkhātena ca iva taṇhā saṅkhātena ca paritassitena

original: ādīnavanibbidānupassanāhi saṅkhārehi santāsanañāṇaṃ. Upapattivasenāti paṭisandhivaseneva.

original: Sahabyatanti sahāyabhāvamiccheva saddato attho sahabya-saddassa sahāyatthe pavattanato.
analyzed: sahabya tanti sahāya bhāvam icchā iva saddataḥ attho sahabya saddassa sahāya tthe pavattanato

original: So hi saha byāyati pavattati, dosaṃ vā paṭicchādetīti sahabyoti vuccati, tassa bhāvo

analyzed: imam eva attham sandhāya āha sahabhāvanti apica saha vāti pavattati iti sahavaḥ tassa

original: vuttaṃ, tasmā tadatthaṃ dassetuṃ evaṃ vuttantipi daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: vuttam tasmā tad attham dassetum evam vuttam iti pi daṭṭhabbam

original: 42. Ime satte abhibhavitvāti seso. Abhibhavanā cettha pāpasabhāvena jeṭṭhabhāvena
analyzed: ime satte abhibhavitvā ati sesaḥ abhibhavanā ca ittha pāpasa bhāvena jeṭṭha bhāvena

original: Aññadatthūti dassane antarāyābhāvavacanena, dasoti ettha dassaneyyavisesapariggahābhāvena

analyzed: hi padesa bhūtassa a gahaṇe sati gahetabbassa nippadesa tā viññāyati yathā dikkhitaḥ

original: na dadātī”ti, deyyadhammavisesassa cettha padesabhūtassa aggahaṇato pabbajito sabbampi

original: vattemīti vasavattī. Ahaṃ-saddayogato hi sabbattha amhayogena vacanattho. Sattabhājanabhūtassa
analyzed: vattemi iti vasa vattī aham sadda yogataḥ hi sabbattha amha yogena vacana atthaḥ satta bhājana bhūtassa

original: lokassa nimmātā cāti sambandho. “Pathavī”tiādi cettha bhājanalokavasena adhippāyakathanaṃ.

original: Sajitāti racitā, vibhajitā vā, tenāha “tvaṃ khattiyo nāmā”tiādi. Ciṇṇavasitāyāti

original: Paṭhamacittakkhaṇeti paṭisandhicittakkhaṇe. Dutiyatoti paṭhamabhavaṅgacittakkhaṇato.

original: Paṭhamairiyāpatheti yena paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhāti, tasmiṃ iriyāpathe. Iti atītavasena,
analyzed: paṭhama eriyāpatha iti yena paṭisandhim gaṇhāti tasmin iriyāpathe iti atīta vasena

original: bhūta-saddassa vattamānavasena ca bhabya-saddassa attho dassito. Ṭīkāyaṃ pana bhabya-saddattho

original: viya ṇyapaccayassa kattaripi pavattanato.
analyzed: viya ṇya paccayassa kattari pi pavattanataḥ

analyzed: pacchā uppajjantānam pi tathā abhinivesassa vakkhamāna ttā paresam patiṭṭhāpana kkamena iva

original: Tenevāha “taṃ kissa hetū”tiādi. Pāḷiyaṃ manaso paṇidhīti manaso patthanā, tathā cittuppattimattamevāti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: tena iva āha tam kissa hetu utiādi pāḷiyam manasaḥ paṇidhi iti manaso patthanā tathā citta uppattimattam eva ati vuttam hoti

analyzed: itthabhāvanti idappakāra bhāvam yasmā pana saḥ pakāraḥ brahmatta bhāvaḥ yevidha adhippeto

analyzed: tasmā brahma bhāvanti vuttam ayam pakāraḥ ittham tassa bhāvaḥ itthattam ti hi nibbacanam

original: Kevalanti kammassakatāñāṇena asammissaṃ suddhaṃ. Maññanāmattenevāti diṭṭhimaññanāmatteneva,
analyzed: kevalanti kammassaka tā ñāṇena asammissam suddham maññanā mattena iva ati diṭṭhi maññanā mattena iva

analyzed: vuttam iminā maya ntiādi

original: 43. Īsati abhibhavatīti īso, mahanto īso maheso, suppatiṭṭhitamahesatāya parehi “maheso”

original: iti akkhāyatīti mahesakkho, mahesakkhānaṃ atisayena mahesakkhoti mahesakkhataroti

original: viññāyatīti vuttaṃ “issariyaparivāravasena mahāyasataro”ti.
analyzed: viññāyati iti vuttam issariya parivāra vasena

original: Pāḷiyaṃ yaṃ aññataro sattoti ettha yanti nipātamattaṃ, kāraṇatthe vā esa nipāto,
analyzed: pāḷiyam yam aññataraḥ satto ti ettha yanti nipāta mattam kāraṇa tthe vā esa nipāto

analyzed: padesu ṭhānam kho pana itam bhikkhave vijjati yam aññataraḥ satto ti hi imāni padāni

original: nissāya pavattesu catutthādīsu catūsu vādesu kasmā “kāyassa bhedā”ti vuttaṃ. Na hi

analyzed: diṭṭhadhamma nibbāna vāda vaṇṇanā
