original: “Nettipeṭakappakaraṇe dhammakathikānaṃ yojanānayotipi vadantī”ti abhidhammaṭīkāyaṃ
analyzed: netti peṭaka pakaraṇe dhamma kathikānam vadanti iti abhidhamma ṭīkā ayam

original: vuttaṃ. Yasmā panāyaṃ desanāya samuṭṭhānapayojanabhājanesu, piṇḍatthesu ca paṭhamaṃ
analyzed: vuttam yasmā pana ayam desanāya samuṭṭhāna payojana bhājanesu piṇḍa tthesu ca paṭhamam

original: niddhāritesu sukarā, hoti suviññeyyā ca, tasmā –
analyzed: niddhāritesu sukarā hoti su viññeyyā ca tasmai

original: Samuṭṭhānaṃ payojanaṃ, bhājanañcāpi piṇḍatthaṃ;
analyzed: samuṭṭhānam payojanam bhājanam ca api piṇḍattham

original: Niddhāretvāna paṇḍito, tato hārādayo saṃse.
analyzed: tatas hāra ādayaḥ saṃse

original: Tattha samuṭṭhānaṃ nāma desanānidānaṃ, taṃ sādhāraṇamasādhāraṇanti duvidhaṃ, tathā
analyzed: tattha samuṭṭhānam nāma desanā nidānam tam sādhāraṇam asādhāraṇam ti duvidham tathā

original: sādhāraṇampi ajjhattikabāhirato. Tattha sādhāraṇaṃ ajjhattikasamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma bhagavato
analyzed: sādhāraṇam pi ajjhattika bāhirato tattha sādhāraṇam ajjhattikasamuṭṭhānam nāma bhagavato

original: mahākaruṇā. Tāya hi samussāhitassa lokanāthassa veneyyānaṃ dhammadesanāya cittaṃ
analyzed: mahā karuṇā tāya hi samussāhitassa lokanāthassa veneyyānam dhamma desanāya cittam

original: udapādi, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “sattesu kāruññataṃ paṭicca buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokesī”tiādi.
analyzed: udapādi tam sandhāya vuttam sattesu kāruñña tam paṭicca buddha cakkhunā lokam volokesi itiādi

original: Ettha ca tividhāvatthāyapi mahākaruṇāya saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo yāvadeva saddhammadesanāhatthadānehi
analyzed: ettha ca mahākaruṇāya saṅgahaḥ daṭṭhabbaḥ yāvat eva saddhamma desanā hattha dānehi

original: saṃsāramahoghato sattasantāraṇatthaṃ taduppattito. Yathā ca mahākaruṇā, evaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇadasabalañāṇādayopi
analyzed: saṃsāra mahoghato satta santāraṇa attham tad uppattitaḥ yathā ca mahākaruṇā evam sabbaññu taññāṇa dasa bala ñāṇa ādayaḥ api

original: desanāya sādhāraṇamajjhattikasamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma. Sabbañhi ñeyyadhammaṃ tesaṃ desetabbākāraṃ,
analyzed: desanāya sādhāraṇam ajjhattika samuṭṭhānam nāma sabbam hi ñeyya dhammam tesam desetabba ākāram

original: sattānaṃ āsayānusayādikañca yāthāvato jānanto bhagavā ṭhānāṭṭhānādīsu kosallena veneyyajjhāsayānurūpaṃ
analyzed: sattānam āsayā anusaya ādikam ca yāthāvataḥ jānantaḥ bhagavā ṭhāna aṭṭhāna ādīsu kosallena veneyya ajjhāsayā anurūpam

original: vicitranayadesanaṃ pavattesi. Bāhiraṃ pana sādhāraṇasamuṭṭhānaṃ dasasahassimahābrahmaparivārassa
analyzed: vicitra naya desanam pavattesi bāhiram pana sādhāraṇa samuṭṭhānam dasa sahassi mahābrahma parivārassa

original: sahampatibrahmuno ajjhesanaṃ. Tadajjhesanañhi pati dhammagambhīratāpaccavekkhaṇājanitaṃ
analyzed: sahampati brahmunaḥ ajjhesanam tad ajjhesanam hi pati dhamma gambhīra tā paccavekkhaṇā janitam

original: appossukkataṃ paṭippassambhetvā dhammassāmī dhammadesanāya ussāhajāto ahosi.
analyzed: appossukkatam paṭippassambhetvā dhammassāmī dhamma desanāya ussāha jātaḥ ahosi

original: Asādhāraṇampi ajjhattikabāhirato duvidhameva. Tattha ajjhattikaṃ yāya mahākaruṇāya,
analyzed: asādhāraṇam pi ajjhattika bāhirataḥ duvidham eva tattha ajjhattikam mahākaruṇāya

original: yena ca desanāñāṇena idaṃ suttaṃ pavattitaṃ, tadubhayameva. Sāmaññāvatthāya hi sādhāraṇampi
analyzed: yena ca desanā ñāṇena idam suttam pavattitam tat ubhayam eva sāmaññā avatthāya hi sādhāraṇam pi

original: samānaṃ mahākaruṇādivisesāvatthāya asādhāraṇaṃ bhavati, bāhiraṃ pana asādhāraṇasamuṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: samānam mahākaruṇā ādi visesa avatthāya asādhāraṇam bhavati bāhiram pana asādhāraṇa samuṭṭhānam

original: vaṇṇāvaṇṇabhaṇananti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Apica nindāpasaṃsāsu sattānaṃ veneyyāghātānandādibhāvamanāpatti.
analyzed: vaṇṇa avaṇṇa bhaṇanan ti aṭṭhakathāyam vuttam api ca nindā apasaṃsāsu sattānam veneyya āghāta ānanda ādi bhāvam anāpatti

original: Tattha ca anādīnavadassanaṃ bāhiramasādhāraṇasamuṭṭhānameva, tathā nindāpasaṃsāsu
analyzed: tattha ca anādīnava dassanam bāhiram asādhāraṇa samuṭṭhānam eva tathā nindā apasaṃsāsu

original: paṭipajjanakkamassa, pasaṃsāvisayassa ca khuddakādivasena anekavidhassa sīlassa,
analyzed: paṭipajjana kkamassa pasaṃsā visayassa ca khuddaka ādi vasena anekavidhassa sīlassa

original: sabbaññutaññāṇassa ca sassatādidiṭṭhiṭṭhāne, taduttari ca appaṭihatacāratāya, tathāgatassa
analyzed: sabbaññuta ññāṇassa ca sassata ādi diṭṭhi ṭhāne tad uttari ca appaṭihata cāra tāya tathāgatassa

original: ca katthacipi bhavādīsu apariyāpannatāya sattānamanavabodhopi bāhiramasādhāraṇasamuṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: ca katthacipi bhava ādīsu apariyāpanna tāya sattānam anavabodhaḥ api bāhiram asādhāraṇa samuṭṭhānam

original: Payojanampi sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇato duvidhaṃ. Tattha sādhāraṇaṃ anupādāparinibbānaṃ
analyzed: payojanam pi sādhāraṇa asādhāraṇataḥ duvidham tattha sādhāraṇam anupādā parinibbānam

original: vimuttirasattā sabbāyapi bhagavato desanāya, tenevāha “etadatthā kathā, etadatthā
analyzed: vimuttiḥ asattā bhagavataḥ desanāya tena iva āha etad atthā kathā etad atthā

original: mantanā”tiādi asādhāraṇaṃ pana bāhirasamuṭṭhānato vipariyāyena veditabbaṃ. Nindāpasaṃsāsu
analyzed: mantana ati ādi asādhāraṇam pana bāhira samuṭṭhānataḥ vipariyāyena veditabbam nindā apasaṃsāsu

original: hi sattānanveneyyāghātānandādibhāvappattiādikaṃ imissā desanāya phalabhūtaṃ kāraṇabhāvena
analyzed: hi imissā desanāya phala bhūtam kāraṇa bhāvena

original: imaṃ desanaṃ payojeti. Phalañhi taduppādakasattiyā kāraṇaṃ payojeti nāma phale satiyeva
analyzed: imam desanam payojā iti phalam hi tad uppādaka sattiyā kāraṇam payojā iti nāma phale satiyā iva

original: tāya sattiyā kāraṇabhāvappattito. Atha vā yathāvuttaṃ phalaṃ imāya desanāya bhagavantaṃ
analyzed: tāya sattiyā kāraṇa bhāva ppattitaḥ atha vā yathā vuttam phalam imāya desanāya bhagavantam

original: payojetīti ācariyasāriputtattherena vuttaṃ. Yañhi desanāya sādhetabbaṃ phalaṃ, taṃ
analyzed: payojeti iti ācariya sāriputta therena vuttam yat hi desanāya sādhetabbam phalam tam

original: ākaṅkhitabbattā desanāya desakaṃ payojeti nāma. Apica kuhanalapanādinānāvidhamicchājīvaviddhaṃsanaṃ,
analyzed: ākaṅkhitabba ttā desanāya desakam payojā iti nāma apica kuhana lapana ādi nānāvidham icchājīva viddhaṃsanam

original: dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhijālaviniveṭhanaṃ, diṭṭhisīsena paccayākāravibhāvanaṃ, chaphassāyatanavasena
analyzed: dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhi jāla viniveṭhanam diṭṭhi sīsena paccaya ākāra vibhāvanam cha phassa āyatana vasena

original: catusaccakammaṭṭhānaniddeso, sabbadiṭṭhigatānaṃ anavasesapariyādānaṃ, attano anupādāparinibbānadīpanañca payojanameva.
analyzed: catu sacca kammaṭṭhāna niddeso sabba diṭṭhi gatānam anavasesa pariyādānam attanaḥ anupādā parinibbāna dīpanam ca payojanam eva

original: Bhājanaṃ pana desanādhiṭṭhānaṃ. Ye hi vaṇṇāvaṇṇanimittaanurodhavirodhavantacittā
analyzed: bhājanam pana desanā adhiṭṭhānam ye hi vaṇṇa avaṇṇa nimitta anurodha virodhavanta cittā

original: kuhanādivividhamicchājīvaniratā sassatādidiṭṭhipaṅkanimuggā sīlakkhandhādīsu aparipūrakārino
analyzed: kuhanā ādi vividha micchājīva niratā sassata ādi diṭṭhi paṅka nimuggā sīla kkhandha ādīsu a paripūra kārinaḥ

original: abuddhaguṇavisesañāṇā veneyyā, te imissā desanāya bhājanaṃ.
analyzed: a buddha guṇa visesa ñāṇā veneyyā te imissā desanāya bhājanam

original: Piṇḍattho pana idha labbhamānapadehi, samudāyena ca suttapadena yathāsambhavaṃ saṅgahito
analyzed: piṇḍatthaḥ pana idha labbhamāna padehi samudāyena ca sutta padena yathāsambhavam saṅgahitaḥ

analyzed: atthaḥ āghāta ādīnam akaraṇīya tā vacanena hi dassitam paṭiññā anurūpam samaṇa saññāya niyojanam

original: tathā khantisoraccānuṭṭhānaṃ, brahmavihārabhāvanānuyogo, saddhāpaññāsamāyogo, satisampajaññādhiṭṭhānaṃ,
analyzed: tathā khanti soracca anuṭṭhānam brahmavihāra bhāvanā anuyogaḥ saddhā paññā samāyogaḥ sati sampajaññā adhiṭṭhānam

original: paṭisaṅkhānabhāvanābalasiddhi, pariyuṭṭhānānusayappahānaṃ, ubhayahitapaṭipatti, lokadhammehi anupalepo ca –

original: Pāṇātipātādīhi paṭivirativacanena dassitā sīlavisuddhi, tāya ca hirottappasampatti,
analyzed: pāṇa atipāta ādīhi paṭivirati vacanena dassitā sīla visuddhi tāya ca hirottappa sampatti

original: mettākaruṇāsamaṅgitā, vītikkamappahānaṃ, tadaṅgappahānaṃ, duccaritasaṃkilesappahānaṃ,

original: viratittayasiddhi, piyamanāpagarubhāvanīyatānipphatti, lābhasakkārasilokasamudāgamo,

original: samathavipassanānaṃ adhiṭṭhānabhāvo, akusalamūlatanukaraṇaṃ, kusalamūlaropanaṃ, ubhayānatthadūrīkaraṇaṃ,

original: parisāsu visāradatā, appamādavihāro, parehi duppadhaṃsiyatā, avippaṭisārādisamaṅgitā ca –

original: yathābhūtañāṇagocaratā, sukhumasabhāvatā, mahāpaññāvibhāvanā ca. Diṭṭhidīpakapadehi

original: Soḷasahāravaṇṇanā
analyzed: soḷasa hāra vaṇṇanā

original: Desanāhāravaṇṇanā
analyzed: desanā āhāra vaṇṇanā

analyzed: desanā ñāṇassa padaṭṭhānaṃ desanā ñāṇam veneyyānam sakala vaṭṭa dukkha nissaraṇassa padaṭṭhānaṃ

original: Sabbāyapi diṭṭhiyā diṭṭhupādānabhāvato sā yathārahaṃ navavidhassapi bhavassa padaṭṭhānaṃ.

original: “Ajānataṃ apassata”nti avijjāgahaṇaṃ. Tattha avijjā saṅkhārānaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ, saṅkhārā

original: pāḷiyamāgatanayena sambajjhitabbaṃ. “Taṇhāgatānaṃ paritassitavipphandita”nti ettha

original: taṇhā upādānassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. “Tadapi phassapaccayā”ti ettha sassatādipaññāpanaṃ

analyzed: paresam micchā abhinivesassa padaṭṭhānam micchā abhinivesaḥ saddhamma ssavana sappurisa upanissaya yoni so manasikāra dhamma anudhamma paṭipattīhi

original: vimukhatāya asaddhammassavanādīnañca padaṭṭhānaṃ. “Aññatra phassā”tiādīsu phasso

original: Channaṃ phassāyatanānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samudayādipajānanaṃ nibbidāya padaṭṭhānaṃ, nibbidā

analyzed: pada ṭṭhāna dhammā tesam ca pada ṭṭhāna dhammā ati yathāsambhavam pada ṭṭhāna dhamma niddhāraṇa lakkhaṇo

original: padaṭṭhānahāro nāma. Vuttañhi “dhammaṃ deseti jino, tassa ca dhammassa yaṃ padaṭṭhāna”ntiādi.
analyzed: padaṭṭhāna hāraḥ nāma vuttam hi dhammam deseti jino tassa ca dhammassa yam padaṭṭhāna ntiādi

original: Lakkhaṇahāravaṇṇanā
analyzed: lakkhaṇa hāra vaṇṇanā

original: Āghātādiggahaṇena kodhūpanāhamakkhapalāsaissāmacchariyasārambhaparavambhanādīnaṃ

original: saṅgaho paṭighacittuppādapariyāpannatāya ekalakkhaṇattā. Ānandādiggahaṇena abhijjhāvisamalobhamānātimānamadappamādānaṃ

original: saṅgaho lobhacittuppādapariyāpannatāya ekalakkhaṇattā. Tathā āghātaggahaṇena avasiṭṭhaganthanīvaraṇānaṃ
analyzed: saṅgahaḥ lobha cittuppāda pariyāpanna tāya eka lakkhaṇa ttā tathā āghāta ggahaṇena avasiṭṭha gantha nīvaraṇānam

analyzed: saṅgahaḥ saṅkhāra khandha lakkhaṇena eka lakkhaṇa ttā sīla ggahaṇena adhicitta adhipaññā sikkhānam

analyzed: lakkhaṇahāraḥ nāma tathā hi vuttam vuttamhi eka dhamme ye dhammāḥ eka lakkhaṇa atiādi

original: Catubyūhahāravaṇṇanā
analyzed: catu byūha hāra vaṇṇanā

analyzed: tattha etassa avaṇṇanti iminā sambandhaḥ ti ādinā padassa pada antarena sambandhaḥ

original: Tathā “nicco dhuvo”tiādinā anicce “nicca”nti vipallāso, “arogo paraṃ maraṇā, ekantasukhī
analyzed: tathā niccaḥ dhuvaḥ ti ādinā anicce vipallāsaḥ arogaḥ param ekanta sukhī

original: attā, diṭṭhadhammanibbānappatto”ti ca evamādīhi asukhe “sukha”nti vipallāso. “Pañcahi
analyzed: attā diṭṭhadhamma nibbāna ppatto ti ca evamādīhi asukhe sukham ti vipallāsaḥ pañcahi

original: kāmaguṇehi samappito”tiādinā asubhe “subha”nti vipallāso. Sabbeheva diṭṭhippakāsanapadehi
analyzed: kāma guṇehi samappitaḥ ti ādinā asubhe subham ti vipallāso sabbehi eva diṭṭhi ppakāsana padehi

original: anattani “attā”ti vipallāsoti evamettha cattāro vipallāsā siddhā honti, tesaṃ paṭipakkhato
analyzed: an attani attā ati vipallāso ti evam ettha cattāro vipallāsā siddhāḥ honti tesam paṭipakkhato

original: cattāri satipaṭṭhānāni siddhāneva. Tattha catūhi yathāvuttehi indriyehi cattāro puggalā
analyzed: cattāri sati paṭṭhānāni tattha catūhi yathā vuttehi indriyehi cattāro puggalā

original: niddisitabbā. Kathaṃ duvidho hi taṇhācarito mudindriyo tikkhindriyoti, tathā diṭṭhicaritopi.
analyzed: niddisitabbā katham duvidhaḥ hi taṇhā caritaḥ mud indriyaḥ tikkha indriyaḥ ti tathā diṭṭhi caritaḥ api

original: Tesu paṭhamo asubhe “subha”nti vipallatthadiṭṭhiko satibalena yathābhūtaṃ kāyasabhāvaṃ
analyzed: tesu paṭhamaḥ asubhe vipallattha diṭṭhiko sati balena yathābhūtam kāya sabhāvam

original: sallakkhetvā sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamati. Dutiyo asukhe “sukha”nti vipallatthadiṭṭhiko
analyzed: sallakkhetvā sammatta niyāmam okkamati dutiyaḥ asukhe sukhanti vipallattha diṭṭhiko

original: “uppannaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ nādhivāsetī”tiādinā vuttena vīriyasaṃvarasaṅkhātena vīriyabalena
analyzed: uppannam kāma vitakkam na adhivāseti iti ādinā vuttena vīriya saṃvara saṅkhātena vīriya balena

original: taṃ vipallāsaṃ vidhamati. Tatiyo anicce “nicca”nti vipallatthadiṭṭhiko samādhibalena
analyzed: tam vipallāsam vidhamati tatiyaḥ anicce niccanti vipallattha diṭṭhiko samādhi balena

original: samāhitabhāvato saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇikabhāvaṃ yathābhūtaṃ paṭivijjhati. Catuttho santatisamūhakiccārammaṇaghanavicittattā
analyzed: samāhita bhāvataḥ saṅkhārānam khaṇika bhāvam yathābhūtam paṭivijjhati catutthaḥ santati samūha kicca ārammaṇa ghana vicitta ttā

original: phassādidhammapuñjamatte anattani “attā”ti vipallatthadiṭṭhiko catukoṭikasuññatāmanasikārena
analyzed: phassa ādi dhamma puñja matte anattani attā ati vipallattha diṭṭhiko catu koṭika suñña tā manasikārena

original: taṃ micchābhinivesaṃ viddhaṃseti. Catūhi cettha vipallāsehi caturāsavoghayogaganthaagatitaṇhuppādupādānasattaviññāṇaṭṭhitiapariññādivasena
analyzed: tam micchā abhinivesam catūhi ca ittha vipallāsehi catur āsava ogha yoga gantha agati taṇhuppāda upādāna satta viññāṇa ṭṭhiti apariññā ādi vasena

original: sabbopi akusalapakkho netabbo. Tathā catūhi satipaṭṭhānehi catubbidhajhānavihārādhiṭṭhānasukhabhāgiyadhammaappamaññāsammappadhānaiddhipādādivasena
analyzed: sabbaḥ api akusala pakkhaḥ netabbaḥ tathā catūhi sati paṭṭhānehi catubbidha jhāna vihāra adhiṭṭhāna sukha bhāgiya dhamma appamaññā sammappadhāna eddhipāda ādi vasena

original: sabbopi vodānapakkho netabbo.
analyzed: sabbaḥ api vodānapakkhaḥ netabbaḥ

original: Ettha cāyaṃ saccayojanā – subhasaññāsukhasaññāhi, catūhipi vā vipallāsehi samudayasaccaṃ,
analyzed: ettha ca ayam sacca yojanā subha saññā sukha saññāhi vā vipallāsehi samudaya saccam

original: tesamadhiṭṭhānārammaṇabhūtā pañcupādānakkhandhā dukkhasaccaṃ, tesamappavatti nirodhasaccaṃ,
analyzed: tesam adhiṭṭhāna ārammaṇa bhūtā pañca upādāna kkhandhāḥ dukkha saccam tesam appavatti nirodha saccam

original: nirodhapajānanā satipaṭṭhānādikā maggasaccanti. Ayaṃ vipallāsehi saṃkilesapakkhaṃ,
analyzed: nirodha pajānanā sati paṭṭhāna ādikā magga saccanti ayam vipallāsehi saṃkilesa pakkham

original: saddhindriyādīhi vodānapakkhaṃ catusaccayojanamukhena nayanalakkhaṇassa sīhavikkīḷitanayassa
analyzed: saddhi indriya ādīhi vodāna pakkham catur acca yojana mukhena nayana lakkhaṇassa sīha vikkīḷita nayassa

original: bhūmi, yathāha “yo neti vipallāsehi, kilese indriyehi saddhamme”tiādi.
analyzed: yathā āha yaḥ na iti vipallāsehi kilese indriyehi saddhamma itiādi

original: Disālocanaaṅkusanayadvayavaṇṇanā
Iti tiṇṇaṃ atthanayānaṃ siddhiyā vohāranayadvayampi siddhameva hoti. Tathā hi atthanayattayadisābhūtadhammānaṃ
analyzed: iti tiṇṇam siddhiyā vohāra naya dvayam pi siddham eva hoti tathā hi attha naya ttaya disābhūta dhammānam

original: samālocanameva disālocananayo. Tesaṃ samānayanameva aṅkusanayo. Tasmā yathāvuttanayena
analyzed: tesam samānayanam eva aṅkusa nayo tasmai yathā vutta nayena

original: atthanayānaṃ disābhūtadhammasamālokananayanavasena tampi nayadvayaṃ yojetabbanti,
analyzed: atthanayānam disābhūta dhamma samālokana nayana vasena tat pi naya dvayam yojetabban ti

original: tena vuttaṃ “veyyākaraṇesu hi ye, kusalākusalā”tiādi. Ayaṃ pañcanayayojanā.
analyzed: tena vuttam veyyākaraṇesu hi ye kusala akusala ati ādi ayam pañca naya yojanā

original: Pañcavidhanayavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: pañcavidha naya vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Sāsanapaṭṭhānavaṇṇanā
analyzed: sāsana paṭṭhāna vaṇṇanā

original: Idaṃ pana suttaṃ soḷasavidhe sāsanapaṭṭhāne saṃkilesavāsanāsekkhabhāgiyaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhādisaṃkilesānaṃ
analyzed: idam pana suttam soḷasavidhe sāsana paṭṭhāne saṃkilesa vāsanā sekkha bhāgiyam taṇhā diṭṭha ādi saṃkilesānam

original: sīlādipuññakiriyassa, asekkhasīlādikkhandhassa ca vibhattattā, saṃkilesavāsanānibbedhāsekkhabhāgiyameva
analyzed: sīla ādi puñña kiriyassa asekkha sīla ādi kkhandhassa ca vibhatta ttā saṃkilesa vāsanā nibbedha asekkha bhāgiyam eva

original: vā yathāvuttatthānaṃ sekkhasīlakkhandhādikassa ca vibhattattā. Aṭṭhavīsatividhe pana
analyzed: vā yathā vutta tthānam sekkha sīla kkhandha ādikassa ca vibhatta ttā aṭṭhavīsatividhe pana

original: sāsanapaṭṭhāne lokiyalokuttaraṃ sattadhammādhiṭṭhānaṃ ñāṇañeyyaṃ dassanabhāvanaṃ
analyzed: sāsana paṭṭhāne lokiya lokuttaram satta dhamma adhiṭṭhānam ñāṇa ñeyyam dassana bhāvanam

original: sakavacanaparavacanaṃ vissajjanīyāvissajjanīyaṃ kammavipākaṃ kusalākusalaṃ anuññātapaṭikkhittaṃ
analyzed: saka vacana para vacanam vissajjanīya a vissajjanīyam kamma vipākam kusala akusalam anuññāta paṭikkhittam

original: bhavo ca lokiyalokuttarādīnamatthānaṃ idha vibhattattāti. Ayaṃ sāsanapaṭṭhānayojanā.
analyzed: ca lokiya lokuttara ādīnam atthānam idha ayam sāsana paṭṭhāna yojanā

original: Pakaraṇanayavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: pakaraṇa naya vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Iti sumaṅgalavilāsiniyā dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāya paramasukhumagambhīraduranubodhatthaparidīpanāya
analyzed: iti sumaṅgalavilāsiniyā dīgha nikāya ṭṭhakathāya parama sukhuma gambhīra duranubodha ttha paridīpanāya

original: suvimalavipulapaññāveyyattiyajananāya ajjavamaddavasoraccasaddhāsatidhitibuddhikhantivīriyādidhammasamaṅginā
analyzed: su vimala vipula paññā veyyattiya jananāya

original: sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye asaṅgāsaṃhīravisāradañāṇacārinā anekappabhedasakasamayasamayantaragahanajjhogāhinā
analyzed: sa aṭṭhakathe piṭa kattaye asaṅga a saṃhīra visāra da ñāṇa cārinā aneka ppabheda saka samaya samaya antara gahana ajjhogāhinā

original: mahāgaṇinā mahāveyyākaraṇena ñāṇābhivaṃsadhammasenāpatināmatherena mahādhammarājādhirājagarunā
analyzed: mahāgaṇinā mahāveyyākaraṇena ñāṇa abhivaṃsa dhamma senāpati nāmatherena mahā dhamma rāja adhirāja garunā

original: katāya sādhuvilāsiniyā nāma līnatthapakāsaniyā brahmajālasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthavibhāvanā.
analyzed: katāya sādhuvilāsiniyā nāma līnattha pakāsaniyā brahmajāla sutta vaṇṇanāya līnattha vibhāvanā

original: Brahmajālasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: brahmajāla sutta vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Paṭhamo bhāgo niṭṭhito.
analyzed: paṭhamaḥ bhāgaḥ niṭṭhitaḥ
